Fantasy At It's Funniest - Musical Offering.

Scooby and the gang face their most challenging mystery ever: a plot to unleash the ghost dog Cerberus upon the world. As they race to stop this dogpocalypse, the gang discovers that Scooby has an epic destiny greater than anyone imagined.
While being on the run for saving a mouse, the famous Puss in Boots, Pero, helps a young peasant boy win the heart of a lovely princess, while trying to rescue her from an evil wizard.
In an alternate reality where cloning was once legal, a young immigrant is fired from her job and must decide whether to return to her mysterious place of origin.
A lawyer's wife starts an affair with a mobster but is confronted by his other flame who ends-up murdered and the adulterous wife is set-up to take the blame for the killing.
The career of a waitress takes off when she meets an amiable drunken Hollywood director.
A documentary exploring the myth of the Loch Ness monster.

Abimanyu Karindra has no choice but to bring his wife, Sofia and their two children and his sister Sheila to settle in a parent's hotel in a mountain valley hundreds of kilometers from Jakarta, after being declared bankrupt by the court.
A young woman living in a castle reads letters written by her ancestor and comes to believe that she is the returned spirit of a former aristocrat who once live there.

While testing out a realistic looking paint ball gun for a new client, a young advertising executive runs afoul of both a right-wing militia group and the A.T.F., who've ascended into the mountains to look for their missing agent.
After her father's death, a city girl goes to live with her estranged mother in a tiny mountain town which harbours a magical secret, and gives her the chance to discover who she really is.

Three people are mysteriously stranded in a remote village in the wintry Alps. It gradually turns out that the village is the setting of a reality show, the content of which is the study of the fear of one of the three unsuspecting people
Enthrallingly and fervently, colorfully and directly narration about the surprising adventures of little Ivanushka and his true friend - magic Horse, outwitting a foolish and greedy tsar.
A mass shooting survivor seeks vengeance on the perpetrator at large.

BAILIWICK is the story of John, a lonely, quiet man who is given a magical gift that changes his life. Do you like magic? Bailiwick is not officially rated but the director suggests a PG-13 rating for language and violence.

A widower and his family relocate to a small town outside of Salem to escape their haunted past. However, their new surroundings begin to reveal an even darker history as a malicious presence is conjured and begins to prey upon them.

Woman is kidnapped, drugged, sold on the dark web to the highest bidder and trafficked to another country where only one person can find her, her ex boyfriend, a retired green beret trained in extraction of special operatives.
Two strangers meet in a nightclub and end up spending the night together in a hotel.
While Hirono is in prison, his rival Takeda turns his own crime organization into a political party, whose two executives stir up new tensions in their thirst for power.
88 days before his scheduled release from a state mental hospital Lucky O'Donnell returned home on the journey of a lifetime.
The grandson of a legendary gentleman burglar assembles a team of thieves to steal a Cleopatran necklace from two parties - an ally-turned-rival, and an underworld tycoon.
Three Spanish guys create a code to win money at the casinos.
A family Christmas dinner is interrupted by a towering stranger who demands to be shot in the chest with a sawn-off shotgun.

PREYTA follows estranged siblings as they return to their childhood home. When they recover memories of the terrifying Entity that tortured their family when they were children, their presence reawakens Preyta and it begins to feed again.

A millionaire disappears somewhere in Africa, with his child daughter, and a lot of diamonds. 15 years later, his wife ears a legend about a white Jungle Goddess near the general location of the plane crash, and orders a search for her.

Follows the journey taken by 17-year-old Martin through Latin America - by bicycle - from his snow-frozen school in Tierra del Fuego in search of his 'real' father, a cartoonist turned anthropologist believed to be in the Amazon jungle.
A Black high school student finds himself under suspicion after his classmate's mysterious disappearance.
Story of a runaway, triangular love affair unfolds when an undergraduate girl unexpectedly falls in love with a local thug and subsequently meets a fellow student on campus.
A hungry shark begins feeding on unsuspecting lake goers in a small Texas town.

What starts as an innocent move from the crowded city to an old estate in the quiet forest, turns out soon to be a fateful decision of a family that is confronted with the supernatural and evil of a parallel dimension.

A homeless orphan girl is adopted by a wealthy man against his wife wishes. When the man dies, the girl endures endless humiliations under the wife's harsh grip. She finds solace with mysterious old maid who lives near by.
Un vendedor de cervezas es secuestrado por marcianos que le dan poderes especiales para convertirse en un súper futbolista.

A stunning turn of events in a sordid story leads TV tabloid newshound Lorenzo (Ivan Martin) down a path toward a mystical realm in director Loren-Paul Caplin's intriguing tale. While ...                See full synopsis »
In a complex piece of espionage the Russian secret service attempts to kidnap a high ranking officer in the CIA and replace him with a double of its own.
Two F.B.I. Agents with wildly different styles arrive in Mississippi to investigate the disappearance of some civil rights activists.
A sheltered young loser goes on the worst blind date ever when he and his date must cover up the accidental murder of a crooked cop.
A goofy man invades and takes over a rich family's mansion, intending to impress his girlfriend in private. His plan goes wrong when a teenage summer camp is attracted to the place.
Set during the time of the first outbreak of bubonic plague in England, a young monk is given the task of learning the truth about reports of people being brought back to life in a small village.

Henry Sharon is about to be ruined financially by rival stable owner Lew Ralston when he gets an idea to fake his own death. His prize horse Certified Check is bequeathed to niece Martha, a young woman Ralston had hoped to marry.

movie_name: Enter If You Dare: House on Creepy Lane Part 2
synopsis: Five segments of horror.

Emma has a perfectly normal family until one day it turns out her dad, Thomas, is transgender. As Thomas becomes Agnete, both father and daughter struggle to hold on to what they had while accepting that everything has changed.

American car designer Carroll Shelby and driver Ken Miles battle corporate interference and the laws of physics to build a revolutionary race car for Ford in order to defeat Ferrari at the 24 Hours of Le Mans in 1966.

When five elite Urban Explorers accidentally stumble upon an ancient government conspiracy, it leads them on an epic journey, which unbeknown to everyone unleashes a lethal terror that is unlike anyone has ever seen before.

Berlin, 1923. Following the suicide of his brother, American circus acrobat Abel Rosenberg attempts to survive while facing unemployment, depression, alcoholism and the social decay of Germany during the Weimar Republic.

Creatures, who claim to be from another planet, interact with world leaders. But their plot is exposed and their true nature is revealed by a nine-year-old girl. Now they seek to endanger her and all those around her.

movie_name: The Man Who Sold the World
synopsis: The story of Max: a man who becomes embroiled in time and space and the many dimensions of man's mind and his place within his own universe.

SynopsisMathi is a TV producer, who works in a private television channel that does small scale shows like cookery. He is a happy go lucky person, whose life revolves around his job, ...                See full synopsis »
When Håkan gets a little sister, it is as if Mom and Dad completely forgot about him.
The story revolves around a man who possesses the superpower of visualizing events before they happened, thereby making him conquer them from within.
A dog finds the meaning of his own existence through the lives of the humans he meets.
A film student who is obsessed with the movie Grave Encounters sets out with his friends to visit the psychiatric hospital depicted in the original film.
Shunned by local authorities for wanting to stage a political satire, a drama company joins forces with a RAW agent to save the country when an enemy swears to wipe out its existence.

movie_name: Maya the Bee 3: The Golden Orb
synopsis: When Maya, a headstrong little bee, and her best friend Willi, rescue an ant princess they find themselves in the middle of an epic bug battle that will take them to strange new worlds and test their friendship to its limits.
Mike Teller, with the help of Harry Crawford, must retrieve Mike's wife, Lisa from the clutches of Jack Fisher over a matter of $500,000.
Dena and the Baron battle gangsters on the streets of downtown Cleveland in a quest for $100,000, leading to many murders, double crosses and a final foot chase.

A little tailor killed seven flies at once with a fly swatter, made himself a large waist belt and embroidered on it: "Seven in one fell swoop". Then it moved into the world and experienced many adventures.
A realtor finds himself accompanied by two ghostly entities inside a mansion. He learns of a violent event that took place years ago and is sent back in time to prevent it from happening.

Three college friends hit the biggest party of the year, where a mysterious phenomenon disrupts the night, quickly descending into a chaos that challenges their friendships - and whether they can stay alive.
A young couple need easy money. A few friends join them to plan a kidnap, but nothing goes right when some of them go after revenge and betray each other.
A story about a groups of slackers and crooks colliding with one another.
based 50 years in the future, humanity comes face to face with an impending doom.
The lives of five individuals living in different places converge at a point, resulting in the transformation of their persona and purpose.
On Christmas Eve, a young boy embarks on a magical adventure to the North Pole on the Polar Express, while learning about friendship, bravery, and the spirit of Christmas.

Dina's father, a district doctor, mysteriously disappears. After this event, Dinu is visited at night by a ghost predicting misfortune for his fellow villagers. Dina tries to warn trouble, but they do not believe her.
After awakening from a coma, a woman searches for clues into her missing husband's disappearance.
The untold true story of the legendary detectives who brought down Bonnie and Clyde.
The first contemporary adaptation of Mary Shelley's 1826 novel about a twenty-first century pandemic.

A slacker and an eccentric wormhole wrangler are sent to planet Earth to retrieve stolen fanny packs filled with wild, un-programmed wormholes before the disrupted time continuum collapses into a newly formed, lurking black hole.
Based on the young adult novel 'The Lunch Witch' by Deb Lucke.

movie_name: Majokko shimai no Yoyo to Nene
synopsis: This is a thrilling, magical and colorful movie about the adventures of two witches who embark on an adventure to save our world from dark magic, also known as curses.
An orphaned boy who dreams of being a ninja arrives in Hollywood to try and find his birth parents, where he gets mixed up in a crime.
A journalist who possesses information on uranium sales is set up by his enemies and sent to prison.
An alien life form that is a huge ball of living matter invades earth, and replenishes itself by absorbing people.
Lonely, deranged puppet-master designs a machine that shrinks people.
In a remote trailer on the edge of town, a pair of siblings living in isolation wake up to find their mother missing and a mysterious stranger at their door.
A group of friends find themselves inside a bathysphere and awake in Atlantis. With the help of the King of Atlantis, they do their best to recover the Titanic.

movie_name: The Equinox... A Journey Into the Supernatural
synopsis: Deep within the woods and canyons of California, four teenagers happen upon an ancient book containing the secrets of a strange, malevolent world that coexists with that of humankind.

While Batman deals with a deformed man calling himself the Penguin wreaking havoc across Gotham with the help of a cruel businessman, a female employee of the latter becomes the Catwoman with her own vendetta.
A mermaid pursues a teacher by attending school.
A fisherman facing his ex girlfriend.
Riley searches for a cure to the virus that took over Samantha before it consumes him and the entire world.
When Lupin heads to the kingdom of Zufu to pilfer its treasure, he incurs the wrath of its psychotic ruler General Headhunter, who places a dead-or-alive bounty on his head.
A man will do anything to save his wife in the term oil of the future.
A young hardened police officer finds himself in the middle of the murder of the inspector he is now supposed to replace at a small sea town.

movie_name: Horse Crazy 2: The Legend of Grizzly Mountain
synopsis: With a little mountain magic, sometimes it pays to horse around!
Fantastic movie about a teleporting witch who uses other peoples life force to do her traveling it is a very different kind of witch story

All over the world, ordinary people are committing unspeakable acts of violence at the behest of an enemy known only as "His Voice." After years of lying dormant, it's up to the cyborgs to stop it--whatever it is.

Kristian is a fragile 8-year-old boy. He meets 10-year old Jarka who lives in the same housing. Pushed by her desire to form a family, Jarka creates one with Kristian when she finds herself giving shelter to two abandoned twin babies.
After ghosts invade the human world through the Internet, a father must protect his daughter from the psychotic spirit of his ex-wife.
One devil. Two crime lords. Three Traitors. Four Soccer Players. And 30 million dollars! All at the same place, at the perfect time.
The story of the film revolves around Shaan, who, after passing the Bangladesh Civil Service examinations, joins the police force to serve the nation. He is an honest and courageous police officer.

An American businessman invests into first ever Bitcoin exchange in Hong Kong but suddenly the money and Bitcoins all disappear leaving a businessman and a group of chromatic millennials in search of who done it.
A group of misfit filmmakers document their experiments with remote viewing; the alleged paranormal ability to perceive remote or hidden targets by using extrasensory perception.

Rena Riffel (Showgirls/Mulholland Drive) stars in her directorial debut, the B Movie Musical Retro Satire, Trasharella. Transforming into a recycling trashy super hero, it is up to Trasharella to kill the Hollywood Vampire.

movie_name: Who Finds a Friend Finds a Treasure
synopsis: On a small pacific island, Alan and Charlie try to find a war treasure left behind by the Japanese army in World War II.
A man orders some "animal ambrosia" so he can turn into animals and be able to watch naked women.
James Bond is sent to investigate a KGB policy to kill all enemy spies and uncovers an arms deal that potentially has major global ramifications.
A band of samurai sets out to avenge the death and dishonor of their master at the hands of a ruthless shogun.
A group of steelworkers look to save Chicago residents from a mile-high structure that is on the verge of collapsing.
Izo, a Ronin, and Raiden, an orc, work to bring a young elf girl and the wand she carries to the land of the elves in the north.
Thirsty for a following, Kurt Kunkle is a rideshare driver who has figured out a deadly plan to go viral.

movie_name: No, the Case Is Happily Resolved
synopsis: When the eyewitness to a brutal murder decides not to testify, the actual murderer chooses to finger him as the murderer and claim eyewitness status for himself.

After getting interested in murder as a kid in Colombia, Gabriela now has a scrapbook on murders including clippings on "The Blue Blood Killer". While cleaning his latest murder scene in Miami, she comes across a clue missed by the cops.
A bunch of misfits and gangsters embarks on a journey to find a lost and stolen diamond.

movie_name: We Are the Pirates of the Roads
synopsis: A teenager is accidentally abducted by a family of bandits.
A girl name Summer is reunited with her childhood best friends and crush during a summer where secrets and tragedies are revealed while three guys vie for Summer's love.
A down-on-her luck prostitute embarks on a wild adventure that puts her in contact with the Mafia.
Two men come to Iran. One to visit his grandmother and another as an art dealer. When they discover that they are neighbors, the story begins.

Pothead ne'er-do-well Amy just wants to hang out and get high, but when she discovers a vape pen that can reverse time, she must scramble to restore temporal order (and hopefully get some nookie in the process).
Love between a danseuse and a musician brought under attack from various sources. Will their love survive amidst treachery and competition?
A Shanghai doctor named Tangsan, is trying to help the town's poor people. Meanwhile, he has the murderous Axe Gang to deal with as well as his feelings for the gang leader's sister.
The envious sisters of the young queen stand in the way of her happiness. A fairy tale based on Alexander Pushkin novel.
James Bond woos a mob boss' daughter and goes undercover to uncover the true reason for Ernst Stavro Blofeld's allergy research in the Swiss Alps involving beautiful women from around the world.

This movie takes place in Heroland invented by Ururu where heroes and heroines can meet, Heroland is in trouble and they go to Gaogao-San in the Dokodemo Sidecar to save it from the robot threatening the land.
An American agent disappears after a scuba diving reconnaissance mission in Corsica. The Secret Service sends agent code name OSS 117 to investigate.
Plot kept under wraps.
Jason returns home to study for the bar exam, but instead finds that his purpose in life was not what he'd originally thought.
A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extraterrestrial interactions on Earth.

A defense lawyer witnesses the murder of a federal informant by Ricco's hit squad. He is caught in the middle as he attempts to rescue a beautiful young woman from Ricco's hit men. They must expose the crime boss's secrets to the world.

Ae-shim works as a waitress at a truck stop and lives near the highway with her abusive lvoer, Yun Gu. One day a vagabond stops by the diner and seduces Ae-shim. Together they come up with a plan to murder Yun Gu and run off with his money.
A talking purple dinosaur leads a group of children on a hunt for a large missing egg.
A tough, hard-driving business tycoon suffers a broken leg and is left to die in the desert by his scheming wife and her greedy lover.
Laddo, a vibrant girl from Punjab, bumps into Harry, a pessimist on the streets of London. In an unexpected twist of events, Laddo and Harry are forced to stay together.

A website is seemingly killing every woman who views it within fifteen days. While investigating the phenomenon, a female reporter begins an investigation that leads to the discovery of the site known only as The White Room.
An owner of an upscale flower shop enjoys his single life and one day, a married customer approaches the shop owner to confess her feelings for him.
The adventures of young Santa Claus begin.
Plot details are being kept under wraps.

Raj uses his superpower to communicate with the dead and fulfill their unfinished desires. During one such mission, he stumbles upon Simran's spirit and decides to avenge her murder, until the story takes a unexpected turn.
A contemporary remake of the 1978 psychological thriller "Magic" starring Anthony Hopkins and directed by Richard Attenborough.
The final days of madness for Detroit's biggest crime boss.

On their way to find Paris, Sture the dog (Hasse Alfredsson) and his friend Picasso end up on a hotel in the middle of nowhere. Along with Miss Mops, Sture tries to sniff out who is causing all the strange events of the hotel.
A police inspector and a London returned crime journalist, amongst others, are baffled by a modern day Robin Hood, who robs the rich and distributes the wealth amongst the poor and needy.
SILSILA is a love story, thwarted by society's demands, which reappears as adultery but can it survive in the face of society?
When a villain named "the Shoot" terrorizes the constituents of Albanian country, which he rules. Heroic Kara Ben Nemsi (Lex Barker), and his sidekick are the only ones who can stop him

Piet Piraat sails for provisions to Como port which is abandoned of account of a sea monster. Defeating one is the last requirement for his greatest ambition, joining the braves Pirates club. He is up for the challenge..
When a boy learns that a beloved killer whale is to be killed by the aquarium owners, the boy risks everything to free the whale.

movie_name: Hercules in the Valley of Woe
synopsis: Two boxing promoters travel via time machine back to the days of Hercules, who must save them from Genghis Khan and the Mongol Horde.
The seniors return to Earth to visit their relatives. Will they all decide to go back to the planet where no one grows old, or will they be tempted to stay back on Earth?
With only six months left of his sentence, inmate Frank Leone is transferred from a minimum security prison to a maximum security prison by a vindictive warden.
Set in the year 2218 in a post nuclear war New York. The city has changed. It's borough vs borough as six individuals try to do good in a city that regularly sees chaos.
A toon-hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.
Eve is a jungle girl brought up by apes. She is captured with a number of apes by a mad scientist, conducting mind control experiments on them. Eventually she is liberated by a young explorer.
Chulbul Pandey invites a fresh trouble when he kills the brother of a notorious politician and the former swears to wreak havoc in his life.
A man who can not laugh gets help by a psychiatrist.

Hundreds of years after a nuclear war, the last vestiges of humanity, separated into bitter factions, begin to collapse. One man stumbles upon never before seen technology that could be their last chance to find help, hope and a new home.
In the depths of the amazon jungle lies a Sacred Elixir kept by the Jaguars - its wisdom has been passed down to the forest people throughout generations.
A story of an old man and a dog.

movie_name: The Bad Lieutenant: Port of Call - New Orleans
synopsis: Terence McDonagh is a drug- and gambling-addled detective in post-Katrina New Orleans investigating the killing of five Senegalese immigrants.
Distributors and their various relationships with independent film-makers.
Holmes is recruited to escort the heir to a European throne safely back to his homeland after his father's assassination.
In medieval France, some villagers challenge a man's claim of identity when he (as he says) returns home from some time in the army.
When Syamsul sees his family die at the hands of the diabolical Topeng (Mask), he amasses a team of powerful Silat warriors to destroy his siege in Api city.

movie_name: Spy Kids 4: All the Time in the World
synopsis: A retired spy is called back into action, and to bond with her new step-children, she invites them along for the adventure to stop the evil Timekeeper from taking over the world.

After the crew of the Enterprise find an unstoppable force of terror from within their own organization, Captain Kirk leads a manhunt to a war-zone world to capture a one-man weapon of mass destruction.
The funny misadventures of a taxi lady whose life is turned around when her father passes away and has to deal with life and it's lunatics without his advice.
A serial killer who murders women with his snake finds the secret of a bank theft and blackmails the bandits.
In 1992, a young man who works at a video store takes shelter in it (along with his friends and family) during a "possible" zombie invasion.

Three 6th grade boys ditch school and embark on an epic journey while carrying accidentally stolen drugs, being hunted by teenage girls, and trying to make their way home in time for a long-awaited party.

A farm girl nurses a wounded reindeer she believes is one of Santa's, hoping to bring it back to health in time for Christmas. Her holiday spirit inspires those around her, something her disheartened father is having trouble understanding.
The youngest one of the Seven Fairies falls in love with a poor decent young man named Dong Yong, but the love between a mortal and a fairy is not allowed by the laws of God in heaven.

movie_name: The Seven Tasks of Ali Baba
synopsis: A wizard summons Ali Baba to transport a sacred crown to a nearby country. An evil ruler has taken over the land, and the crown is needed to free the people from his influence.

A demon wreaks havoc on a Atlanta. Lilith, Adam's first wife according to Jewish mysticism, is expelled from the Garden of Eden because of her refusal to obey Adam, the man. She returns with vengeance against Man, and his offspring.
A sixty-five year-old Sheriff from a small town in Wisconsin has to sabotage his subordinate friend's murder case to save his daughter's life.
A family portrait in Tuscany. Leonardo and Riccardo fight to defend what they really love - Leonardo is looking for freedom and Riccardo for family.

Bianca is a failed painter, Zeno is a depressed underworld boss. They are brothers. In a desperate attempt to change their existence, they will be swept away by a spiral of violence that will lead them to the brink of self-destruction.
A photographer is haunted by nightmares of his mother's murder at the hands of a werewolf-type creature, but soon realizes it's more than just his memories that are rising to the surface.

A veteran detective risks his life and career to investigate the brutal murder of a teenage boy from his past. The investigation leads the detective down a winding path of twists and turns only for him to discover a disturbing truth.

Tells the story of a dysfunctional family, the Tarantulas, and the murder of on of the family members, Buster, who had dirt on everybody. Bruno's son, Tommy, calls in his detective cousin, Jim, to solve the murder. What Jim finds is corruption, betrayal, and fowl play.
After making a bet, Steve strands himself on uninhabited island.

Alisa Freyndlikh and Andrey Podoshian star in this enchanting retelling of Hans Christian Andersen's classic fairy tale. When a handsome prince tries to find his princess bride, he searches high and low, only to discover love at his doorstep.

Preston Tylk is an ordinary guy living in Seattle. When he discovers that his wife, Emily, whom he adores, is having an affair, he is devastated. Storming out of the house, he returns later only to find her brutally murdered.
A crew decides one of their own must pay as the woman he brutally attacked, fights to keep her mind, her life and her marriage together.

When people begin mysteriously disappearing into the water of a hydrotherapy clinic, a talented inspector is assigned the case for investigation, and in turn learns the true horrors of her own identity.
Spider-Man returns to face his greatest challenge yet as he faces off against The Vulture.

Sara -a young refugee on the run- befriends a young lost dragon, and teams up with a nerd and do battle with school administrators, the police, and gangs of bullies as their attempt to return the dragon becomes the adventure of a lifetime.
It tells creature born from a combination of vampires and demons.
The police are on the trail of a serial killer, but with the victims being fellow officers, will they be able to catch the killer and solve the case in time?
The evil witch Erla makes life difficult for Hui Buh and his niece, the little witch Ophelia. After her mother is captured, she seeks Hui Buh's help with a valuable book of spells.
By her mother, Kila was entrusted to her grandfather who lived in the village. She then meets her old friend and involved in an unexpected adventure.
Azli, Mazlan, and Wahid's behaviour forces their superiors to enrol them to a motivational camp run by Ikatan Relawan Malaysia (RELA). The aim is to help them to change their perspectives in life
While attending a school for diplomats' daughters, the teen-aged daughter of the American ambassador uses her access to various embassies to engage in espionage.
They first met at an alumni event. The first meeting was very memorable for the dreamer Ann and the mysterious Geez.
The next chapter in the cult classic franchise.
The story will focus on Kung Fury's universe with no real connection to the short movie other than the lead character.
Reunited friends find themselves the chief suspects of a murder mystery that seems eerily similar to a play they performed in high school.
An ex-Disney animator must to finish a silent film script in order to save his soul.
A marital conflict comes to court and becomes public comment.

Thomas and Bea are now married and living with Peter and his rabbit family. Bored of life in the garden, Peter goes to the big city, where he meets shady characters and ends up creating chaos for the whole family.
A young artist ventures to the South to find himself and unleashes a catastrophic turn of events past and future.
SEND HER MY LOVE is a noir thriller about a detective who plunges deep into a mind-warping mystery of sex, drugs and nano-technology when hired to find a beguiling woman.
Lovable psychopath Mildred Moyer doesn't take kindly to her back-alley plastic surgery operation getting botched and unleashes vengeance on everyone from her past who tormented her about her looks.
Man and Yee met and fell in love with each other more than ten years ago, but they broke up because of their youth and arrogance. When they met again after many years, Man was obsessed with Yee.
Stay out if you want to stay alive!
A semi-fictionalized account of the life of Mata Hari, an exotic dancer who was accused of spying for Germany during World War I.
A motley crew robs a bank.
Adventure drama during WW2 in Italy where a mixed group of people get trapped inside a cave after a bomb raid. But can they co-operate? And will they survive?

The police are pursuing a man wanted for murder. If the man is arrested his daughter will be placed in foster care. To stay free they escape into the wilderness. Faro refers to a Portuguese city that the father once visited.
Detective double investigates case of beautiful woman murdered along with lover.
A group of friends that debunk monster myths online find themselves fighting for their lives when it turns out Manalligators live.

Five young men struggle for success, power, fame, love and sex in 'Los Scandalous', armed with the 'Laws,' a step-by-step guide to get any man what he wants. In life you have to know the laws. You have to have a MOUTHPIECE.

El Beat is a cross-platform experience, telling the story of Benkos Biohó, enslaved African and founder of the first free town in the Americas. It is a tribute to the African diaspora and the Black Power of Latin America.
Two twin brothers - one takes life, another saves lives. When one brother is murdered, the other is forced by a corrupt D.E.A. agent to take his place.
The heir to a family fortune discovers that a curse has been placed on it, put there centuries before by a band of samurai warriors.

Transfer student Mizuki is bullied viciously by her classmates. Nevertheless, she is always able to keep her composure. Kirie, who is also tormented, is interested in Mizuki and longs for her. The two become very close, insanity ensues.
A movie star enlists a parking valet at a Beverly Hills restaurant to pose as her lover to cover for her relationship with a married man.

movie_name: Ether Wars: Return of the Fallen
synopsis: A young astrobiologist at the center of an experiment to sustain alien life begins to question if Earth is his original home.
A woman with a mysterious illness is forced into action when a group of terrorists attempt to hijack a transatlantic overnight flight.
An estranged son has one last chance of reconciling with his deceased eccentric inventor father when he finds that his dad uploaded his mind to an electro-mechanical computer before his death.
Love blossoms into marriage for Siva and Sruthi, but Siva is jobless and his efforts at trying to find a job go unnoticed by Sruthi, which leads to complications in their relationship.
A young man Jindrich goes looking for a princess only to find a girl in the country mill.
Inhaling a hallucinogenic drug, our anti-hero Paul becomes obsessed with a woman who appears to be an exact double of his ex-wife. But he soon finds himself embroiled in a criminal conspiracy.

After Bobby and his best friend Kevin are kidnapped and taken to a strange house in the middle of nowhere, Bobby manages to escape. But then he hears Kevin's screams for help and realizes he can't leave his friend behind.
The daughter of a formerly wealthy man tries to get a job singing on a radio show, but gets involved in a feud and murder.

Mi's dad runs a small gas store and she helps daily work in it. Mi makes a vow of marrying a rich man when a shooting star streaks across the sky. She tries her best to buy a first-class air ticket in order to meet someone rich.
Follows dangerous criminals on a cargo ship who are transported from the Philippines to South Korea, as they unleash a sinister force after an escape attempt leads to a riot.
An old gallero educates his daughters as boys and in a palenque his compadre kills him, but they swear revenge.
In the eighteenth century, a vampire escapes from the freak show, in which she once participated, and teams up with a group of vampire slayers to kill the man who raped her mother.
An elite unit of the LA County Sheriff's Dept. and the state's most successful bank robbery crew clash as the outlaws plan a seemingly impossible heist on the Federal Reserve Bank.
While shooting a documentary to expose the lies of alien abductees, a provocative filmmaker and his crew encounter a young woman with a dark secret who leads them to uncover a disturbing truth.
Sam Alex, a drunkard ex-cop, is forced to investigate a series of murders which are committed in the same pattern. His search leads to a serial killer, and something more than what he expected.

Tells the story of a family that embarks on a Northern Michigan camping trip. While hunting, the family unexpectedly interacts with struggling city travelers due to a mysterious emergency evacuation of the southern cities.

Based on true fact and event.

movie_name: A Nightmare on Elm Street 5: The Dream Child
synopsis: The pregnant Alice finds Freddy Krueger striking through the sleeping mind of her unborn child, hoping to be reborn into the real world.

Following an Electromagnetic Pulse war, that has left America ravaged and lawless, a grieving mother teams up with a jaded bounty hunter to bring the thieving and murderous Llewelyn Gang to justice after the death of her son.
Mercenaries seize control of a remote resort hotel during a wedding and it's up to the best man, the groom and their drunken best friend to stop the terrorists and save the hostages.
A boxer-turned-getaway driver must act quickly when his partner is killed in a heist that's gone awry and he's left with a bag full of cash.
A movie executive is framed for the murder of his beautiful promiscuous leading lady by her jealous, estranged husband.
Following the death of her father, Alice (Ruth Wilson) returns to her home village for the first time in 15 years, to claim the tenancy to the family farm she believes is rightfully hers.
An Internet-addicted prep-school student captures on video camera the drug overdose of two girls.
Young man loses his mother father and sister in a terrorist blast at the local temple. His story is one of revenge.
"Two for Danger" is a 1940 British crime film directed by George King and starring Barry K. Barnes, Greta Gynt, Ian McLean, and Gordon McLeod.
A drunken, abusive tavern-keeper's adulterous wife uses the backward son of a rigid, puritanical pharmacist who makes his entire family miserable.
Traveling to Venice to investigate his father's mysterious death, famous archaeologist and diver David (Stephen Baldwin) unearths a killer secret that lies beneath the Venetian waters.

Two brothers can no longer afford to keep their father in an institution, they take him to their old family home to settled back in. But old habits die hard, and the former torturer can't help but act according to his nature.
A long journey through the fears and hopes of a newbie mother since a terrible and unexpected event that will help her deepen and face their darkest secrets.
A student at a private school uses his connections to establish a drug trafficking network there.

The true story of a gifted Christian woman who escapes persecution in Pakistan and after receiving a prophetic dream of a deadly attack on a church there, learns to use her spiritual gifts to save lives.
An enthusiastic and diligent journalist follows a set of serial murders that rocks her city. She tries to solve the crime not knowing that the murderer could be very close to home.
What started out as a friendly ride to the airport turns deadly for a young woman who must outwit her murderous driver to survive the night.

movie_name: Teen Titans GO! To the Movies
synopsis: A villain's maniacal plan for world domination sidetracks five teenage superheroes who dream of Hollywood stardom.
Dillion Godwin is a 17 year old who works night shifts for a convenience store. He is picked up by a mysterious man and they trek through multiple dimensions, attempting to defeat a universal threat.

Newly arrived in a Western city, Kansan Gloria Dell waits at the train station to meet Larry Goodrich, the fiance' she has corresponded with, but never met. When he doesn't arrive, Mrs. ...                See full synopsis »
A maid is kidnapped and scratches a message onto D.C. the cat's collar and when his owner Patti discovers this, she plays amateur detective with the help of D.C. to try to find the culprits.
After her supposed death, a young woman returns as the son of her noble family to precede the family's prestigious company, with a demon at her side to avenge her parent's murder.
The military space cruiser Venom investigates a derelict freighter ship that is carrying a weapon that will change the course of man's destiny.

2142: Pollution and climate change wiped out most of Earth's population. Ecoban city is built to withstand this. Suppression results in revolt. A childhood couple find each other as adults on opposing sides.
The investigation of a mysterious serial-killer in a mountain village, set in Norway in the mid 1300s.
The superhero Kronos, from a distant galaxy, tangles with the mad scientist Dr. Gulik over the fate of mankind.

A husband and wife, whose marriage is built on shifting sand, find themselves imprisoned by a sadistic killer - forced to make choices that will ultimately determine their family's survival or demise.
Charlie Brown makes his way to the national spelling bee finals.
A thumb drive from the dark web reveals disturbing footage documenting three American filmmakers on a script writing trip to rural Quebec.
A 16-year-old learns to fly an airplane the hard way and becomes Captain of her life.
Two brothers fight each other for control of 1950s Cuba as a lurking guerrilla army closes in on Havana.
Todd, a haunted young man, runs from the past as he struggles to protect the innocence of Benny, his mute younger brother, in a post apocalyptic world where all the adults have turned into Zombies.

A nasty comedian's assistant has allergy induced sneezes, giving problems at work, et cetera. He accepts weekly injections after seeing the cute nurse. After a dozen injections, he finally asks her out.
A parasitic creature able to inhabit and manipulate people hunts the last person on Earth who knows of the creature's existence.
A series of animated shorts inspired by the 1981 cult-favorite film.
For inspector Baroni,Monsieur Morlaix is the main suspect who might have killed his wife.
Aaru, henchmen of Nathan who seeks revenge when Nathan betrayed him by killing his friends for personal profit.
Dahari treated Fariman's youngest son with suspicion that Fariman was not his real son but that his wife had an affair with a corporate member.

Three friends film themselves attempting to stay awake in a cabin for an entire week straight. As they expectedly begin to hallucinate, they realize that their "hallucinations" are showing up on camera.
An aging widow from New York City follows her daughter to Los Angeles in hopes of starting a new life after her husband passes away.

movie_name: The Secret Art of Human Flight
synopsis: In the wake of a tragedy, a grieving widower turns to a mysterious self help book from the dark web written by an eccentric guru, which promises to unlock the power to fly.
A little boy wishes to be taller in order to be noticed by the others. Then he comes across a magical flute.
A man must unravel the mystery of his own past to find his way back to 1989 and save his trapped teenage daughter from a bullying accident that is destined to claim her life.

Watanuki has a special ability to see ayakashi. One day, he is led by a butterfly to a mysterious store. There, he meets the owner of the store Yuuko. She tells him that she will grant him a wish for his most precious thing.
Heartbreak Hotel follows a night of 6 strangers who get trapped in a bar, the series of events that occur, and the range of emotions they experience.

A psychological thriller about two girls. Aubrey, whose life and mind is falling apart and Rachel, whose life seems to skip like a CD player. As the two clash and begin to intertwine they learn each other's fate is in the other's hand.
Hector Flector fights his way through through the mists of crime to solve a double murder.
Robin, one year out of law school with one trial, gets set up with an unwinnable murder case for having forced his law firm to make him partner with unethical behavior, tarnishing the firm.
Four beautiful women move to an old house, inherited by the aunt of one of them, and witness strange things.
A true-blue whodunnit.
A woman is tormented by strange dreams of astronauts on the moon. She visits a deserted seaside town whose inhabitants know her although she does not know them.
In early 1900s England, a maid tries to blackmail her master into romancing her when she discovers he murdered his wife.
An unassuming addict inherits nocuous information that threatens to overthrow the powerful corporation that he now works for as an entry-level AI engineer.
The adventure of Cutie Honey, a super heroine who can transform into anything using her necklace to switch on and say "Honey Flash!".
An idealistic is enlisted by a government force to aid in the escalating war against blood minerals at the border area between two nations
A lonely man becomes a psychotic killer by imitating famous killers from the past.
"Maarey kadhaley maarchey kadhaney- is a comedy thriller with a social message. It follows with the journey of three friends who are stuck in a criminal case
A notorious international crime group chases after a young chivalrous man, his mentor's daughter, and a famous archaeologist, who possess a map leading to ancient treasure.

A century after the Wicked Witch, the Emerald City is at the mercy of a once-revered hero, and salvation comes from the wrench of young Victoria Wright. Rediscover old friends and meet new heroes in this new tale set in the Land of Oz.
There is always love somewhere in you.
Dark fairy-tale about a demonic doctor who abducts a beautiful opera singer with designs on transforming her into a mechanical nightingale.

Murder and trouble hit Veum when he meets up with classmates in the rock-band Camp, when he resumes contact with a former flame Rebecca, now the wife of his buddy. A Varg Veum mystery by best-selling crime novelist Gunnar Staalesen.

movie_name: The Strange Love of Martha Ivers
synopsis: A man is reunited with his childhood friend and her husband, who believe he knows the truth about the death of her rich aunt years earlier.
OSS 177 goes on holiday to Brazil, but is called into action when he finds himself being stalked by a double.
A group of friends are walled up in they're own house during a zombie apocalypse. Low on weaponry, the team must bond together, and escape the house for any help they can get.
A surreal adaptation of Moby Dick. Lake, obsessed with finding the ultimate truth, is led down a path into the horrifying depths of his own subconscious.
The young attendees of a space camp find themselves in space for real when their shuttle is accidentally launched into orbit.
007 is assigned to track and find out who killed Dimitri and CIA Agent Jennie Weldon. Q helps Bond with the location and the name of the man that killed them.
Romantic comedy about the complexities of interracial dating between a Chinese man and American woman
An avenging cop seeks out his brother's killer and falls for the daughter of a businessman who is involved in a money-deal with his father.
This jungle adventure is comprised of two episodes from the 1966-69 TV show.
A brother and sister learn to use their martial arts to protect the ocean they love.
A wannabe businesswoman and a happy-go-lucky guy meet each other during an arranged marriage blind date but eventually team up to start a food truck on their own.
An analog horror about the investigation of people disappearing in Fawn Circle, Minnesota in January of 1983.

While 18th century London becomes embroiled in the religious fight between Protestants and Catholics, a violent and mysterious stranger attaches himself to a feeble-minded boy and his poor, distressed mother.
After returning home from prison, a man reunites with his old heist team to pull off a job they had planned years before, meanwhile they have to avoid drug dealers, cops and corrupt lawmen.
The film tells the story of a near future in which the earth is irreversibly sandy, as human emissions and rubbish exceed its carrying capacity.
After his negligence causes an innocent woman to go to jail, a lawyer and his colleagues work to clear her name.

Ritsa follows the story line of three different characters in different time lines, each within their own separate path. Driven by love, they make decisions that disturb their lives. Will love put their lives right back on track?
Friends Radha and Chelladurai lead a carefree life. When Radha accidentally kills Chelladurai's brother-in-law, it turns them bitter foes, and a cunning man uses their enmity to his benefits.
Yuki MR is an upbeat mix of bullet-hell in Mixed Reality. Take your favorite toy in your hand to defeat evil creatures in a multidimensional universe.
Before boxes are unpacked in their new home, newlyweds Tim and Emily, find themselves playing a very creepy game of hide and seek with a vengeful spirit.

A disturbed telepathic man is unable to fully control his ability to transmit his dreams and visions into the minds of the people around him, or even influence reality. A female therapist tries to help him, but his mother gets in the way.

Black Cougar is a mercenary who is being paid a huge sum of money by an unknown person to recover a top secret file. Realising the enormity and complexity of the task, he looks for a group of experts to help him out.

Two estranged sisters travel through rural Texas to spread their father's remains, but afflicted by childhoods plagued from domestic violence, their journey toward acceptance and forgiveness is threatened by the kindness of a stranger
A lonely stripper. A lonely vampire. 1 night that will change them forever.
Travis, Arliss, and Lisbeth are captured by Apaches while Old Yeller's son, Sam, tracks their trail.

movie_name: Macross FB 7: Ore no Uta o Kike!
synopsis: Macross Frontier characters receive vintage VHS tapes delivered by a strange bird with the original Macross 7 episodes and watch them together, discovering the story behind the Sound Force and Nekki Basara.
A young woman searches for the lost sword of D'Artagnan after her grandfather has an accident.
A top ranking ark angel gets assigned to a human that has a major task to accomplish on earth.
Moe Berg, a lawyer, a linguist, a baseball player, a spy.
When the leader of a small rebel faction get arrested (and then rescued) by his own people, it will create a war in the galaxy that nobody was expecting
The story of a young prince named Prathap who dreams of marrying a Devakanya.

Petar is a retired detective and all he has left is his daughter Iskra. His pensioner's days are interrupted when Iskra disappears. The pursuit to find Iskra begins and the investigation takes Petar back to his past..

When unworldly Leopold hears that his father will soon die, he has to leave his safe life and go on a road trip to Lourdes, to ask for a miracle. When he meets Lola, everything becomes even more complicated.
What if the Old Gods did exist and they decide to wake up? (T.V. Pilot for Series Celestial Moon)
When strange things begin turning up in local waters after a major flood, Professor Wilmarth becomes the key player in uncovering the truth about the bizarre sightings.
A film in six episodes, connected by the same four actresses, full of various subplots that play with narrative and different cinematic genres , everything structured in an unusual way.
A resolute intervention by Mortensen and Jensen prevents a larger drama in the small provincial village of Rønneby.
An alien life form is on vacation inside a human body and wants to stay human without leaving planet earth.
A compilation of Dragon Ball Z Movies 10 and 11 and released theatrically in the Philippines.

Ah Lang (Bruce Leung Siu-Lung) is the brawn before brains type. His dad (Ku Feng) prefers a quiet life. Ah Lang's attitude costs his dad and friend their lives. Ah Lang must find a patient teacher who'll train him so he can exact revenge.
Could a delusional schizophrenic be the only hope to save a world destined for doom? Take a journey through time to discover just how deranged the human mind truly is.
Freud's essay on anxiety, guilt, and shame, perfectly fits on this middle class Indian housewife, who's guilt when turns into shame, creates a monster which is uncontrollable .
The story of Ronald DeFeo, whose mass murder spree in 1974 spawned the legend of the Amityville haunted house.
British officers battle bandits and guerrillas in India.
A coming of age story involving young love and a mysterious music, coming from a crystal radio left as a memento by an absent father, that leads a young heroine deep into a hidden world.

A journalist returns home after the death of her father and discovers a cassette tape describing mysterious lights appearing in the skies of West Texas. She sets out on a cross-state road trip to discover the truth.
An apprentice witch, three kids and a cynical magician conman search for the missing component to a magic spell to be used in the defense of Britain in World War II.
Alice, a fiery FBI agent, must journey into Wonderland to rescue two kidnapped girls from the infamous King of Hearts.
When the Devil comes to collect the soul of a local farmer, the town's badass steps in and challenges him to a drag race.

movie_name: Un sentimiento honesto en el calabozo del olvido
synopsis: A biologist with a particular interest in arachnids gets involved in some unfinished business left behind by her dead mother. This leads her to face unbelievable circumstances that center around the banana mafia.

Melanie has just gained consciousness to discover that she is being held hostage by the Walker family so they can harvest her special skin in order to create a breakthrough skin care cream, and bloom the business; also she's not alone..
An ordinary Soviet building manager, living in the 20th century, looks like Tsar of All Rus' - Ivan IV the Terrible (1530 - 1584). He'd never known this, until his neighbor created a time machine.
The four children of a married couple come up with a plan to prevent their father from leaving with another woman.
Following American reporter Stephen Fitzgerald from Ireland to New York, a grateful leprechaun acts as the newsman's servant and conscience.

The Green Oak Project is the 1st British superhero series of it's kind. It's a cross between Misfits meets Avengers. Characters ranging from human born superheroes, aliens and agents to name but a few.
A young naive reporter romances a female reporter who is quietly organizing a journalist union and joins her cause.
Facing divorce, a married couple tries to give it one last shot - and find their bodies swapped. Will the magical (or cursed) switch bring them out of their slump?

Two Americans on a hunting trip in Scotland become lost. They encounter a small village, not on the map, called Brigadoon, in which people harbor a mysterious secret, and behave as if they were still living two hundred years in the past.
A grieving mother with nothing left to lose tries to track down the person responsible for selling her daughter the drugs that killed her.
The adventurous journey of the prince Yashodhavardhana to save Padmavathi from a wicked wizard and also to bring back his father's vision.

movie_name: The Extraordinary Adventures of Saturnino Farandola
synopsis: Episode 2: "Zingo and the White Elephant" Zingo and his wife, Sari, who are returning from their adventures in Mexico, when Zingo learns from his newspaper that the Royal Elephant of Siam ...                See full synopsis »
Scientists investigate mysterious disappearances at a research base where it has been reported a savage creature was spotted.

Lauren and Ned are engaged, they are in love, and they have just ten days to find Lauren's mother who has gone AWOL somewhere in the remote far north of Australia, reunite her parents and pull off their dream wedding.
A radio broadcaster, his quaking manservant and an heiress investigate the mystery of a haunted castle in Cuba.
A disfigured watch-maker with a grudge against society embarks on a life of crime.

A father and son are shipwrecked on a remote island where they are caught up in a trophy hunt held by its mysterious owner, a merciless man who uses the land as an elite hunting preserve for stalking the most dangerous game of all: human.

Gaby is a neurotic single mother who is living a content yet incomplete life. Sean is a hectic single dad known to lose himself to his work. It's difficult enough for them to get together, but the real test is how they stay together.
Introverted Gerona student Nacho meets two delinquents from the city's Chinatown and gets caught up in a summer onslaught of burglaries and hold ups that will change his life.
Cuchulainn, the greatest hero in Irish mythology, powerful enough to face the mighty Thor - journeys from boy to warrior - fear to courage. ©
Margaret Hamilton (Elizabeth Allan) faces trial by Coroner's Court, an archaic British institution where justice can't be guaranteed.
While awaiting execution for murder, Baron Victor Frankenstein tells the story of a creature he built and brought to life - only for it to behave not as he intended.
An all-too-real film on the country's current war on drugs, the film tackles the angle of the family members and community of addicts and pushers.
During the Sino-Japanese War, a young army nurse gives sympathy to her patients and falls in love with an impotent doctor who's addicted to morphine.
A Bachelorette weekend goes awry when the girls are robbed, stranded, and forced to take shelter in a deserted Mexican resort that is haunted by the unspeakable atrocities of past.
An astronaut prepares for a one-year mission aboard the International Space Station.
A sinister App pays its users for violent acts with irrevocable consequences.
A life changing journey of a meek man, leaving his family in the City of Destruction, Graceless must make it to the Celestial City.

Two young knights in love with a princess are forced to prove who is the most deserving of her love by daring to enter the forest of darkness and slay a dragon that has captured her parents, the king and the queen.

movie_name: The Return of the Jonsson League
synopsis: Criminal trio strike at furniture store, discover a secret network for shipping computers to the Soviet Union.

movie_name: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe
synopsis: Four kids travel through a wardrobe to the land of Narnia and learn of their destiny to free it with the guidance of a mystical lion.

Eight-year old Dominique has a name-day. Her parents have a gift for her, but only give it to her in the evening, when everybody has come home from work. Then she darts out, where her girlfriends are already waiting for her.
After losing his father and uncle in plane crashes, Sean decides to fulfill his uncle's dream of extracting jade from the mountains. With a custom made plane, Sean sets out for his impossible quest.
Tarzan and Jane go to New York to rescue Boy after he is kidnapped into a circus.
It's not a story of a man or his daily life, but it is about how he dreams his day, without leaving his deckchair, waiting for his wife to have a breakfast together.
A brutal murder from a past life haunts a young, suicidal women.
They have dreams too. Try to understand. They are not like you but that is not really any threat to you. If you lived in space the situation would change you. Perhaps then, it would make sense.

Juan is a loser. He lives in a rented house without money nor a job...till he finds Antonio, an old friend who has become in a drug dealer. Taking part in a fiddle, Juan will steal a suitcase for Antonio, and his life will suffer a twist.
After a night of drunken exploits, Allison, Harris, and Kira are chased and terrorized by the ghosts of a child pyromaniac, an ax murderer, and a rapist.
"The Mesmerist" is a twisted black comedy about a doctor who convinces a dying man's family to allow him to put the man in a trance and what happens when he descends into the after-world

When Jake, a security guard in a small hotel, inadvertently helps out a beautiful burglar, he becomes a primary suspect and is quickly fired. Jake decides to track down the burglar himself and retrieve the stolen property.

Meredith, a mythical siren, was condemned to live in a rapidly aging body after breaking the rules of the ocean by saving a drowning child. When the boy returns 15 years later, the two are irresistibly drawn into a dangerous relationship.
Plot undisclosed. Described as an action-thriller with sci-fi elements.
A brave prince wants to win the heart of a stubborn princess by finding the singing, ringing tree for her.
A young scholar spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He doesn't believe in the rumors, but after running into a Taoist swordsman, he meets a beautiful lady ghost.

movie_name: The Fantastic Journey of Margot & Marguerite
synopsis: Marguerite and Margot are both 12 years old, each with their family, friends, problems, and era. Because one lives in 1942 and the other in 2020. But then a mysterious magic trunk transports them each to the time of the other
Two tribes of dimwitted cavemen prepare for war against each other.
At the end of their college school year five girls decide not to go home but instead rent a house in town and thus the high-jinks then ensue.

Join Butterball the turkey and Missy the Dodo as they come to the rescue of Thanksgiving and embark on an unforgettable, clock-racing countdown to a holiday dinner. It's a Thanksgiving Movie for the ages.
Based on true stories from the book "#1 Son and Other Stories" written by Michael Jason Marcus.
Village boy Thorfinn accompanies a group of Knights on a dangerous quest to end a werewolf invasion.
A reporter and a detective team up to solve the murder of a nightclub singer who had been involved in a divorce scandal.
A knight returning to Sweden after the Crusades seeks answers about life, death, and the existence of God as he plays chess against the Grim Reaper during the Black Plague.
A small-town doctor gets roped into helping a notorious bank robber.
A woman discovers she's pregnant on a trip to Italy with her fiancé, but becomes suspicious of his and his family's behavior when they find out.
A lawyer is forced to defend a guilty judge, while defending other innocent clients, and trying to find punishment for the guilty and provide justice for the innocent.

After an accidental explosion in the lab, its inventor slips in and out of dream-like hallucinations, realizing that he had given the formula to one of his colleagues, who he tries to stop before it is too late.
After a botched robbery escalates to homicide, a north Philly gun runner has to escape or outsmart the south Philly Italian mob as they close in for vengeance.
Yarina, the Daughter of sect leader Miro, embarks on a dangerous journey in a time of war.
The love story between a famous rock singer, Awie, and her lover Wati who is prevented by Wati's brother, Azman and Ziana who fall in love with Awie try to make difference with them.
A Japanese teenager with the ability to see ghosts gains a soul reaper's powers and begins his duties as a substitute soul reaper.
A fantasy action film that revolves around a man who loses his memory and subsequently wakes up in a new body every twelve hours.
A man goes to the drugstore to get his prescription filled and unknowingly has it replaced with a massive psychedelic hallucinogenic.
A new transfer student comes once again to a high school where violent fights among students is a way of life.
A futuristic, sensitive tale of adventure and confrontation when a 10 year old boy is accidentally kidnapped by a spaceship filled with a motley crew of space pirates.

movie_name: RiffTrax Live: Birdemic - Shock and Terror
synopsis: The Rifftrax guys riff the shockingly bad movie Birdemic: Shock and Terror
Sreedhar Prasad, a RAW officer, disguises himself to investigate a bomb blast that killed 30 college students. Soon, he befriends a police officer and uncovers disturbing details.
A Police Officer seeks a conman's help to solve a murder conspiracy.

Three lonely herdsmen starved of female companionship creates the girl of their dreams, from a broom, some straw and a few rags. The creation - Sennentuntschi, lives and breathe to cook, clean and look after the three.

As a deadly battle rages over Jigsaw's brutal legacy, a group of Jigsaw survivors gathers to seek the support of self-help guru and fellow survivor Bobby Dagen, a man whose own dark secrets unleash a new wave of terror.

Kevin, Sam and Rob are founding members of a theoretical group which pulls off heists. Leo, a gangster, blackmails them into pulling off a real multi-million dollar heist. Now it's up to them to get out alive.

When a young, ambitious market researcher finds out her boss is involved in the leaking of a scandalous Prime Minister speech, she decides to investigate the case to gain a position among the big-shots. Based on actual events.
This is RKO's first sound musical. It centers on a pair of vaudevillians who are quite close on and off the stage until a dashing millionaire comes around and begins wooing the female partner.

When the universe's highest-flying dogs warp into outer space, Skyfetcher and Spaceslobber get a call from canine headquarters. An unknown force is attacking unsuspecting planets, and it's up to them to root out the source of the trouble.
A pressure point in time has caused a clash of a woven universe. Making it a battle like no other in an effort to reset the time line once and for all.
Waterbed salesman Alvin consults a psychiatrist about his irresistibilty to women.

On the distant planet Axis, Kaena, a rebellious, high-spirited teenage girl, will defy the High Priest and her people's ancestral beliefs to take a perilous journey and discover what dark secrets lie beyond the clouds.
The restaurant team comes to grief and is forced to relocate to Paris, where Chef and Max face dangerous rivals. The team must feed the Presidents and overcome obstacles million à la française .
Two veteran mercenaries are pitted against each other in a Thai jungle only to join forces and eliminate the king pin that hired them to kill each other.
The life of private eye, Mort Madison, is spiraling downward, when a beguiling, slightly familiar woman hires him for his most unusual case.
It tells of a twin, separated at birth, one a mysterious young man named Sandino (played by Danilo Montes) who would transform into a monstrous hairy creature resembling a wolf man.
A samurai with a high skill in chess makes friends with Zatoichi, who finds that things become peculiar in his presence.
A glorious excursion in the realms of fantasy - magic - romance - laughter.

movie_name: Beyond Blue: An Unnerving Tale of a Demented Mind
synopsis: A man obsessed with his mother's homemade food and controlled by his inner demons. What he feels; thinks and what his actions lead him is 'BEYOND BLUE'
The fictional story of an advanced washing machine that's also a time-traveling machine. However, what it truly offers is conflicts and ironies upon its users.

movie_name: New York Will Eat You Alive
synopsis: A group of New Yorkers traveling the city to survive and discover the source of a monster apocalypse and zombie outbreak.

On the day Albert asked Ella's father for permission to marry, he vanished without a word. Years later, they meet by chance. Ella is determined to pick things up. Knowing Ella will ask why he left, Albert is unwilling to rekindle things.
Tirante the knight is as committed to fighting the Turks in Constantinople as he is to relieving Carmesina, the heiress to the Byzantine Empire, of her virginity.
A hapless loser assumes the identity of an amnesia victim without knowing that he is an assassin.
The plot is being kept under wraps.
Adventures of Sundaram to find Meenakshi who is in the heaven and to get back to the earth along with her again.

movie_name: I Still Know What You Did Last Summer
synopsis: The murderous fisherman with a hook is back to once again stalk the two surviving teens, Julie and Ray, who had left him for dead, as well as cause even more murder and mayhem, this time at a posh island resort.
The hero of this action-drama film single-handedly fights the dreaded gang that ties up their victims before robbing them.
The story of Wilbur Whateley and his attempt to bring into this world a vast, earth threatening entity.
Two detectives investigating a gang-related shooting find themselves targeted by both gang members and crooked cops.

Nanny McPhee arrives to help a harried young mother who is trying to run the family farm while her husband is away at war, though she uses her magic to teach the woman's children and their two spoiled cousins five new lessons.
An inhuman traveler sets out to kill the entire population of a small, desolate town over the course of a single night.
When a desperate father asks a gang of violent, high end criminals for help things spiral out of control.
Science fiction/fantasy set in Earth's future.
To find what happened to his fiancé Raaga, Rudra must unearth Raaga's neighbor's dark secrets.
Friedrich's boxing skills gets him in an elite Nazi high school in a castle in 1942. He enrolls against his dad's wish as it promises a brighter future. It's not what he expected.

movie_name: Myths and Legends: The New Alliance
synopsis: A group of teenagers open a portal where a malevolent god wants to dominate the world of humans.
The adventures of Chandrasena to marry Bhuvana Sundari.
A beautiful 17th-century witch returns to life to plague politician Wallace Wooley, descendant of her persecutor.

When their ship is sunk in the first world war, in the Indian ocean, 50 men have to cross infinite stretches of sea and desert, avoid enemies, find allies and finally make it home to Germany. A breathtaking real-live odyssey.
After being kidnapped, Kate Walker wakes to find herself trapped in a small chamber. She realizes she's not the only prisoner, as nineteen others share the same fate.
A young woman forced into nun-hood by her corrupt father teams up with an army of Muslims to destroy the convent and kill those who wronged her.
A group of friends and 3 siblings walk a disastrous path after an international illegal organisation OWL laid their eyes on them. Leichil Mafol is the final chapter of OWL series by Edwin Haorokcham.
Senator Stevens (Dennis Haskins) has trouble on his hands once Max London (Tom Sizemore) senses more to the murder of his daughter's friend committed by his son (Kris Reilly).

A controversial Spiritualist, phycologist, psychotherapist uses sacred passages from The Bible to heal her severely traumatised and sexually abused patients oblivious to the mass of religious haters she is accumulating and want her dead

Utah, 1985. A brilliant document forger's greatest scheme ignites the largest murder investigation in Utah's history, shatters the innocence of a community and rocks the Mormon Church to its foundation.

50 million miles from Earth, a small crew on a deep space mission of great importance begin to experience events that unleash unspeakable terror and simultaneous miracles as Heaven and Hell collide in the what we now call The Rift.
Three young guys spend a weekend together only to be interrupted by two undercover cops carrying a criminal that want to spend the night.

Two billion years ahead of us, a future race of humans finds itself on the verge of extinction. Almost all that is left in the world are lone and surreal monuments, beaming their message into the wilderness.

A selfish teenager, who blames Christmas for the death of his mother, wishes the holiday gone, but when his wish backfires, he races alongside a too-smart-for-her-age tom-boy to ensure Christmas is not gone forever.

movie_name: Nancy Drew and the Hidden Staircase
synopsis: A bit of an outsider struggling to fit into her new surroundings, Nancy and her pals set out to solve a mystery, make new friends, and establish their place in the community.

Since her father died, 16-year old Juliet and her stepmother and two stepbrothers struggle financially to keep their ranch. But Juliet has a secret that could keep the ranch open: her horse, Horatio, can talk.
The Faust story retold, with an aged alchemist accepting the gift of renewed youth from the devilish Mephistopheles.
The faith of five strangers is put to the test when they awake to find themselves in a mysterious place, with no idea of how they got there... and no way out.
Suffering from amnesia and struggling with repressed memories, a law school student engages in a dangerous proceeding against mobsters, putting her own life and her family's in jeopardy.
A writer looking for inspiration in Bali meets someone who leads her into the mysterious life story of the owner of an artistic villa.
An aging safe-cracker recently released from prison is asked to put his old skills to use and risk his freedom to save his son's life.
Takes place in a world where color and love do not exist. The people who live in this dreary world have nothing to live for and often end up killing themselves.

movie_name: Tomorrow I'll Wake Up and Scald Myself with Tea
synopsis: Jan is a decent, boring man, living a decent, boring life as a rocket designer. When his adventurous twin brother dies in a breakfast accident, Jan decides to impersonate him, unwittingly becoming a part of a Nazi time travel conspiracy.

Special Agent Lee is investigating a planned assault on a Congressmen who is tied to a series of GPS Spoofing cyber-attacks globally. The primary suspect is his junior agent Peng's ex, who was part of an underground hacker organization.
A resourceful British government agent seeks answers in a case involving the disappearance of a colleague and the disruption of the American space program.
Plot kept under wraps.
Set in a beautiful mansion against the stillness of night, Jon is forced to confront his past when his old friend Leo and a girl named Tricia pay him an unwelcome visit.
A young priest, struggling with his faith, is forced at gunpoint to perform an exorcism.
Drug dealers attack a group of troubled teens when their bus breaks down in the desert.
Piet and the crew find an old chest in the ocean. They try to open it but can't. But when day turns to night it opens revealing their worst nightmares.
Lonely widow Joyce rents out a room in her house and becomes dangerously obsessed with one of her guests.
A shooting accident in which a dutch police officer shoots a young Moroccan rapper creates polarization about the issue of racism among citizens of a multicultural society.
Red Riding Hood is training in the group of Sister Hoods, when she and the Wolf are called to examine the sudden mysterious disappearance of Hansel and Gretel.

Cheung Sung-bong is an officer of the Regional Crime Unit who worked in the front line for many years. His protege, Yau Kong-ngo, respects and looks up to him. However, fate conspires to pit them against each other.
Bettina Eriksen, manager of her Uncle Teodor's nursing home, is being framed for murder. With the help of 2 older ladies, Bettina sets out to find out the murderer's identity and motive.
Two parallel stories about two identical women; one living in Poland, the other in France. They don't know each other, but their lives are nevertheless profoundly connected.
An adaptation of the cult memoir of game show impresario Chuck Barris (Sam Rockwell), in which he purports to have been a C.I.A. hitman.

A Marine Biologist and her research team discover a radioactive ship washed ashore from the Japanese Tsunami, and find themselves in a fight for their lives against a mutant creature that could destroy the world.
Charlie's investigation of a phony psychic during the 1939 World Exposition on San Francisco's Treasure Island leads him to expose a suicide as murder.
In the midst of an age long rivalry between two warring towns, Jerome and Nadia hold on to their young love in a bid to restore peace and save their tribes from an ungrounded hate.

movie_name: How to Defeat Your Own Clone
synopsis: A guy tries to save mankind from a world populated with clones.

Shouichi, Ryo, and Hikawa have to combat a new wave of Unknowns, but are faced with another threat in the form of G4, another Battle Suit designed to fight the Unknowns, but is potentially stronger and is on the wrong side.
Octonauts must find a way to hold back hungry swarms of coral eating starfish to save a new friend's fragile reef home.
A federal agent with a unique set of skills is drafted to hunt down a terrorist who is out to start a civil war.
Jay, a bodyguard, races against time to save his boss, businessman Dato' Hashim and his daughter Nadi, against a hostile hostage situation.
Until Forever: The Michael Boyum Story is a powerful, true account of one young man's courageous battle with leukemia and his journey of faith.
Sonic and his friends race against the evil Dr. Robotnik in his quest to obtain the ancient powers of the Chaos Emeralds.
Two rival gangs of gangsters clash for dominance of a neighborhood.

Alesha Popovich has to catch Tugarin Zmey and bring back the stolen money money with the help of a talking Horse (which talks all the time and has an opinion on everything), a wise granny, a donkey and a beauty Lyubava.
Stage line agent investigates a series of robberies by taking the job of a deputy sheriff in a border Arizona town.
A security guard becomes embroiled in a battle to protect stem cell research, which can potentially cure cancer, from falling into the wrong hands.
A friendship with a top-secret robot turns a lonely girl's life into a thrilling adventure as they take on bullies, evil bots and a scheming madman.
Pinky violence.
19-year-old Mirta dies of drug overdose with her lover Robin. She then resuscitates alone and finds out that, in order to keep living, she must eat living humans.
An American family find themselves trapped in a magical Korean temple.
In France, an inspector solves the poisoning of his rich aunt.
A writer is kidnapped and surgically transformed into a human crash test dummy.
Hinata Hyuga's younger sister has been kidnapped, so Naruto must do what he can to save her.
A group of diversified individual must fight for survival through the African jungle.

This 1992 Japanese film tells the story of a scientist who sets out to create the new "super Adam and Eve", humans who cannot be controlled by their emotions. Of course, the end result it not exactly what the good doctor expects.
Two travel magazine writers meet at a beautiful island resort deep in the south Pacific researching article on a waterfront inn where tourists seem to go missing.
A sequel to the horror film Candyman (1992) that returns to the now-gentrified Chicago neighborhood where the legend began.
Evil ghost needs to suck the blood of 100 boys to gain eternal life, and she's up to 98.
Despite the increasing reality of military invasion, an American family struggles to keep up an illusion of normalcy.
The Sting's the thing in Macau where a former cop is reunited with his lost boys who were recruited into a cold kill MK Ultra unit.
A prodigal son returns to his hometown of Broken Cove - to find out who killed his brother.

Karen O'Connor, a young journalist known for her celebrity profiles, is consumed with discovering the truth behind a long-buried incident that affected the lives and careers of showbiz team Vince Collins and Lanny Morris.
A vampire rediscovers her humanity when a young couple fall out during a night on the town.

A boy goes to the city on the run, who gets to know an artist who has become a knife sharpener. The mother is found on this journey when a crying girl who has escaped her foster mother comes to the rescue.

movie_name: The Four Trees of Perdue Park
synopsis: Siblings, Josh and Claire are transported to another world after being involved in a devastating car crash. Together, they must dig deep and overcome personal obstacles as well as betrayal, lies, magic and love to make it home.

This movie contains four separate stories, each by a different director. They are all ghost stories, including themes such as death wishes, prison, and alcoholism. Good and evil women play prominent roles in the various tales.
Three children, holidaying in a small Cornish fishing village, become intrigued by the locals tales of an elusive witch.
A woman once possessed by a mysterious entity uncovers a shocking secret about her past and must face the demon that dwells inside of her.
After being the sole eyewitness of a fatal robbery as well as being struck by a passing bus, Lucy Church's life lies in the balance as the thieves wait for a chance to finish her off.
A woman who works in a dance hall attracts the attention of a bored but rich drunk, which causes friction with her boyfriend.
