After her sudden death a teenage girl finds her father has uploaded her mind to computer form. With a rival corporation wishing to capture her the girl is uploaded to her boyfriend's laptop.
A worn Dr. MacLean is once more called into action to fight the horror when people are completely taken over, mind and body by extraterrestrial beings.
A policeman white blood cell, with the help of a cold pill, must stop a deadly virus from destroying the human they live in, Frank.
A woman becomes a successful singer, but can't do as well in love.

Two simple lives are disrupted, resulting in inadvertent mystery, and a conflict of accidental villainy and circumstantial heroism. A fight against oppression and tyranny begins. In the end, each man is forced to chart a new course.
Ambi, a former stunt master decides to leave his routine and inactive family life and sets on an adventurous journey to search for his first love.
Sexy reporter Valerie March goes undercover inside Sugar State Woman's Prison to expose a prostitution ring run by the sleazy and seductive warden.
After a diamond heist goes fatally wrong, four criminals hide out in a disused building. As they wait for their boss to appear, they try to work out who is to blame.
A UFC fighter throws the fight of his life for the love of his life. After doing time he comes home to find his beloved Atchafalayan swamp is in disarray.
A man searches for his fiancée who vanished without a trace just before their wedding ceremony, only to discover the shocking identity of her.
A woman eager to have children consults a faith healer and is driven to extreme lengths to get to the bottom of her apparent infertility.
Vanesha had the chance to kill her boyfriend, Arya. Arya, however, did not recognize her and confess that they never had a relationship.
A man from the future, now trapped in the past, tries to make a life for himself, oblivious to the consequences he has set in motion.
A police officer tracks down a cyber criminal that hacks the passwords of innocent people in order to destroy their lives.
A photographer plagued by horrific nightmares in which he kills the young female models he shoots is shocked to discover that there is a serial killer in his city who is targeting attractive women.

Two of Compton's Finest, Det. Blackman and Det. Vargas are on the hunt for Columbian drug lord Silk Delgado who is flooding the streets of Compton's with the world's most deadliest drug called "The Devil's Breath".

A group of international criminals lead by Dr. Igor steal a large emerald from a Colombian mine and plan to sell it on the black market. Santo works with the Colombian authorities in an attempt to recover the emerald and to stop Dr. Igor.
Tantai, a smart hit man is hired to silence some powerful godfathers who are linked to a business case. One of the major targets is Lheemeng, a big drug agent who's feuding with village chief Baum.
Vinay and his nephew Pankaj are taken hostage by Xavier, a policeman. In order to save his nephew's life, Vinay must kill the external affairs minister of India.

movie_name: Jolly Roger: Massacre at Cutter's Cove
synopsis: A group of friends unleash a demonic Pirate from a treasure chest.
The story of a County Sheriff's investigation of a Texas serial killer.

Rita is the daughter of a family carrying and ancient blood with extraordinary abilities. Every 100 years they need to sacrifice to protect the people. The destiny brings her to a rocky vertical mountains where the monsters lives.

In the year of 2008, war and sickness have overtaken the planet. The deranged government declares single women a threat to the human race. Singles women are imprisoned. The corrupt warden is determined to keep the prisoners locked up.
A blind husband. An obsessed lover. And the missing body of a murdered wife...?
During the holidays, a recent widower and struggling children's book author makes one last push for his career while trying to take care of his two little girls.
After the head of the corpse of a teenager she's restoring is stolen, an embalmer encounters the organ black market and a necrotomic religious cult.
A Navajo police officer is mixed up in drug smuggling and murder on the reservation.
YAKUZA GANGSTER THRILLER
The singer of a band that struggles to succeed finally writes a song, inspired by his love story with a female lawyer, which catapults him to fame.

Marya Zelli finds herself penniless after her art dealer husband, Stephan, is convicted of theft. Marya accepts the hospitality of a strange couple, H.J. and Lois Heidler, who lets her live in their house.
A ring of Nazis in Florida is in possession of the body of Adolf Hitler, and plan revive him so they can take over the world.
Plot kept under wraps at this time.
One Actor, One Room, Seven Characters: 9/11.
The story of Brandon Burlsworth, possibly the greatest walk-on in the history of college football.
Ah Ying is a former gangster trying to lead an honest life and occasionally using her fighting skills to help out the girls in the factory where she now works.
A private detective must asks for his childhood friend's help, a lawyer, in order to finish a serious case that he did not expect before.

A sadistic, small-town sheriff and her underlings brutalize Lisa and leave her for dead in the woods. Bitten by a werewolf and bestowed with supernatural abilities, can Lisa retain her humanity as she exacts revenge?
In his spectacular film debut, young Babar, King of the Elephants, must save his homeland from certain destruction by Rataxes and his band of invading rhinos.
Before he can marry his sweetheart, a wealthy city boy from England is challenged to prove his work ethic on a farm in rural India.

The Clock family are four-inch-tall people who live anonymously in another family's residence, borrowing simple items to make their home. Life changes for the Clocks when their teenage daughter, Arrietty, is discovered.
A wicked sorceress in the Cave of Evil creates a magic pin which will make children stop studying and only play.

A young woman is seduced and abandoned by a man who was invited to stay at his home by her father in a stormy night. Noticing that she is pregnant, the girl decides to leave home and start a new life.
Bigfoot goes about his daily business of survival: killing hunters, foraging for food and building shelter - until he discovers a group of campers and finds himself in love with the beautiful Jody.
Vehicle for the popular Hans Albers, as a confident, cynical engineer in 1905 Canada suspected of trying to sabotage construction of a water project.
.Amaran and Harichandran started to show their talent by creating a network called Educated Intellectual Crime Network.
In 1970, drug-fueled Los Angeles private investigator Larry "Doc" Sportello investigates the disappearance of a former girlfriend.
World is thrown into chaos when the earth is hit by a solar EMP, Putting the world back to the early day's of civilization without the technology to run the power plants.

Nono, a Dutch kid lacking two days being thirteen, runs away from problems at home and, disguised as a girl, takes up with the world's cleverest thief, who unbeknownst to Nono, may hold the bizarre key to his true identity.
A Married Man fells in love with another married women; where they cannot be together but can love each other till the end of their life.
Lachchi falls in love with her neighbour, Balu, while her parents are searching for a suitable bridegroom. But, Balu believes that the respect of people is more important than love.

The story is told in two parts: the first focuses on Chicken and his exile in Taiwan skipped over in the first film. The second half deals with the Hung Hing Society trying to ally with Chicken's Taiwanese triad.
The story is based on the life of people at Mumbai which includes their happiness, drama, fun, and romance which interlink their lives.
A German Shepard named Rain is trained to fight in the Vietnam War and his intelligence and courage in the face of adversity wins the respect and loyalty of his platoon.
Chandramohan keeps receiving calls from his wife asking for his whereabouts, much to his annoyance.
During the course of one night a young driver navigates the complicated taxi turf wars in a desperate attempt to come up with the money he owes his increasingly impatient boss.
A reporter collects stories from a supposed "haunted" apartment complex and the tenants who have gone missing.

In remote Bhutan, an undercover detective investigates the case of a missing Buddhist nun and falls into a risky alliance with his only suspect - an alluring young woman known as the village "demoness".
Story based on "Nationalism"as never been screened before.
Ebenezer discovers that he is a new Osram Warrior, a group of powered beings fueled by the spirit realm through the Adinkra Symbols of Ghana.
A cosmonaut captive on a twin-earth, tries to flee the scientific experiments he's been victim of.
Kafka never believe in ghost, but somehow he always gets the chance to see the ghost with her medicine basket thinking that she's human.
A stock photographer seeks to find the perfect man for his single mother so that he can continue his world travels.
In a fantasy world of opposing kingdoms, a fifteen-year-old girl must find the fabled MirrorMask in order to save the kingdom and get home.
Ramen manufacturing heiress goes head-to-head against a ramen gourmet snob in a competition sparking a cultural renaissance and romance. (Based on the novel by Kailin Gow).
A group of teenagers must fight for survival on a distant planet after the AI designed to raise them attempts to abort the process 15 years early.
After secretly installing hidden cameras in their users' cable boxes, a group of cable company employees finds their voyeuristic scheme ruined when they inadvertently film a violent murder.

During the clashes with the Byzantine empire, the Ottomans are fighting a Byzantine knight who wants his own kingdom, killing both Muslims and Christians along the way. The Sultan's biggest help is Kadi Han, a ferocious fighter.

Sir John Locksley, the greatest jewel thief, decides his most prized possession, the Shalimar Ruby, should be passed on to a worthy successor. He invites the best rival jewel thieves to his island estate to participate in a deadly contest.
One day a friend will betray you, and the enemy at the crucial moment will save lives.
A young girl lost in Shanghai is taken in by an American playboy and his girlfriend.
On the verge of an isolated family surrended to the whimsical desires of an exotic religion, a young girl is forced to get pregnant with her brother under the opression of her father.
A hobo (Julio Alemán) is given the power to know what will happen in the future, but only for 24 hours.
Two very different Japanese sisters reunite in Hawaii in a story about the nature of memory and the lifelong relationships between siblings.
An evil supernatural presence terrorizes the locals of a small town.
A modern retelling of the classic tale. Teen siblings must escape from a psychotic recluse living in the woods.
An American painter has an affair with a bar owner in a French village, and agrees to help murder her husband, who has escaped from a prison for the criminally insane.
A series of mysterious events take place and upon investigation it is revealed that a revenge is been taken of The Murder which was committed many years ago in Federal B Area,Islamabad.
Notorious underground all-girl vampXcore band Bloodrape sets out on a reunion tour to destroy everyone's flesh/feelings.
In Bali, a young woman falls in love with a musician, but he may have eyes for her half-sister.
Years after he left Damascus under suspicious circumstances, Adib Abdel Kareem must confront what he left behind when his daughter goes missing.

Nono, a Dutch kid lacking two days being thirteen, runs away from problems at home and, disguised as a girl, takes up with the world's cleverest thief, who unbeknownst to Nono, may hold the bizarre key to his true identity.

A documentary filmmaker meets a descendant of a farmer family, who had a traumatic alien encounter in 1955. The filmmaker is shaken, when he notices ominous similarities between the encounter and his twin brother's past disappearance.

movie_name: The Exiles: Ivy and Maxim Litvinov
synopsis: A high-ranking Russian-Jewish diplomat works against the clock to convince complacent and greedy political leaders of Hitler's murderous intentions before it is too late.

As a war between humankind and monstrous sea creatures wages on, a former pilot and a trainee are paired up to drive a seemingly obsolete special weapon in a desperate effort to save the world from the apocalypse.

Kent State brings to life the tragedy of May 4, 1970 when four students were shot and killed by the National Guard while exercising their rights to free speech during a campus protest of the Vietnam War.
An antique shop "Spirited" gives out due punishment for bad deeds. Your hidden past will become your deadly present. The twisted ending will make this movie the next hottest trending topic.
As they battle through evil men and orc-infested lands, two orphaned brothers align with a band of rogue warriors who swear their allegiance in the hazardous quest to hunt dragons.

A journalism student, Lilly, disappears while making a documentary about water levels at Lake Mead. When Lilly's cousin Erica goes searching for her, she comes to learn that some mysterious and deadly, "entities" lurk beneath the surface.

An infection transmitted by diseased birds is causing corpses to reanimate in search of human flesh. As the army of the undead grows, a medical student and his friends find themselves surrounded by zombies, with nowhere to run.
A compulsive gambler finds his new family's safety seriously threatened by a ruthless gambling boss.
A soap opera writer gets hit on the head and wakes up as a character in his own show.

After a kidnapping exchange goes horribly wrong, the only witness is a cop who lies in critical condition. Ashe fights for life, two rival detectives face off in a desperate attempt to save the kidnapped woman.

Two American teenagers in search of cheap drugs, trespass into the seedy town of Barrio, Mexico. What they find instead is a disturbed story teller and three tales filled with blood, witches and a cannibalistic taco chef.
Three pirates, one pistol. And buckets of bad blood.

the young and gifted Rodi struggles with his economy and arrogant publishers. Petter offers his a lucrative job - picking up a parcel with cocaine after an airplane drop. From he says yes, his life is turned into a life and death struggle.
A fire in the mountains drive a wolf pack into a nearby desert where they will terrorize the local residents.
An astronaut and his android double travel back to the time of King Arthur.
Peter Brooks is a hard-working, hard-up college student whose dislike of women attending college weakens under the amorous advances of spoiled socialite coed Joan Madison.

Deep in a threatening forest, Sarah faces off with the brutal hunter who killed her sister. Its a cat and mouse fight for survival in this atmospheric thriller, this international story features no dialogue.
Three teenage boys have their world turned upside down by tainted moonshine. They must rescue their loved ones and battle a marauding horde of zombies while fighting their way out of town.
A journalist attacks the campaign of a mayoral candidate who has gained the endorsement of a rival newspaper.
A mystical martial artist/environmental Agent takes on a ruthless oil corporation.
The wartime adventures of Scotish highland leader Rob Roy MacGregor during the reign of King George I in the 18th century.
Bored of their wives, best friends, Meet, Prem and Amar, reunite after three years and decide to have an affair - but instead become the prime suspects in a murder investigation.
The first humans to set foot on Mars are tasked with setting up the infrastructure for the rest of humanity to arrive, but must band together to survive after unleashing a terrible threat.

March 1865. A group of Union soldiers escape from Confederate hands in a balloon, accompanied by their former Confederate captor. The balloon crashes on a sinister island where they encounter all manner of oddities and dangers.
One day in the Land of Oz, Cap'n Bill enlists the aid of the Scarecrow to help him take young Trot to her new home in Jinxland, only to find Jinxland has been taken over by an evil king.

Eliza (Lacey Chabert) and Debbie (Danielle Harris) are two sisters who don't always get along. But their relationship is put to the test when Debbie's life is in danger, and Eliza might have to give up her power to talk to animals.
A criminal attorney struggles with his sexuality, a cryptic new boyfriend, unemployment and the disturbing childhood secrets his parents hold.

The story of a 10-year old boy genius who invents a mentally interactive communication device for the U.S. Military and is then kidnapped by a shadowy organization and rescued by a famous stunt pilot.
An affair between the second in line to Britain's throne and the princess of the feuding Irish spells doom for the young lovers.
Three kids skip school in order to explore an abandoned film studio lot where they catch site of a woman being dragged across the lot by a masked man.
When the girlfriend of a cult leader tries to leave the flock, she finds escape to be more difficult than she imagined.

By opening the cell safe in which he works, Ahmed returns the checks and promissory notes in the safe to their owners. Ahmed leaves the city for fear of the owner of the room and finds a magic lamp in the desert.

An alluring hit man and a mysterious woman meet, not realizing they share a close bond through vengeance and murder. But clues to her real identity lead him to New York City and its deadly underbelly of organized crime.
Amanda has an issue with other people's physical imperfections. Hell breaks loose when Walter, a co-worker of hers, shows up to work with a pinky missing from his hand.
In an idyllic setting, a likable but dangerously volatile twelve-year-old boy tries to settle a score with his disagreeable, mysterious neighbor.
Mr. McMolyne the lab research robot and his two human friends Nik and Derek go on a long journey to find The Great Guardian make their robot friend's biggest wish come true.

A broke taxi driver in Vietnam thinks it is his lucky day when a mysterious woman offers him a fortune to drive her 1,000 miles from Ho Chi Minh City to Hanoi. They set off, pursued by mobsters and an assassin.
You can change the name. You can destroy the camp. But these will always be Jason's woods.
Two female band mates put their own romantic relationship and music in jeopardy when a love triangle with a former boyfriend ensues between them.
Budugu is an Indian Telugu psychological thriller amidst intense family drama.
Bulgarian guerrillas led by Tsakalarof attack a village in Macedonia and engage in major crimes.

A Canadian therapist has one last chance to keep his own personal life afloat by avoiding a job transfer to Gimli and working to help three patients suffering from extreme post-traumatic stress disorder.
Impy the friendly little dinosaur and his friends join together in order to rescue their new baby panda. which was kidnapped by a man who wants to put the panda in his private collection.
Part of the announced films in Bumilangit Cinematic Universe Phase 1, the plot is unknown.
A group of outlaws, once known as the "Order of Warriors", fight to regain their former glory.
12-year-old Bruno got fed up with his bickering parents and so he runs off into the countryside where he befriends a recluse.
It's 1979 and Migue is about to go on the ride of his life to meet his dream girl Stella.

A father has a recurring dream of losing his family. His nightmare turns into reality when the planet is invaded by a force bent on destruction. Fighting for their lives, he comes to realize an unknown strength to keep them safe from harm.
An unsettling drama that cinematically captures and recreates the psycho-analytic experience.
A San Francisco civilian police detective is forced to work on a series of murders with his former enemy commanding officer while dating his daughter.
A magical tree has a 7 dwarves taking care of it. The tree is bearing money and only good people can take it and prove that the tree has money on it.
A police detective uncovers a conspiracy behind a case involving a high-school guidance counselor when accusations of rape are made against him by two female students.
Pari and Yash fall in love with each other. However, her family strongly disapproves of her relationship with Yash. Yuvraj, Pari's childhood friend, attempts to create differences between the two.
A small-time magician is swept away to an enchanted land and is forced into a power struggle between three witches.
Focuses on time travel, fantasy and court proceedings intertwined with emotional and funny moments.
An expecting mother delves into a criminal underworld to rescue her dog from a torturous death.

A young woman lost her fiancé from the plane clash , later she discover that she becomes pregnant with his baby.She question herself what should she do between keep the child safe until she give a birth or she abortion the child.
When Alma returns home to help her family get their Native American heritage recognized, all she finds is the World-Famous Clown Motel that has been erected on their land.
Matty, a 41-year old mother of three with a husband in his midlife-crisis, meets 29-year old Johnny, a truck driver, who takes an interest in her.

A wife convinces her husband to fake his death so they can collect on the life insurance. However, he doesn't know that she has been having an affair for some time, and she has plans for the money - and they don't include him.
A small-time grifter and nightclub tout takes advantage of some fortuitous circumstances and tries to become a big-time player as a wrestling promoter.

A nine-year-old boy awaits the return of his sailor father, unaware that he is missing presumed drowned. The boy's mother starts an affair with a local woodsman, causing his wife to embark on a vendetta. Then the boy runs away.
Independent film about a soldier during the Vietnam War, and his memories of the 12 women he had been involved with...there is no 13.
A scientist makes a last stand on Earth with the help of a ragtag team of soldiers against an invasion of alien phantoms.

In an alternate Japan, territorial street gangs form opposing factions collectively known as the Tokyo Tribes. Merra, leader of the Wu-Ronz tribe of Bukuro crosses the line to conquer all of Tokyo. The war begins.
Dustins Dojo and his silent sidekick Terry fight off attackers to save Fountain County Indiana and from Destruction!

Daisy, a young soldier in the anti-terrorism brigade, patrols the city with her two team members. Suddenly, an explosion stops her in her tracks. She is in shock. Around her, no trace of life. Until a strange child appears.
Two crew members of a spaceship wake up from hypersleep to discover that all their colleagues are missing. Despite this, it appears that they are not alone.

movie_name: The Black Waters of Echo's Pond
synopsis: Nine friends take a holiday at a Victorian home on a private island and uncover a game that when played brings out the worst in each of them. Jealously, greed, hatred, lust, all of the things they keep buried deep inside themselves rise to the surface and come to a boil.

A reporter, is drawn into an evil web of conspiracy working for a newspaper in an isolated small town, where she strives to uncover the horrifying secret of a vanished reporter, two dead teenage girls and an attractive cowboy.
A poor boy of unknown origins is rescued from poverty and taken in by the Earnshaw family where he develops an intense relationship with his young foster sister, Cathy.
Trying all sorts of ways to get Esra, and frustrated in all of them, Musa decides to try the love magic as a last resort.
Samay, an average IT guy, gets trapped in an evil plan of a scientist. He has to fight back, to save his love and the world by breaking the time loop.
Six stories, six directors, six unique short films, all under the backdrop of Bushwick, Brooklyn, each a different look into the theme of unconditional love.
Inspired by classic film noir, Carson Phillips, an ex-football star turned PI, has a soft spot for a lady in distress.

Inspired by the Rankin/Bass cartoon, the evil Dr. Who captures King Kong to dig for Element X when his mechanical doppelganger, Mechani-Kong, is unable to do the task. Kong escapes and soon confronts his mechanical double.
When heavily-insured gangster Frankie Toller is released from prison, Mike Henderson is assigned by the insurance company to make sure Toller's policy expires before he does. This, concise.
A rich manager, obsessed by the idea of becoming poor, decides to temporarily leave his nice house and his beautiful wife, and begin living like poor, homeless people.
When the police in a German city are unable to catch a child-murderer, other criminals join in the manhunt.
A ravishing beauty in modern-day New York is cursed in infancy by Katrinka, the wicked witch of the west side.

Love triangle - terminally ill professor, blind girl and young bard. In the background - wild arrival of the capitalism, political conflicts, city life and beautiful nature of Latvia. In the end love conquers everything.
A mysterious young man from a New York publisher is sent to Switzerland to persuade the renown writer Patricia Highsmith to write one final installment of Ripley anthology.
When his wife goes missing, a father must protect his children from an unknown force determined to tear them apart.
A young heiress finds evidence suggesting that at night she acts under the influence of a family curse and has begun committing ghastly murders in a nearby park.
Star-crossed lovers must fight on opposing sides in a battle that will determine the next Shogun.
A young man fights the mafia in his town for better life to his people but this leads to chain wars between the mafia and him.
An ailing African leader is admitted to a hospital. A male nurse at the hospital kidnaps him, but it turns out that things aren't exactly what they seem to be.
A contemporary thriller set inside the British Home Office's controversial Juvenile Covert Human Intelligence Source (J-CHIS) program.

movie_name: The Fiendish Plot of Dr. Fu Manchu
synopsis: When Fu's age-regressing elixir vitae is spilled by a hapless flunky, Fu Manchu sends his lackeys to round up supplies for a fresh batch of elixir, including a precious jewel, which prompts a team of agents to track him down.
Fight promoter Nick Donati grooms a bellhop as a future champ, but has second thoughts when the 'kid' falls for his sister.

Follows a young reporter and her partner as they investigate mysterious deaths and a case where her source of a suspicious accident was supposedly already dead at the time of their interview, they end up dealing with a terrifying truth.

A young art gallery owner, facing bankruptcy, dreams about a painter, who she discovers actually exists. She tracks him down in a dilapidated hotel and asks him to show at her gallery. He agrees, provided she poses for him.

Supernatural events unfold outside of a small town nestled deep in the bayou. Tales of mystery become revealing truths attached to a relic that has seen it's way throughout time and into the hands of the innocent in need of protection.
The story of John Henry and other American folk legends.
Surf's Up' takes the viewer to the best surf spots around the world, and talks to the locals to gain insight into why so many people find solace in the lifestyle.
A human extraterrestrial unexpectedly arrives to planet earth and decides to steal the worlds gold and bring it back with him to his dying planet which needs the gold for its atmosphere to survive.

Taken in by an honourable seaman, an idealist political prisoner becomes his right-hand-man. Now, his dark-eyed wife can't escape from the net of passion, and he, too, is unwilling to try. Will the handsome runaway man ever find atonement?

Aryan is a Syrian refugee trying to make his way into Hungary from Serbia, along with his father and many other wretched souls. They are all caught, and find themselves in a web of cynicism and corruption.
Anita Linda loves and is betrothed the Efren Reyes loves Anita but Patria Plata falls in love with Efren what a romance.
While filming an advertisement, some extreme sports enthusiasts unwittingly stop a group of terrorists.
When a college girl has to make extra money she is pulled into an underground fight club to be able to pay for her brother's leukemia treatment.
When Santi receives a mysterious email, his life is turned upside down. He and his girlfriend Blanca must flee from everything that lies ahead. They are now activated.
A hitman's next target is a dentist in Greece. Unluckily for both of them, the murderer has a toothache.
A raging god of battle and a master samurai duke it out in a series of sword fights in a remote temple.
It's the third chapter of LINKS the web series. An archaeologist discovers an ancient spaceship under the Duomo of Milan.
A mere 200 yards from shore, surfer Nancy is attacked by a great white shark, with her short journey to safety becoming the ultimate contest of wills.

Facing writer's block, an author attempts to ignore his urge to drink and the vivid memories of his past. Shot and hand-cut on 16mm (both B&W and color) film, this short alternative fiction reminds us that not everything is as it seems.

Shiva is a student working at a Nuclear Fusion Lab near San Francisco. When the reactor ignites, the Karma Police appear from the future to capture Shiva before he becomes America's most-feared terrorist. So...why don't they want him dead?

Two friends of a blind girl spend the night with a stranger in her house. A murder occurs outside and an unknown intruder attacks the group. Can the sole survivor, the blind girl, make it to safety as the dawn breaks?
A young novice is sent by her convent in 1930s Austria to become a governess to the seven children of a widowed naval officer.
A young scientist discovers a malevolent entity which sets her on a bloody descent into the jaws of insanity.
A drug dealer tries to kill his partner's daughter after she inherits an old house.
After witnessing the accidental drowning of his father, a young Floridian "tunes out" and the world makes little sense to him until his older brother's girlfriend awakens his sense of reality.

For two detectives Dean McCallum is an enigma; is he a psychopath or a serial killer; does he suffer from multiple personalities, could he be possessed by demons, or is there something even more shocking to consider.

On the night of November 13, 1974, Ronald DeFeo, Jr. took a high-powered rifle and murdered his entire family as they slept. At his trial, DeFeo claimed that "voices" in the house commanded him to kill. This is their story.
Adaptation of the Millerworld comic book series of the same name.
After Miss Jane Marple is made a trustee of a merchant marine training vessel, a fellow trustee is poisoned, and ship's officers are later murdered after she comes on board.
A young man visits his ancestral home accompanied by his guardian and their wives, where he is plagued by the memories and influence of his murderous, psychosexual father.
Journalist Anna Politkovskaya's brave crusade, fighting for an independent voice in Putin's Russia.
A Pseudo-Biopic about a man who may or may not be D.B. Cooper.
In a remake of the 1940s film, Helen has been incapable of speech since seeing her husband die - will she become the target of a deranged serial killer targeting disabled people?
Two deep-sea explorers and their crew must survive a master race of beings and monstrous creatures when they discover the fabled city of Atlantis.

When a farm boy's village is cursed by a mysterious plague, he enlists the help of a wise man with a slight flaw in his character. Together they venture into the enchanted realms of China to obtain the only cure from the evil Duke of Chin.
A union leader marries his employer, but subsequently gets embroiled in labor/management disputes.

movie_name: Mortadelo y Filemón. Misión: Salvar la Tierra
synopsis: A live-action adaptation of a series of Spanish comic books about a pair of spies.

A new street drug that sends its users across time and dimensions has one drawback: some people return no longer human. Can two college drop-outs save humanity from this silent, otherworldly invasion?
When a broke graffiti artist is charged with vandalism, he starts selling drugs to pay his fines.
Follow Alex and the Checkered Ninja who embark on a frantic hunt for the villain Phillip Eppermint, who has evaded a prison sentence in Thailand.
A mysterious college professor becomes the focus of a murderer investigation when he is framed by his rival, Dr. Crazx, a Pulitzer prize winning psychiatrist.
A story about healing love in shattered circumstances.
A man awakes aboard a dying space prison with no memory of who he is, 2 hours of oxygen left, and 11 of the universes most deadly criminals between him and the last escape pod.
A machine falls in love with a scientist during the war between humans and machines.

TV Reporter and Cameraman Cliff Reynolds(Pinsent), while filming Municipal Beach(Montreal)during a Four-Day Heatwave in the Summer of '74, coincidentally photographs Escaped Convict, Jerry ...                See full synopsis »

A producer decides to reopen a theater, that had been closed five years previously when one of the actors was murdered during a performance, by staging a production of the same play with the remaining members of the original cast.
A marketing executive tries to find Mr. Right on a Christian dating website. When impressing her dream guy ends in disaster, Gwyneth gets in touch with her spiritual side.
A hoodlum look-alike assumes the identity of a noble man.
When a single mom and her two kids arrive in a small town, they begin to discover their connection to the original Ghostbusters and the secret legacy their grandfather left behind.
Based on novel by Pierre Dumarchais. The story of the aging pedant who sells his soul to Satan in exchange for youth and knowledge.
Vellapanti story revolves around four childhood friends who struggle to fulfill their ambitions but each time find themselves in a soup.
Two people high on cannabis eating private parts of each other and things slowly turn aesthetically wild due to lack of food in the fridge.
A wicked sorceress in the Cave of Evil creates a magic pin which will make children stop studying and only play.
A boy flees a brutal stepfather to take up with an infamous Bushranger.
Escaped cons stowaway on a flight to the moon and discover alien women ruled by a sadistic queen. Restored and in Color!
A turn of events finds a fashion designer spending her Christmas with a prince.
Princess of Cleves is married with a rich and old prince but she loves secretly a lord younger, more beautiful and also very popular.
A humble start-up creates a Chakra balancing app with horrific results
A tribe of prehistoric people is puzzled - a murder has happened. The first ever one.

It's the year 2131. A bold team from the Tri Force rebel alliance embark on a daring mission in a last ditch effort to save what's left of the human race and liberate space aliens from an Evil Brain's tyrannical mind control.
After surviving a gruesome accident, a man finds himself in the thrall of darkness.
The Musical To Top All Musical. 22 Big Musical Numbers. You'll Sigh With Diomeng's Ballads. Rock With Jose Mari's Fast Numbers.
A soul in search of herself.

A man is released from prison after serving time for a murder he didn't commit. He goes to live with his brother and his family on their Louisiana ranch, where they're raising horses to compete in an important race.

In cold Lapland Finland, under the eternal midnight sun, two ardent lovers reunite once again after a long period apart, governed by a powerful and eloquent circular motif woven by destiny, faith, and love. Can they deny their destiny?
Disgraced and exiled for falling in love with a wealthy woman, a healer is forced to become a bandit.
In the town of Burning Bush, the Devil comes to collect the souls he was promised and will destroy anyone or anything that gets in his way.
Sequel to Deliverance: Retribution

movie_name: Puella Magi Madoka Magica the Movie Part 1: Beginnings
synopsis: A mysterious creature "Kyubey" offers a young girl named Madoka Kaname the chance to have any one wish granted to her. In exchange she must battle evil creatures named "Witches" at the risk of losing her life.

The team discovers that when they grow up, their relationship with their Digimon will come closer to an end. They realize that the more they fight, the faster their bond breaks and the time to choose is approaching fast.
With no one to talk to, a woman turns to a strange doll for help dealing with her bullies, when they end up dead, she fears the doll is responsible.
A Prince leaves his city and sets off to avenge his father, not aware his father wasn't murdered, and in reality, committed suicide, and soon learns the truth about his people from a warrior woman.
The inspiring true story of Paul Holderfield, a bigoted firefighter-turned pastor, who started one of the first integrated churches in the American South.
The film is a dramatization of parts of the Ramakien, the Thai national epic that was adapted from the Hindu epic the Ramayana.
Maimed while seeking revenge, a girl becomes stronger than ever.
John O'Ryan, a former marine who trained martial arts in Japan, fights vampires.

A virus breaks out worldwide that turns infected into murderous cannibals who act on any impulse they get. A young woman named Harriet Bloom must find a way to survive while growing past the guilt she feels over a childhood trauma.
A high profile wedding is being shot for a popular reality show, but the joyous celebration turns sinister as a bloodthirsty force terrorizes the wedding reception.
Two detectives are assigned a murder case with DNA evidence or witnesses, and must figure out who the culprit was. The answer may be in the most unlikely of places. Right in the midst.

movie_name: The Pirates Who Don't Do Anything: A VeggieTales Movie
synopsis: Three vegetable friends seek the roots of true heroism during a 17th-century adventure.

movie_name: One Way Ticket to the Moon
synopsis: In 1969, two young brothers travel through Poland not only to send one of them to his army unit at the seaside, but also to become real grown-ups and learn something about themselves.
A Tyrannosaurus rex raised as a herbivore meets and takes care of an orphaned baby Ankylosaurus, all the while trying to fight his natural instincts of a predator and survive in the wild.

A pet baby alligator is flushed down a toilet and survives in the city sewers. 12 years later, it grows to an enormous size thanks to a diet of discarded laboratory dogs injected with growth hormones. Now, humans have entered the menu.

After falling in love with the Nathalie and sleeping with his first target, Corinna, Ludger ends up living two lives - one as an underground poet and one as a Stasi agent - both of which eventually come back to haunt him 30 years later.
In 1940s Los Angeles, when womanizing composer Keith Vincent is found dead, the inquest concludes it was a suicide but police detective Joe Warne isn't so sure.
Based on the legendary true story of the Red Dog who united a disparate local community while roaming the Australian outback in search of his long lost master.

Four teenage friends go on a road trip through Argentina. On their way, they find a castle left abandoned in the middle of a forest. They decide to investigate further, only to discover it's gruesome secrets and former residents.

movie_name: Once Upon a Time in Mongolia
synopsis: Mya tries to find her long-lost father in the exotic deserts of Mongolia. Her journey includes horse racing, archery and wrestling contests, debates about God, dead end leads and ultimately falling in love.

As Steve Rogers struggles to embrace his role in the modern world, he teams up with a fellow Avenger and S.H.I.E.L.D agent, Black Widow, to battle a new threat from history: an assassin known as the Winter Soldier.

The investigation of the murder of ambiguous architect Garrone takes Police Commissioner Santamaria to the Turinese high society, but the results are unclear. In the meanwhile, another murder takes place.

Anal retentive atheist social worker Jimmy stumbles upon a society of Angel and Demons, blending in with Humans. Bartering to assist in a grand quest, he has no choice but help end a war between good and Evil, But which side will he take?
At a wealthy family estate, extortionists go after their matriarch and her inheritance while a ghost and and ax-wielding figure lurk in the shadows.
A story of a young family whose happiness got truncated by a series of unfortunate events. Their baby is missing and all hell is let loose.
A young woman looks to escape her abusive life by moving to a friend's farm near Atlanta. Unfortunately, she learns her place of supposed comfort offers more terrifying forms of abuse.

New York City: Dashing, debonair, but not-very-rich Robert Morgan (William Farnum) wants love and is determined to get it. He lives with and takes care of his aged mother (Sara Alexander). ...                See full synopsis »

Kalidas escapes after killing his father's murderer and is given asylum by a woman who raises him and her own son. Later, his adoptive brother is also murdered and he decides to make the culprits pay.

movie_name: Evie Bowman and the Rock from Mars
synopsis: When Lewis comes face to face with a Martian Rock during his school trip things aren't quite what they seem. Evie and Brent are called to investigate which puts them in a race against time and enemy foes who want the rock for themselves.

Dave and Joe, evicted from their apartment, turn to stealing cars and dealing Fluoride to make their financial ends meet. One night they find Summer Hayes in the trunk of a stolen automobile and nothing is what it at first appears to be.
An evil magician makes a living by casting deadly spells on people's objects of desire. He gets overly ambitious, and start to go out of control.
A woman decides to leave Kuala Lumpur to give birth to her child out of wedlock, and is arranged to stay with a midwife. Unbeknownst to her, the midwife has her own evil plan for her child.

movie_name: How I Became a Super Hero
synopsis: While superheroes have assimilated into Parisian society, a new drug gives super powers to mere mortals.
Based on the 1980s TV action/drama, this update focuses on vice detectives Crockett and Tubbs as their respective personal and professional lives become dangerously intertwined.

After finding a gun on the beach, a young woman is caught up in a night of cascading misadventures as she teams up with her rich ex-boyfriend and his fiancée to return the gun to the Russian mob in exchange for her kidnapped dog.
James Bond descends into mystery as he tries to stop a mysterious organisation from eliminating a country's most valuable resource.

Children don't care about differences in social class, skin color, or religion, so why does Paul and Sofia's 9-year-old son Corentin only have friends like him? And what happens when all of his friends leave for a Parisian private school?

movie_name: Ultraman Orb: Lend Me the Power of Bonds!
synopsis: Gai returned to the SSP after he was informed by Ultraman Zero that there was a new threat approaching. Whilst going back, Gai met Ultraman X who was briefly separated from his host Daichi after an enemy attack.
A version of Dickens' A Christmas Carol set in 1950s Italy.
Mano loves Jo but when he realises that Jo is in love with Prem, he decides to help her in winning Prem's love. They succeed in their plan to separate Prem from his girlfriend Nandini.
Shortly after her release from a mental hospital, a young woman begins a campaign of revenge against those who placed her there.

Julie, who died of a PCP overdose as a teen in the early '70s, searches from beyond the ethers for her little brother, Bob, an obese watch-seller, who is dying of sucrose intolerance, in the early '90s.
A group of people learn about a hidden treasure and then they race to find it and claim it.

A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.
Stranded in the Philippines during World War II, a young girl finds that her duty to protect her dying mother is complicated by her misplaced trust in a beguiling, flesh-eating fairy.

movie_name: What of This World Without Passion?
synopsis: An encounter of novelist Lúcio Cardoso and poet Murilo Mendes haunting ghosts with their characters.
A young film student wants his prized jeep fixed, so he turns to a television paranormal hunting team to get a paycheck and the scare of his life.
After a woman's father is kidnapped, she must walk into darkness to save his life. Followed by a mysterious stranger, she will soon discover that evil sometimes waits where you least expect it.
Za-la-Mort is a romantic "Apache," in whom violent action coexists with noble sentiments.

When two Templars are sent home after losing the second Crusade, they are forced to battle a slew of varied enemies, the pity-less elements and their own inner demons while trying to elude a mysterious assassin who is hunting them.

A Wyoming sheriff's vacation is interrupted when a migrant sheepherder discovers a dead body while tending to his flock on the range. But when the sheriff goes to investigate, the body has mysteriously disappeared.

A city is portrayed as a hub of illegal activities. To avenge his brother's death, Rajveer joins MLA Shamsher Singh Grewal's group. He soon leaves the gang when he discovers a shocking truth about the MLA.

movie_name: The Police Are Blundering in the Dark
synopsis: During an outbreak of violent murders in the area targeting young women, a journalist searching for a female friend gone missing ends up in a villa owned by an eccentric photographer.
A young boy sets out to find his mother. After setting up camp in Central Park, he encounters a group of people even needier than himself.

The star of a London musical walks out before the curtain up, but the show must go on in a haunted theatre, The Regency. 40 years previously, the star of Hamlet was murdered, and more are dying to keep a dark secret.
A boy tries to escape his family problem by lucid dreaming and eventually choose his life and family in his dream rather than his real life and family
A group of youngsters get stuck in a haunted school and have to deal with an assortment of ghosts.
An illiterate boy falls in love with an unknown girl and finds them with great difficulty. That stranger girl is her little sister's teacher.

Moments before he will be executed by the French Intervention Army, the liberal leader (Negrete) reads a love letter by his girlfriend (Marín). His memories provide the poetic pictures of this romantic historical drama.

A lonely princess and a poor cobbler fall in love while trying to retrieve three magical orbs that were stolen by a bumbling thief, all while outwitting a powerful sorcerer as adventure and comedic pop culture references abound.

movie_name: Through Fire, Water and... Brass Pipes
synopsis: One day, Vasya journeys into the forest to meet his beloved Alyonushka, only to have her forcibly whisked away by the wretched Kashchej. To save her, Vasya must face a number of fabulous, archetypal tests.
A police agent infiltrates a gang of jewel thieves, and on the way to finding who the evildoers are, he falls in love with a thief.
When an idealistic teacher starts tutoring a mobster's kid, he gets into a tough battle.
In this urban dystopian retelling of Cyrano, two young freestyle artists vie for the affections of Panash, a young, fellow aspiring trap musician.
The minister of Economy gives a house, a car and job to a man who tried to jump from a building because of his poverty; soon, every poor tries the same strategy.
El Santo is chased throughout 4 centuries by a mysterious masked man called El Encapuchado Negro.
Some friends visit the infamous Garchampa Palace which has a horrifying reputation for blood-sucking entities and spirits that were petrifying the locality.
A calculative man schemes to deceit a poor but young widow for his personal monetary gains.
Four men running a hotdog factory are at odds with eachother..when one thinks he's getting fired he inserts his tooth into the hotdog mix leading to a PR disaster.
A group of deviant sects who worship the figure of Kanjeng Devil.

movie_name: Alien Showdown: The Day the Old West Stood Still
synopsis: An alien scout lands on earth in the year 1854. The creature is searching for water and food. Once it finds what it needs, it will call in an invasion fleet. A lone cowboy must stand against the alien invader or all will be lost.
When a young man finds a portal to the past and witnesses a brutal murder, he is drawn into a war of time travelers.
The story of a terminally ill teenage girl who falls for a boy who likes to attend funerals and their encounters with the ghost of a Japanese kamikaze pilot from WWII.
A young autistic man living in a prop warehouse becomes involved in crime as he tries to win the heart of a beautiful set designer.
In a world ravaged by disease, he's the only cure... and the last hope for human-kind.
Fisherman Eerik Storm agrees to become a smuggler's pilot in order to get money to save his home.
An orphan boy in 1830s London is abused in a workhouse, then falls into the clutches of a gang of thieves.
Shady stockbroker and abusive husband Gerald Parker is found dead in the penguin pool of a NYC aquarium after being knocked cold by his wife's boyfriend.
The plot is unknown at the moment.
A monster hunter from the old world faces his greatest challenge. A vile creature inflicted with the moon's curse.
After a foiled assassination attempt on the president this ex-special forces soldier is sent to war Zones where he fights warriors in order to survive.
The true story of the greatest occultist of 1900. The truth beyond the Legend.
Tim works at a newspaper during day time, and is a pyromaniac at night. Only the newspaper's editor, which also is a childhood friend, knows about Tim's dark side. Until Margrethe also gets to know.
Sometimes when you manifest, you get more than you bargained for.
A surgeon performs a lobotomy in the modern day with horrifying results.

12-year-old Billy McGregor's friendship with a playful baby kangaroo leads him on the ultimate adventure in this fun-filled story for all ages. Featuring amazing animals, beautiful scenery and a positive message about friendship and love.
People get entangled in a mystery when a murder is committed on live television.
A young woman gets emotionally caught in a voyeuristic game on the darker shades of Tokyo.
A doctor must follow the instructions on a drug dealer's beeper to rescue his kidnapped son.
Two Russians push the wrong button on a strange device and end up on the telepathic planet Pluke with its strange societal norms.

Two men get a jar, open it and meet a genie inside it. The genie grants them all they want and they are happy until the genie draws the attention of a smuggling gang while also breaking up one of protagonist's love life.
A computer scientist scans dreams with a computer.

1992 Belgrade. Aleksa works the night shift at an occult magazine to avoid military police, draft and war. Old colleague, Mrs. Kosara, offers him shelter at her place. Soon, a dead friend warns him in his dream about the old lady.
The Last Bite is an art-house feature film about Carlos, a tormented artist living in London. Carlos' perspective on life changes when he meets Veronica, an other-worldly woman.
A love that has an inglorious end.
Three professional killers break into the house of an airport employee to shoot the plane on which an Asian Prime Minister is due to leave America.
Three best friends endure heartbreak, humiliation and hangovers to get dates for the wedding of a lifetime.

The millennial children of a groovy 70s burnout come home to do right by a mom who always did them wrong. Based on true lies, it explores the "OK, Boomer" relationship between the free love generation and those left to clean up the mess.

Feri is in love with Pari who left Iran when she was a child. Feri has been looking forward to her return. When he accidentally meets a woman in need whose identity is unknown to him, he decides to help her, until he gets lucky.
He was a boy with no friends. The other a dog, abandoned and forgotten. Together, they would build a bond that could never be broken and will share adventures that will last a lifetime.
A veteran homicide detective who has witnessed his socialite girlfriend kill her husband sees his newly-minted detective brother assigned to the case alongside him.

movie_name: Oblivion Island: Haruka and the Magic Mirror
synopsis: A teenage girl discovers a magical world, which forces her to come to terms with her grief for her deceased mother, and her tenuous relationship with her father.
A Sicilian woman "dishonored" by her lover goes to England with a pistol intending to murder him.
After losing his arm in a car accident, a criminal psychologist has it replaced with a limb that belonged to a serial killer.
A masked man attempts to foil attempts to replace the regions' queen with a look-alike.
in 2004 Sam and his Grandpa go on an intense mission to get revenge of the man who had kidnapped him fast forward to 2030 where Sam has PTSD and a child
Helen is working as a luxury prostitute in a circuit directed by Stamatis, in collaboration with Mr. Calogridis, a factory owner above suspicion and one of Helen's customers.
The struggles faced when a Hindu man falls in love with a Muslim woman and the disapproval of her family.
Alice Blue is the new Creative Intern at Raven Advertising, unfortunately for her, the place is run by vampires.
Filipino-produced E.T. spoof, with a boy who befriends a giant blue creature from outer space he dubs T.T. (or, Tiny Terrestrial).
Pradosh Chandra Mitter(Feluda) visits Puri for a vacation but gets involved in investigating a murder that took place in the coastal town during his stay.

In a world where monster wrestling is a global sport and monsters are superstar athletes, teenage Winnie seeks to follow in her father's footsteps by coaching a loveable underdog monster into a champion.
Magic is slowly corrupting the world. In order to save Russia from the same fate, Ivan Tsaritsin with some help from his friends, will try to put an end to this.

A meteorite brings an extraterrestrial life to the earth. When powerful alien creatures threaten humanity, Commander Sing Lee's elite forces are almost wiped out, and the surviving soldier Tai Loi discovers an even bigger conspiracy.

movie_name: Ultus, the Man from the Dead
synopsis: Ultus, a man left for dead, returns to seek revenge on his scheming partner.
Set in Sonora Mexico, the film tells the story of Jeremías an eight year old who finds out he is a gifted child and initiates a journey of self discovery.
A young secretary and her boss, an engineer, awaken fifteen hundred years into the future to discover the future is not as expected, most of civilization has been destroyed.
A noir thriller told from the point of view of a femme fatale, who falls for the detective in charge of a murder case.

A famous conductor divides his obsession for music with the sickly love for his muse. A strange love triangle is formed among conductor, wife, and muse; the wife ends up accepting the situation rather than lose her husband.

A world-weary detective is hired to investigate the murder of a West Point cadet. Stymied by the cadets' code of silence, he enlists one of their own to help unravel the case - a young man the world would come to know as Edgar Allan Poe.
A grieving man discovers a form a time travel that only works by never falling asleep.
A woman with a troubled past is kidnapped and imprisoned into a slaughter house run by a masked killer, soon to realize that both of them are not what they seem to be.

When their eldest brother dies, Peter and Alice seek to save their parents from despair until they are forced to choose between home and imagination, setting the stage for their iconic journeys into Wonderland and Neverland.
Cameron finds a tank buried in the Arabian desert during WWII, and proceeds to attack the Arabs with it.
The third installment of the Power Rangers franchise.
An intergalactic military unit known as Force Nomad fight for the common good.

movie_name: To Betrayers and Hero's: A Madness of Avlon Klynn Story
synopsis: A prequel story set 11 years before the event's of The Madness of Avlon Klynn, which follows a young man called Shannon.
Adjusting to a work from home lifestyle, a single loner makes an ideal connection on a new dating site.
A troubled teen seeks the love of her mother and along the way learns the truth and responsibilities of her family and heritage.
A millionaire commits suicide and frames his secretary for murder.

After being shot, Tom awakens from a coma to discover that fragments of his smartphone have been embedded in his head--and worse, that returning to normal teenage life is impossible because he has developed a strange set of superpowers.
A woman travels to Holland in search of her missing sister who may have been forced into prostitution in the infamous Red Light District of Amsterdam.
The childhood adventure story of the Chinese war hero Yue Fei.
In a secret Temple far beneath the city of London, an immortal knight and a Demon battle for possession of a key that can open a doorway to Hell.
Four different hit-men find themselves viewing for a job without knowing the others are involved. Crime, money and violence in London are at the center of this tale of modern Babylon.
Feature adaptation of Frank Frazetta's tale of confrontation between an evil ice lord and a fire kingdom.
After the death of Renaud, her boyfriend, Armelle can't possibly take him out of her mind. Her sister advises her to see a medium, in whose house she meets a boy who strangely looks like Renaud...

movie_name: Heaven with a Barbed Wire Fence
synopsis: New York store clerk (Ford) joins a hobo (Conte) and an illegal immigrant (Rogers) heading for his newly bought land in Arizona.
A space colonist traveling from Mars crash lands on Earth to save a Resistance stuck in the dark ages from an advance Moon enforcer - and the galaxy from human extinction.

A man is trapped by the Japanese military police and executed on the spot for resisting arrest. Twenty years later, his son sets off to hunt down the executioners who are now involved in the opium trade in Hong Kong.
Efforts are underway by the owner of a dancer troupe to ensnare an Engineer in the theft of a necklace.
Three pirates are saved from a shipwreck and seize a galleon bound for Maracaibo, where they will save the governor from a conspiracy

Shahruz is a young addicted man who has recently released from the prison. He is escaping from his past and is determined to change his life once and forever. But this is his past that hunting him all the time.
A spectacular movie about a depressed hotdog that has this itch to become the world's coolest hotdog so he can fulfill his father's dying wish to become a professional skier.

movie_name: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
synopsis: Two Jedi escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force, but the long dormant Sith resurface to claim their original glory.
A quantum physicist with a traumatic past discovers a mysterious message that could be the key to answers and healing she desperately seeks.

Three teens are forced to spend the night at the house on Hollow Road. They eventually learn that each one of them has been having recurring nightmares. Nightmares that could only take place in the mind of a psychopath.
This Film is dedicated to the 'Dutiful Jawans' of the Law Enforcing Agencies.

After an unnatural event leaves mankind nearly extinct, a runaway girl and a rogue bounty hunter brave a dangerous wilderness to find a fabled sanctuary that can either save or destroy what's left of humanity.
Two CIA operatives retire down in Rio, trying to hide out and keep a low profile, but their old lives and them taking on local enemies drag them back into the line of fire.

movie_name: Destiny's Rebirth: Rise of the Dragon
synopsis: The second film in a nine film saga, with dozens of characters and takes place on various planets around the universe. A roller coaster of magic and madness mixed with super powers and space machines.
A teenager teams up with the daughter of young-adult horror author R.L. Stine after the writer's imaginary demons are set free on the town of Madison, Delaware.
A prostitute gets pregnant by a wealthy businessman. Identical twins are born: one is raised by his father and the other by the mother.
Two desperately ill women find solace in each other's company. They journey towards the fabled "sea of clouds" before dying, not knowing destiny has a twist in this eternal puzzle called life.
Follows the turbulent relationship of Cole and Maya as they struggle to survive in a world where the human population has been decimated by an extra-terrestrial attack.

A Martian is sent to liberate Earthling living under dictatorship. He later learns this inter-planetary political conflict is a buried family feud, where he has to kill his father to survive and clip his siblings to get what he wants.

A deep space mining vessel has been adrift for two years. It is suspected the crew brutally killed each other, but the reason for the bloodbath is unknown. A rescue crew is sent to find if there are any survivors, what happened and why.

Rennick embarks on an magic-filled quest to solve The Riddle of the Chosen and defend the Earth from destruction. With his trusted companions, he travels to the center of a primal evil and engage in the ultimate showdown of good and evil.
AN UNUSUAL BANK ROBBERY PROVIDES BREATHTAKING DRAMA TO THIS ACTION-ADVENTURE MOVIE. THE MOST INGENIOUS BANK HEIST EVER PULLED.

Two Savannah kittens, Scribbles and Pearl are flown over from the U.K. to meet the new family and neighbors in Southern Califronia. Once they arrive in their new home adventure, mayhem, and fun begins.

movie_name: Via Lattea... la prima a destra
synopsis: A boy is exiled to earth from another planet, makes friends with a dog with whom he talks, and is sent to an orphanage where he is the star of the football team. St Anthony of Padua, St Gennaro of Naples and Jesus show up to give support.

movie_name: My Little Pony: Equestria Girls - Legend of Everfree
synopsis: The students of Canterlot High come to a summer camp where there are odd counselors, strange phenomena and, hidden agendas.

movie_name: Schoolgirl Report 10: Every Girl Starts Sometime
synopsis: This chapter in the Schoolgirl Report series revolves around a "morality class" at a girls' school, in which a number of the students' experiences factor into the lessons to be learned....                See full synopsis »
A man searching for a cache of diamonds rescues a Dutch cutter from a concentration camp and murders his partner, throwing the blame on the former's daughter.

The wanted criminal Richard Bruno Riddick arrives on a planet called Helion Prime and finds himself up against an invading empire called the Necromongers, an army that plans to convert or kill all humans in the universe.
When a couple enlist the services of a maid, they find themselves dealing with ordeals that awaken them to the consequences of a long forgotten past.
A relationship gradually develops between a savvy New York street girl and a good-hearted cab driver, but other matters keep getting in their way, including financial problems and a murder.
It tells a story set in a recreational area, where two different boys, Petr and Michal, become friends after an initial mutual distrust.
A story of action and suspense. A story saturated with thrilling and dramatic scene. A story that will arouse your emotions.
An eccentric inventor shows up in a wide-open frontier town with a mechanical robot he says he can turn into a gunslinger to help clean up the town.

movie_name: Siete en la mira, 2da. parte: La furia de la venganza
synopsis: Tras un combate en el que Santo (formando pareja con el Rebelde Rojo) vence a una pareja de luchadores italianos, le proponen que se una a una expedición arqueológica, que quiere explorar unas ruinas azteca.
Five students escape from the destruction of their beloved Shaolin Temple...now each must take revenge and train in their own seperate fighting styles...they will become The Five Shaolin Masters!!
During King Arthur's time, a sword maker wishes to win Lady Linet's heart but first he must become a noble knight.
A man's life changes after he unknowingly gets super powers and then embarks on a journey that helps him discover the true meaning of love, life, courage, sacrifice, and his role in the world.
A young woman strikes up a relationship with her ailing brother's favorite musician.
Two brothers, separated in childhood, fight for the love of a princess.

A skilled Dream Weaver on a mission, to access an alternate realm that frees the human mind through dream, his down-home Florida girl determines his fate. Inspired by true events.
It will take evil to stamp out those who are the faces of evil itself.

David's life is turned upside down when an unknown illness ignites a full-blown zombie epidemic, leaving survivors with few places to hide. David rushes home to protect his pregnant wife, along the way gathering survivors.

Brandon Alexander is a Marine Staff Sergeant who returns from the dead to seek vengeance on his families killers with the help of God and an Angel named Gabriel guiding him.

movie_name: Fei yan zi da zhan du yan xia
synopsis: "Fly Sword" and "One-eyed" are two famous swordsmen in Medieval China. They fought each other, but then they becomes allies against an evil gang.

USD400,000,000 is stolen and a drug lord wants it back. The killed thief's brother is broken out of prison by a DEA bounty hunter to help find the money boat. The body count continues in Latin America.

A man (Alfredo) and his girlfriend die in an accident. His brother (Rodrigo) discovers that it was no accident and that there are more accidents and surprises, so together with Olivia they will try to discover the truth.

A clumsy, accident-prone taxicab driver, who invented the elastic-glass, risks losing his valuable invention to a group of con-men led by a crooked lawyer but the pretty lady owner of the Yellow Cab Co. comes to his aid.

When Val is released from prison, she's determined to make a new life for herself. But the criminal underworld won't let her go that easily, and her former boss won't stop until she's paid her debt - with blood.
When college student Adam Nelson acquires an old camera capable of capturing a person's soul, he is unaware that he has now become a pawn in a game of revenge related to his family's past.
Plot kept under wraps. Described as a spy thriller.

Rookie cop Denny Colt returns from the beyond as The Spirit, a hero whose mission is to fight against the bad forces in Central City.

Doctor Strange, Black Panther, and Black Widow have to assemble when they realize a secret invasion is imminent.

A weathered detective teams up with a young female archaeologist to unravel the mysterious death of a 'bog body' found in a native swamp rumored to have curative powers. A story of two wounded souls searching for healing and redemption.
After discovering that an asteroid the size of a city is going to impact Earth in less than a month, India recruits a misfit team to save the country.
Three weeks before her wedding show with Oprah, Sandra's fiancé calls it quits. With time running out and 3 crazy ex-boyfriends, can she replace him or will her fame turn to shame?

movie_name: The OUTLAW: The Living Comic Book, 666
synopsis: Sixx the lone fallen angel, hates aliens, loves man, refuses to play by either Lucifer or God's rules.

A couple struggling to conceive visit a miracle doctor as a last hope for having a child. The wife gets pregnant, but after the initial joy comes horror, as she slowly discovers the nightmarish truth behind the doctor's success.

En route to Hollywood, singer Steve, his partner Seymour and fiancée Jane, Jane's airheaded roommate Irma, and Irma's con artist fiancé Al have a series of misadventures and end up involved with a murderous gang.
Col. Guile and various other martial arts heroes fight against the tyranny of Dictator M. Bison and his cohorts.

A holiday encounter with a forsaken boyfriend forces money-grubbing Mia Stone to re-examine her past, present and future.

With issues of his own, an ex-army officer-turned-lawyer defends an impoverished young cowherd of killing a baby.

synopsis: The world is shocked by the appearance of three talking chimpanzees, who arrived mysteriously in a U.S. spacecraft. They become the toast of society, but one man believes them to be a threat to the human race.

synopsis: A parody celebrating over 50 years of Doctor Who that pokes light-hearted fun at some of the most charming tropes in Doctor Who, with cameo appearances from over 25 Doctor Who actors representing every era.

synopsis: Bigi , Luk and Patrick - Tiger Team - found a mysterious object connected to the legendary mountain of 1000 dragons. The search takes them to China where they face many dangers.

An epic gothic tale of love, betrayal, loyalty and vampires
In the alternate future where your heritage defines you will be, one young man decides to stand against tradition.

This movie is based on a book by Marie McSwigan. It is 1940 in Norway, a neutral, peace-loving country that is invaded by Nazi Germany. A gang of Norwegian children do what Norwegian children like best - ski.

When a hubristic mortgage broker almost gets murdered, his father winds up killed and he goes on a vigilante mission to discover the secret in his father's past that makes his family line a target for extermination.
A young girl struggles with a traumatic past and suffers from nightmares and flashbacks that takes her back to her childhood days.
A young carpenter is mistaken for a Catholic priest and sustains the misunderstanding to seduce a girl.
A grieving family is haunted by tragic and disturbing occurrences.

movie_name: There's No Such Thing as Vampires
synopsis: Strangers, Joshua and Ariel, crash into each other in the dead of the night. Before long they find themselves pursued across the North America desert, the target of an unstoppable supernatural force.

After a convoy of American soldiers disappears, a special ops team is deployed to rescue them. They soon encounter an army of gigantic scorpions, spiders and snakes that have come to Earth from another dimension.
In search of an ancient Chinese scroll, a Chinese agent battles against Japanese Yakuzas and British mercenaries.
Blood Sugar is the next phase of animal action crossovers. From the first word it is a guns-blazing, military action, drug-smuggling, shape-shifting, flesh-eating festival, with a Caribbean flavor.
A young woman unleashes terrifying demons when supernatural forces at the root of a decades-old rift between mother and daughter are ruthlessly revealed.

An alienated young man is desperate to find a way to pay his bills. Financial relief arrives in the form of anonymous e-mails directing him to rape women for money, photographing the crimes as evidence of his work.
A loving father teaches his family a lesson in validation the hard way.

A-Ra (Na-Kyung Ha) a real estate agent meets secretly with her male clients for fun. On the other hand Mi-Yeon (Hyun Hwa Kwak) hates men. One day she finds out someone is watching her secretly from the house across street and enjoys it.
Plot kept under wraps.

Sharon is a fast-­rising PR executive from Singapore, searching for love in Hong Kong, who may have found her dream guy, but as she chases after him online and in person, Sharon quickly finds out the dangers of stalking a secret crush.
A young girl and a group of survivors stuck within a field where every time they try to leave the field they come back to the same one.
Newspaper editor (Foster) will do almost anything to increase circulation. He campaigns to free a condemned man while accusing a wealthy ex-criminal of a string of murders.

Jeffrey is stuck in another city...in another person's body. Apparently he has a date with his body's girlfriend, Alex. In survival mode, he plays along as his body. But as the night progresses, so do their relationship.
When bodies of young women start showing up in the woods of Devils Hole, New York - a serial killer presumed dead makes top of the suspect list - dragging detectives into a dangerous game.
A Young Queen Fights for the Independence of India and the rightful Entitlement of Her Child.

Follows a mysterious Amazon hunter named Jin Takayama, the heavily-sheltered Haruka Mizusawa, and the Nozama Pest Control Service, a small group of mercenaries as they hunt down the awakening Amazons.
A G.I. Joe spin-off centered around the character of Snake Eyes.
An elite 'search and rescue' team transport onto an off-world mining-facility to rescue Whit Carmichael, the lone survivor of a biological outbreak.
New York hairdresser Izzy seizes the chance to work at the wedding of a charming prince, but when sparks between them fly, will love or duty prevail?

Follows Geronimo as he stumble on a conspiracy bigger than anything he and his collaborators have ever tackled before. They will work together to stay one step ahead of the enemy in a game of cat and mouse.

A surreal juxtaposition French film about two people that never meet nor come close to. One, a young male outlaw, and the other a young woman going through puberty/sexual development for the first time.
A popular singer with two identities falls in love with a prostitute.
Desperate to reconcile with her mother, an extraordinary and beautiful scientist returns home and is thrown into the jaws of jealousy and vengeance that catapult her into a deadly encounter
The movie is about Bertram and his family who in order to get money for a new flat are caught up in Uncle Georg's attempt to kidnap a rich boy. But things don't go as planned.
Mustapha, a taxi driver in Paris unknowing helps a jewel theft escape the police.
Serdar, a strong man trains hard on boxing to be the champion after the death of his younger brother.

In this high-octane action thriller, a cross-country road trip becomes a highway to hell for Brenda and her family. Alone in the New Mexico desert, they have to fight for their lives when they become the targets of a mysterious killer.

Debar is a story of a family of three brothers where the eldest brother loses his life while Making arrangements for the youngest brother's education. And how the youngest brother pay back to the widow of his brother.

When a goddess of war reincarnates in the body of a young girl, street orphan Seiya discovers that he is destined to protect her and save the world. But only if he can face his own past and become a Knight of the Zodiac.
When personal tragedy sets his life spinning out of control, Detective Walker finds himself being pulled back to reality by a notorious unsolved cold case that has begun to heat up.
Seven rogue soldiers launch a preemptive strike against a newly discovered alien civilization in the hopes of ending an interstellar war before it starts.
When the skeleton of his murdered predecessor is found, Sheriff Sam Deeds unearths many other long-buried secrets in his Texas border town.
Work-life balance breaks down for Paris's most gifted armed robbers when a grave mistake forces them to work for a crime boss in a high-stakes heist.

A group of college students conducts a dangerous experiment to summon and communicate with dark entities. As they delve into the occult they unwittingly unleash a malevolent force that possesses them one by one leading to a battle for their souls.
When the sorceress Klishty Ma has her romantic advances rejected by King Morpheus she kidnaps his infant child, Prince Shawn. The King and his army search for 20 years to find the heir to the throne.
A military deserter finds love and trouble (and a small dog) in a foggy, French port city.

A young postman becomes involved in the theft of rare stamps featuring inverted images of the Statue of Liberty. Along the way he encounters attractive criminal Clara Kelso, double-crossing gang members, and Post Office Inspectors.

Ancient Aztec prophecies are fulfilled, after the fall of meteorite fragments and extraterrestrial material that impact the earth. Bizarre events occur, in the different spaces and times of the collisions.
A romantic comedy centered on a couple who schemes to keep their best friends from divorcing, only to experience strife in their own relationship.

A Czar who attempts to trick a creature that demands tribute from him into taking a fisherman's baby instead of his newborn heir. Complications arise when the daughter of the creature, Barbara, requests a human suitor to find true love.
During the Cold War, an American industrial-designer living in London is used by the MI-6 as an unwilling pawn in the spy game during a trip to a trade show in East Germany.
A stately home robbery takes an evil turn one night when a gang of young thieves are caught by the owners of the house and then hunted across the estate for the proprietor's entertainment.
When Michele Chadwick's best friend Sophia accidentally awakens the spirit of a malevolent witch that died centuries ago, Michele has to find a way to save her soul from eternal damnation.
Wild goings on in a private girl's junior high school.
Multi-part dramatization of the life of St. Paul.
In Cold Light is a psychological thriller that explores the interrogation of a respected priest from a boys school by a ruthless Inspector, following the murder of one of the priest's students.
The Wei family is gathering to sort their differences out over dinner, but when a wounded super soldier on the run crashes their gathering, they must come together or die.
Two young men meet at a psychiatric hospital, where they become friends willing to fight against injustice.
In order to find her future, a young woman must go back through her past.

Scott Lang and Hope Van Dyne, along with Hank Pym and Janet Van Dyne, explore the Quantum Realm, where they interact with strange creatures and embark on an adventure that goes beyond the limits of what they thought was possible.
After learning that early slasher films were inspired by a real person, a group of college students visit the killer's hometown to film a documentary. However, everything may not be as it seems.

An indie musician unexpectedly meets a motorcycle taxi driver in Saigon on a beautiful morning. They decide to spend the whole day just wandering and singing songs about life, mistakes they've made, and the burning dreams in their hearts.
