A tense and sexy thriller. A tragic love story. An illicit affair turns to jewellery theft and bloody murder.
A man with ties to an ancient secret society is overpowered by a destructive supernatural being and must contain it to save mankind.
A lonely groundskeeper to a beautiful neighborhood deals with the crushing guilt of a local murder, eventually losing himself as he desperately tries to keep an innocence he never truly lost.
The life story of Xiao Hong, one of China's most famous essayists and novelists, who reflected the progressive thinking not frequently seen during the 1930s.
An old woman, dying, tells two Malaysian bandits and Judge Maggie about a diamond of rare beauty and size.
A traveling girl stumbles into prostitution, only to become a high priced Madam.

movie_name: The Ghost Club: Spirits Never Die
synopsis: The Ghost Club: Spirits Never Die is a fun, sexy, tongue-in-cheek movie about a TV Reality Ghost show, descended from the famous Ghost Club of Harry Houdini and Sir Conan Doyle.
In an alternate Europe populated by monstrous creatures, at the beginning of 20th century, a thief is kidnapped and wakes up in a luxury train leaving Moscow for Paris.

Down on his luck and unlikely hero, Jim Crawley is having the worst day of his miserable life. He decides to end it all and even fails at that. An improbable event changes everything and he becomes a half man/half creature.
Follows notable characters, such as Oliver Twist, Ebenezer Scrooge, Jacob Marley and even a young Charles Dickens as they try to save Old London from imminent destruction.
When a drug mule's son is abducted, she teams up with her estranged older sister - a bad-ass, middle-aged cop - to fight their way through a gang who smuggles drugs on cruise ships.

A married man suffering from midlife crisis obsesses over a girl from his romantic fantasy. He meets her exact duplicate on vacation and helps her get rid of her abusive husband. They run off together but a caller starts blackmailing him.
Julie Kohler is prevented from suicide by her mother. She leaves the town. She will track down, charm and kill five men who do not know her. What is her goal? What is her purpose?
A cross-country airliner, whose passengers include a nuclear physicist, a rocket expert, and a mathematical genius, is drawn beyond radar range by an unknown, unbreakable force.
The quarrelling heirs of a deceased millionaire are not allowed to receive their share of wealth until they have found his son, who has long been lost in the forest.

movie_name: Lupin the Third: Goemon's Blood Spray
synopsis: Lupin's friend, the samurai Goemon Ishikawa, takes a job as bodyguard for a yakuza boss. But a brutal assassin kills the yakuza and Goemon is honor-bound to track him down.
The son of a sorceress, armed with weapons, armour and six magically summoned knights, embarks on a quest to save a princess from a vengeful wizard.
A psycho videotapes his dismemberment of strippers.
In order to give her son a good future, Ganga sets out on a journey to Kolkata to find her husband who left her.

A road trip is only fun as long as the car keeps moving. When a group of friends run into car trouble, they believe that they have found shelter at a nearby camp. Little do they know that they will soon be running for their lives.

After strange trumpet-like sounds in the sky have been reported at locations around the world, a wannabe journalist sets out to investigate with her best friend, but they soon find themselves facing an encounter with terrifying results.
When Lucy's brother vanishes into an abandoned building in Detroit, she embarks on a journey into the terrifying world of The Tower to discover all those whom it has consumed.

A young hitchhiker is picked up by four drunken hunters, one of whom rapes her. A tough prosecutor has all four of the men indicted for the crime, which results in a suicide and a murder-for-hire plot.

Chris Nielsen dies in an accident, and enters Heaven. But when he discovers that his beloved wife Annie has killed herself out of grief over the loss, he embarks on an afterlife adventure to reunite with her.

In the near future, a police officer specializes in malfunctioning robots. When a robot turns out to have been programmed to kill, he begins to uncover a homicidal plot to create killer robots... and his son becomes a target.

The colorful holiday classic is brought to the big screen, designed by famed children's story author and artist Maurice Sendak, and written to be as close to the original story. Based on the Pacific Northwest Ballet's original production.
The story of a young prosecutor who rises swiftly to power, but tumbles even quicker.
A renowned artist's life descends into chaos when he is haunted by the spirit of an unknown girl.

movie_name: Rifftrax: Solo: A Star Wars Story
synopsis: Strap on a vest and your smirkiest smirk, it's time for Solo. The first Star Wars title that tells you exactly how high to set your expectations.

Christy Taylor a successful wedding expert falls for bombshell Bobby Jean. CJ explores pansexuality and a whirlwind wedding in her small Oklahoma hometown. Old flame Bud Barnett complicates CJ's plan as she swirls in this romantic tornado.
It tells the story of a flawed everyman who commits a crime. He soon learns how far he is willing to go to save his child.
1950. Drama. Directed by John Gilling. Writer Robert Southley finds his lifestyle threatened by blackmail from a former American criminal associate. Stars Hugh Sinclair, Dinah Sheridan & John Laurie.
A beautiful mistress lures a NY detective into the future to solve a murder, but doesn't know not only did she do it, but he is now her pry.
Visual album from Beyoncé inspired by 'The Lion King'.

Cisco is an ex-con recently released from prison who wants to start a new life for himself. But a local drug dealer wants $10,000 for a past debt which forces Cisco into the underground world of crime once again to figure a way out.

A cop chases two hippies suspected of a series of Manson family-like murders; unbeknownst to him, the real culprits are the living dead, brought to life with a hunger for human flesh by ultrasonic radiation being used for pest control.
While searching for a cure for his terminally ill daughter in the Yucatan, a geneticist must become a mystical warrior and prevent the mass DNA alteration of all life on earth.
A sadistic killer cult kidnaps and sacrifices beautiful women. A young girl, just paroled from prison, moves into a strange house and appears to be the cult's next victim.
An American underworld up-and-comer relocates to Europe and immerses himself in the dangerous and mysterious world of heroin production.
There are no barriers for champions, only hurdles.
After receiving an unusual business proposal, a young woman experiences strange phenomena.

A millionaire leads an expedition into a remote jungle to find his wife's long-lost brother, but instead the group finds a mad scientist who has created a fungus monster that feeds on the local inhabitants.
A movie about the power of friendship and courage during an exciting and thrilling adventure. A story about growing up, the fear of loss and finding yourself.
A story set in the ACME warehouse, the manufacturer of anything and everything used by the Looney Tunes characters.

CASE 347 follows psychologist and UFO skeptic, Dr. Mia Jansen (Maya Stojan), and a team of documentary filmmakers who believe that alien abduction claims are forms of "mass hysteria". This is their footage:
On a snowy night in 1963, a student goes missing in the woods. As her friends search for her, they confront the shadow projection and demonization that their idyllic school was built on.

The fairy tale follows a young man named Gusuko in the Tohoku forests of northeastern Japan in the 1920s. After an onslaught of droughts and natural disasters, Gusuko is forced to leave his home and search for a better life elsewhere.
Plot is unknown. The 2nd installment of the 'DUE JUSTICE' franchise.

While trying to escape their sins, three men's paths cross when they hide in the same cave to shelter from a heavy storm; these unacquainted sinners self-reckoning begins as they await their death in the cave blocked by a landslide.
From the midnight drug deal to the desperate actions of the day to the senseless killing that night.
A hard-core New York Giants fan struggles to deal with the consequences when he is beaten up by his favorite player.
From the ashes of a fallen society, a new cluster of assassins will rise, to avenge their dead comrades.
Anthology of stories, sadness and happiness.
The plot of the film is based on the investigation by the world famous detective Drongo of a mysterious incident that took place in a settlement in the mountainous region of Azerbaijan.
A romantic drama that centers on a young woman who dreams of being a professional dancer, but is derailed by a series of tragedies that destroys her family and nearly her dreams.
The seemingly perfect honeymoon of two newlyweds is disrupted by the memories of another, similar holiday.
Aircraft designer/patriot R. J. Mitchell, alarmed at growing German militarism, works to perfect a defense against the German Messerschmidt at the cost of his health.
A story about a pocket-sized apocalypse shows the day when electricity disappears and the road becomes a dog-eat-dog world.

A psycho-killer with mommy issues, a charming crooked cowboy and their girl steal some jewels. The cowboy decides not to share and goes on the run with the loot. A crazy chase across the country between former partners in crime begins.
Frankenstein's creature finds himself caught in an all-out, centuries-old war between two immortal clans.
Every machine needs fuel.... Every machine needs repair... Every machine breaks down.

movie_name: El largo viaje de Nahuel Pan
synopsis: Nahuel Pan, a Mapuche, decides to go to Buenos Aires in oder to announce the needs of his community.
Luis and Carlitos are quite different, but they share the same passion: football. These men reunite after 10 years apart in the most crucial moment of their lives.

Police brigade faces strong pressure from their bosses to improve their arrest and drug seizure stats. The team engages in a mission where moral and professional boundaries are pushed to their breaking point.
A lonely son of a rich industrialist falls in love with a poor girl but life won't be easy for him without his mother's consent. A local goon is also deeply in love with the same girl.

Three women struggle to survive in the Alaskan wilderness after a mysterious event has left them homeless. Along the way, they encounter other survivors who are out to help or hurt them, as well as a dangerous supernatural presence.
A sage uses his powers to discredit a wealthy and compassionate married male.

Reignmaker is a taut adventure thriller set against the back drop of the illegal horn and ivory trade, its immediate and long-term impacts, as well as its connections to global terrorism and broader humanitarian issues.

Completely innocent man, Michael Jordon, is drawn into a web of government secrets when a girl carrying a mysterious package gets into a taxi with him. When she's later murdered, Michael becomes the chief suspect and goes on the run.
50 abducted women are forced to fight each other using their bare hands.
The recently widowed Mary Stuart returns to Scotland to reclaim her throne but is opposed by her half-brother and her own Scottish lords.
Professor John Sola (Eric Roberts) wants to do a human experiment about authority. When his subjects start dying one by one, he learns that somebody else wants to do a project about Solitude.
Dick Tracy goes up against a villain known as The Ghost, who can turn himself invisible.
A supernatural battle for souls plays out on the streets with lots of guns and knives.

Callan (Brian Austin Green) returns to the scene with his team in order to oppose the return of the evil Gunnar (Vinnie Jones); his path crosses again with Frank Nitti (Tom Sizemore) detective under the city of Los Angeles.
Jenna was just a newborn when her mother left her to die in a frozen winter forest. 17 years later, Jenna tracks her mother down and invades her new family disguised as a babysitter.
A young woman takes work on a Martha's Vineyard farm and befriends the 10-year-old farmer's daughter only to discover present-day horrors that stem from a dark past.
A teenage boy and his little sister are thrust into an adrenaline-charged adventure when they find out their gregarious babysitter is in fact the legendary super hero known as Agent-Action.
Jack London's classic adventure story about the friendship developed between a Yukon gold hunter and the mixed dog-wolf he rescues from the hands of a man who mistreats him.
On Halloween night, the rules are simple. House lights bring the kids to get candy. But, when it gets late and really dark, the rules change.
A professor marries a nightclub singer, much to the consternation of his family and friends back home.
A surreal adaptation of Shakespeare's classic tragedy set in a fantasy world of constantly changing realities and dimensions.
"Jack Hunter's Paranoia Tapes" is the longest running found footage franchise in history. Now, find find all of the best shorts from every installment of the award winning series in one place.
Katarina is a woman alone, at least so she appears. She is a woman lost, in love, an artist...angst-ridden. Katarina is a woman seeking transcendence.
A clerk in a law office investigates a murder, and finds that nearly all her colleagues at work have a motive.
Superhero Christopher Ember confronts his nemesis The White Magician in a fiery battle to save the streets of Boston.
A musical retelling of Charles Dickens' classic novel about an old bitter miser taken on a journey of self-redemption, courtesy of several mysterious Christmas apparitions.
Two small time drug-dealers cross paths with a female-assassin, a monster hunter, a Japanese swordsman and even the Devil himself at a gentlemen's club housing murderous she-demons.
A fatal explosion and sudden earthquake rock Los Angeles, and reporter John Benson seizes his chance to cover the breaking news of increasing seismic activity.
A student tries to fix a problem he accidentally caused in OZ, a digital world, while pretending to be the fiancé of his friend at her grandmother's 90th birthday.
The revenge is always happening in mysterious ways, and you know why you are getting your revenge. but, is the victim knows too?

Spain, 1602. The knights of the order of the sword of Joan of Arc have been defeated. After generations of fierce fighting against the herald of hell, El Caminante, who has broken the ...                See full synopsis »
A Picture Bubbling with LAUGHTER, ROMANCE, DRAME, ADYVENTURE.
Stephanie and Ryan switch bodies after a magic night together.
A fantasy-comedy about a man whose many wishes start coming true -- including those from his childhood.
A fallen angel named Daniel hunts down the Immortals who want to kill his lover, Luce.
A reporter strives to solve the identity of a vigilante that has begun to take action in his city.
In a distant time and place, power is decided by a cruel game in which two teams of gladiators fight in a vast arena.
Superman battles Lex Luthor who is using a teleportation device and a new identity as Atom Man in his criminal plans.
A group of scientists exploring the Marianas Trench encounter the largest marine predator that has ever existed - the Megalodon.
A delightfully funny and entertaining on screen theater adventure set in the magical land of Woz.

Chaos embodies the turbulent life of an assassin - from a murder-for-hire plot as a kid to an organizer in a deadly all-female martial arts tournament, all while fighting an all-female assassin squad and psychotic wife along the way.
A team of experts travels deep into the mountains to find a dangerous creature.

movie_name: The Girl Who Married a Ghost
synopsis: A rich and powerful chief chases away the local men who pursue his beautiful daughter, so a handsome shaman transforms himself into a spirit and tricks the girl into running away with him.

movie_name: Doraemon: Nobita and the New Steel Troops: ~Winged Angels~
synopsis: Nobita and Doraemon find a giant robot in pieces, which they later assemble and it turns out to be a destructive weapon. A girl comes searching for the robot. Will Nobita and gang be able to save earth from imminent invasion.
A secret family of four-inch people living inside the walls of a house must save their home from an evil real estate developer.
A haunted investigator teams up with a psychic on a mysterious job that promises a fortune: a search to bring a missing stranger home by Christmas.
An anonymous love letter left in Michael Ryan's locker on the last day of school wreaks havoc on his life and the lives of everyone who come in contact with it.
The scheme of a pair of married con artists goes awry when their victim dies, and they are both caught and imprisoned. When she gets out of prison, she tries to put her life back together.

A physician on death row for a mercy killing is allowed to experiment on a serum using a criminals' blood, but secretly tests it on himself. He gets a pardon, but finds out he's become a Jekyll-&-Hyde.

movie_name: Hot Wheels Acceleracers the Ultimate Race
synopsis: Both team are working to get markey back from the drones while vert has to race the ultimate race through the realms

In a small Town in the early 1900's there was once a legend about a Sickle Man, this killer was brutal and would only kill because he was told too! But who told him to slaughter, was it Supernatural? The legend lives on!
A family adopts a friendly dinosaur as their pet.
John Wick is on the run after killing a member of the international assassins' guild, and with a $14 million price tag on his head, he is the target of hit men and women everywhere.
In 1899 Alaska, miners have to protect themselves from a phony legal team trying to steal their gold claims.
A power-hungry sorcerer curses a princess to live as a swan by day in this tale of everlasting love.

Waking up, different sights around while the world looks beautiful and all, a journey awaits, while the world changes around, solutions arise to a destination of surprise of what happened and how to bring back life that might have ended.
Sonia is a princess, from the underworld, sent to manifest confusion in the lives of her male victims. She uses her beauty and demonic powers to take her preys away from their destined lives.
Perera, a public prosecutor, sends Prabhakara Menon's son Vinu to the gallows for murdering Alex. Actually it was Perera's son who killed Alex. Menon enrolls as a lawyer to bring Perera to book.

movie_name: Max Bent Part Time P.I. In: If Not Us Then Who?
synopsis: Follow the wild neo-noir misadventures of Max and the gang as they save the girl, and the world, from nefarious corporate evildoers. Set in Millennium City in 2020.
A corrupt police officer is entrusted the task of apprehending drug-dealers.
A young girl named Jana takes a magical journey to Africa.
Three friends come up with a self-kidnapping plan goes awry.

The gentle man on the moon is lonely and wants to dance and have fun with the people of Earth, but when he comes to Earth on a comet, he's mistaken for an invader and must find his way back home. Based on the beloved children's book.
Left home alone with his dog Harry, young Ray finds himself in a bit of trouble when Harry gets loose in the suspicious neighbor's house and accidentally knocks over a top-secret invisibility potion.
An American family buys land in Africa and declare themselves as royalty.
Agent Z, professionally known as Zone, has mastered the use of the third Artery. Mastering the third artery stops aging. A task of finding a mythical weapon of mass destruction awaits.
After greedy men have Edmond Dantes unjustly imprisoned for 20 years for innocently delivering a letter entrusted to him, he escapes to get his revenge on them.
Based on the story of Andre Bamberski, who fought to bring his daughter's presumed murderer to justice for 27 years.

Raja (Khanna) discovers that his face is similar to that of Dr. Shekhar, one of the top earning doctors of Bombay. He somehow manages to take his place, but discovers that even Dr. Shekhar has problems of his own.
Joel, a mid-20s model concerned that his wife Sofia is cheating on him.
A skeptical grad student and a renowned paranormal specialist investigate a potentially haunted home and the troubled woman inside whose affliction may be beyond the capacity of either of them.
A film about a combat veteran's need for redemption, about saving mankind, learning to trust again, and most importantly... kicking alien ass.
A thief operating solo romances a lady at a masked ball and later helps the police by bringing a gang of fellow crooks to justice.
Rodney Alcala was a killer in the midst of a killing spree when he brazenly took part and won a date on the popular TV game show "The Dating Game".
Several stories from the famous Chinese myth Journey to the West.

In the throes of a quarter-life crisis, Megan panics when her boyfriend proposes. She takes an opportunity to escape for a week, hiding out in the house of her new 16-year-old friend Annika and her world-weary single dad.
Divya loved Suraj who is now no more she marries Vijay for the sake of her family and plans to divorce him soon but will Vijay agree to her terms.

During WWII, handsome young Italian sub commander and his crew torpedo Allied freighters and transport ships for the Axis then rescue the occasional survivor and treat them humanely while seeking a safe place to put them ashore.
The story of Felipe Pugoy, a troubled inmate who, with his gang, instigated a hostage crisis in a Davao City prison that led to 21 deaths (5 hostages and 16 inmates, including Pugoy) in 1989.
A small group of student filmmakers and a shy young girl with strict parents are simultaneously manipulated, seduced and abused by an older man. They follow his bidding, even when murder is involved.
A roguish poet is given the run of the scheming Wazir's harem while pretending to help him usurp the young caliph.
A battle between a man who can control people with a stare, and the only man he cannot control. When their fate cross, the survival battle begins. The two men with inevitable fate, who will survive ?
After traveling back in time, a divorced workaholic must repeat his past footsteps in order to return to an unaltered present, but struggles when it means re-proposing to his ex-wife.
In 1948, an assortment of shady characters are searching for Nazi loot, sunken off the coast of Peru.
When the manic Dr Robotnik returns to Earth with a new ally, Knuckles the Echidna, Sonic and his new friend Tails is all that stands in their way.

When an adventurous Hmong teen discovers a secret map to a mythical dragon, he and his three best friends decide to go on a quest that leads them on a journey filled with danger, excitement, and self-discovery.

movie_name: Jelger de Goochelaar en de wraak van Annabel
synopsis: Annabel, her gang of criminals and the jewelry thief Friedrich Smiecht escape from prison. Along with the evil wizard Balthazar, they forge a revengeful plan to have Jelger falsely accused of robbing a bank.
Brother Andrew risked his life to bring hope across the borders of Communist countries during the Cold-War.
A weekend of hiking turns into a fight for survival when five friends become caught in a revenge horror fueled by supernatural forces.

Premachandran, a carpenter by profession, dreams nothing but a lovely and peaceful life with his father. After taking an ill-treated maid, Kanmani, into care, he realizes the need of a woman in every man's life.
A psychiatrist (Bakula) gets involved with his best friend's wife (Field) who may be a murderer.
A gold=digger (Winnie Lightner) goes after money from her ex-husbands (Ole Olsen, Chic Johnson), swimsuit salesmen now married to twins.
An origins story centered on the centuries-old feud between the race of aristocratic vampires and their onetime slaves, the Lycans.
The adventures of teenager Max McGrath and his alien companion, Steel, who must harness and combine their tremendous new powers to evolve into the turbo-charged superhero Max Steel.

movie_name: Tell Me That You Love Me, Junie Moon
synopsis: The story of three wildly neurotic characters: A facially disfigured girl, a homosexual paraplegic and an introvert epileptic who, after leaving the hospital, set up housekeeping together in a cottage where they support each other.

movie_name: Kishiryu Sentai Ryusoulger vs. Lupinranger vs. Patranger
synopsis: A Gangler remnant, Ganima, captures Tyramigo and the other Kishiryu inside his safe. To save them, the Ryusoulgers chase after Ganima and come into contact with the Patrangers and Lupinrangers.
When the body of a drifter is discovered the same day a photographer arrives in a small farming community, the local sheriff is left to piece together a string of events that don't quite add up.
Sarah Taylor, a criminal psychologist, embarks on a torrid affair with a seductive stranger. However, she begins doubting whether she can trust him when a mysterious stalker begins harassing her.
In a dangerous post-apocalyptic world, an ailing father defends his son as they slowly travel to the sea.
Gene, a multi-expressional emoji, sets out on a journey to become a normal emoji.

The life of Filipok, a young man with a romantic personality, which happens in the first half of the 20th century in Soviet Russia. Filipok finds love with a young women, Zinochka who is of aristocratic roots.
Heroic tale of a swashbuckler and his patriotic comrades who defend their nation against enemies both external and internal.

Damon Miller is a filmmaker grappling with the pressures of an impoverished profession and a dissolving relationship. One routine assignment will change his life as he is involved in the disturbing research into Near-Earth Objects.
An ambitious shoe salesman who unknowingly meets his boss's daughter and tells her he is a leather tycoon has to try to hide his true circumstances.

A struggling film critic decides to take on a "bad attitude" to achieve fame and success as the ANGRY MOVIE GUY. When his review destroys the career of a woman he's fallen in love with he must rethink his life.
An empowering family friendly tale about a girl, a horse and what they can accomplish together when given the opportunity.
A police officer attempts to change a dacoit into a good person and also gets him married to a beautiful village girl. However, circumstances do not let the changed man live happily.
A woman becomes furious when her husband arrives home from the local pub and turns into a rat.

After receiving cryptic invitations, seven strangers meet at a castle where their eccentric host informs them they are the sole descendants of a damned family and that they have until dawn to break the curse or be condemned for eternity.

movie_name: Shark, You Son of the Son of a Bitch
synopsis: This time, is inconsequential.
An orphaned girl discovers a magical garden hidden at her strict uncle's estate.
Aaron uses LookApp, an App that allows you to see where you will be in a short period of time, to discover if his girlfriend (Aura) and her best friend (N) are going to go together in a week.
After inheriting an ominous painting, a family soon becomes disturbed by a demonic presence known as The Whispering Man.

movie_name: Twilight of the Warriors: Walled In
synopsis: Plot under wraps.
Five friends accidentally awaken an ancient evil while hiking in Arizona. They must fight to survive both a demonic spirit and the small tribe who worships it.
A young woman who is haunted by memories of her childhood, slowly tries to put the pieces of her past together, but in doing so, she awakens a horror she had long since forgotten.
Krrish and his scientist father must save the world and their own family from an evil man named Kaal and his gang of mutants, led by the ruthless Kaya.
Alex, a boy obsessed with scary stories, is imprisoned by an evil young witch in her contemporary New York City apartment.
Koike Minami returns from USA to Japan to accomplish her deceased twin sister's wish to win a competition and sing with Avril Lavigne on the stage in a concert in Tokyo.
The story of an Indian girl falling in love with an American in 80s USA.

Concentrated deep within the far reaches of the United States lies an inexplicable evil. The most violent sect of the Aryan Nations known as the "Children of Mallus" are hellbent on carrying out a modern day holocaust.
A crazed killer known as "The Bat" is on the loose in a mansion full of people.
Amalie's dance crew advances to the global finals in France. Torn between the love of Mikael, the longing for her absent mother, and her fire for dance, Amalie must choose. Who is she to become?
War-hungry teddy bears journey from bootcamp to the psychedelic terrors of the Magic Forest in this darkly beautiful horror animation.
Out of the Fight is a feature film dealing with a hardened US Army Soldier fighting the demons of Post Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD).
A homicide detective accidentally stabs his girlfriend while wrestling with a murderer. But the killer returns.

On the Elven planet Despian, the battle for the throne is triggered by yet another assassination. The Du'ari clan seeks to strike the elves while they are weak, leaderless. Who will lead Despian to victory against their attackers?

A love triangle emerges when two men, Prakash and Motilal, fall in love with the same woman, Nilu. Complications arise when, after looking at several photographs at Motilal's home, Prakash realizes that Motilal is his long-lost brother.
A man goes on an adventure.
Sophie and Pete get engaged on their first date, which is a 6-hour drive through the desert. And then nothing goes wrong... nothing at all.
A collection of characters threaten to cross paths, unknowingly, during a night in the big city. The film focuses on two hit men who are bound to collide with Cates, a beautiful prostitute.

Racial discrimination is still present at the life of the valley of Baztan after more than ten centuries. A young man rebels against the discrimination suffered and which were also subjected his ancestors. Just for being Agotes.
A Las Vegas mob enforcer travels back to his hometown to investigate his brother's mysterious death.
An American reporter smells a story when he is stranded in an Iron Curtain country where the local dictator is using gamma rays to transform children into mutated henchmen.

movie_name: Mi abuelo, mi perro y yo
synopsis: With his permissive grandfather's consent, a young boy and his gang confront their older rivals.
A twin brother of the protagonist is absorbed due to Vanishing Twin Syndrome and controls his left hand. When his life is threatened, the twin brother that never existed protects him like a shield.
The exciting adventures of an 11-year-old tomboy growing up in the Wisconsin frontier of the 1860s. Based on the children's book.
To avoid prison, a gang of notorious animal criminals pretends to seek being rehabilitated, only for their leader to realize that he genuinely wants to change his ways.
In a twisted world, a husband kills his wife by accident and buries her in the backyard. His life becomes miserable when his house becomes haunted.
Infame is on a quest to make his mark in this world as a Rapper, Writer and Romantic, but despite his best intentions, the universe and his army of ex's are determined to get in his way.
A special effects artist alters his appearance to gain the attention of a famous actress he is obsessed with.
Pavithran, a police constable, has been assigned to investigate the murder of union leader Ajayan. He disguises himself as a coir merchant to unravel the case.
A killer who only hits people who deserve it is tricked into killing an innocent man. He then seeks revenge against the people who employed him.
A teenage boy is cursed with periodically turning into a sheepdog.
A woman's desperate search for her brother in the capital of Mexico.
A dangerous drug lord; a renegade cop; the ultimate showdown.
Ana trae su caballo de carreras 'de Lady Godiva' el rancho de su padre. El caballo se enamora de un semental propiedad de su vecino Licio. Una historia llena de aventura y un final sorprendente.

movie_name: Long quan she shou dou zhi zhu
synopsis: Lee Tso Nam's Challenge of Death features students of two different schools of martial arts, Snake Fist and Dragon Fist, teaming up in order to stop a drug smuggler who fights with the dreaded Spider Claws.

In an attempt to shake off her melancholy, a young woman escapes the city to her family's country cottage only to rediscover a world she'd long forgotten and the old friend who may convince her to leave reality behind.
A quirky rom-com where Kush finds the ideal Indian bride Dimple for his brother Luv and a series of comical and unpredictable events follow.

The oceans have disappeared. Borders are open. The Global Police is revered by some and hated by many. The fate of humanity rests on a young water scavenger and a rebellious orphan, whose lives intertwine more closely than they think.
Revolves around the mysterious death of India's 2nd Prime Minister Shri Lal Bahadur Shastri and attempts to uncover if he had actually died a natural death, or, as alleged, was assassinated.
The streets of Compton are flooded during a Monsoon, unleashing a horde of ravenous Sharks on the local community.

In the distant future a refugee lives in peace on an uninhabited island. A surprise arrival by those he left behind and a simple mistake compromise his situation, sending him into a nightmarish struggle to survive and keep his freedom.
Two sailors sneak a talking duck on board their ship. Complications ensue.
There is a reason you shouldn't go down into the woods today, as a gang of youths will soon discover that they're in for a bloody surprise - Literally.
Paul Kingsley is forced to face his past when his daughter Claire returns home and is hunted, along with her friends, by an unknown killer.

In this movie we explore the abandoned World of a man's fear. Discover the secret that is buried deep inside his mind. Are you ready for a ride into Madness? Follow him on his dark journey to the Heart of Nightmares.
A successful artist loses control of his life after his young daughter's death. A chance for a new start appears, but all is not what it seems.
After much drama, cheating, and trial separations, two men fight to save their respective relationships.
The comic strip detective finds his life vastly complicated when Breathless Mahoney makes advances towards him while he is trying to battle Big Boy Caprice's united mob.
Earthquakes in central Korea turn out to be the work of Yongary, a prehistoric gasoline-eating reptile that soon goes on a rampage through Seoul.

Russia sends a dog called Whyka into space. With the help of a monkey called Buster, Dot rescues the stranded dog only to end up on a planet ruled by fascist Papa Drop who wages war on those who aren't perfectly shaped.

Doctor Fenton is abducted and forced to operate on a mysterious figure. Meanwhile, Inspector Austin investigates the murder of Fenton's assistant. All this has something to do with a missing diplomat.
Clumsy blacksmiths Cornelius and Crispín become the sidekicks of a masked hero who plans to unravel the frauds of a churlish military captain.
After his car breaks down, Glen spends one hell of an odd night with a married couple, setting into motion a chain of events that alter their lives plus those of several random strangers.
Two men are treated with hostility by idiosyncratic, upper class residents of a mysterious mansion.
Every summer war games are played out between the rich kids and the not-so-rich. To assure a possible win, war leader Marc decided to add another tactic to these games--terrorism.

Four strangers come together on an alien world after their home planets are destroyed. Asully, Weston, Dejonay, and Shione, face the challenge of protecting the Zanarians from annihilation from their arch nemesis Framana and his army.
Musical retelling of the "Ali Baba and the 40 Thieves" Arabian Nights tale.
A getaway driver for a bank robbery realizes he has been double crossed and races to find out who betrayed him.
In the dark corridors of Félix's house, an intruder is hiding. Is he real, or is he a manifestation inside the obscure maze of his mind?
A rich kid starts making a documentary about a punk gang. At the beginning he is only a spectator, he falls in love with the leader, and becomes part of the gang. At the end everyone dies. C. I. A.
The biggest fork in the road of reality as college graduates face a crossroads of youth and adulthood.
Project Dark Forest has been stolen. The Red King has dispatched his soldiers. The Chimera is hunted. Death to all.
Four teenage sleuths solve a case regarding abducted children and teenagers and a mind machine.
Abdullatif finds himself stranded on the beach of an island after his boat sank in the middle of the sea, and he must face his fate alone.
A Sci-Fi animation thriller about a dystopian world.
Antony falls in love with Rajeswari who belongs to an upper caste family. When her father kills her sister for marrying a man from the lower caste, she decides to elope with Antony.
A team of con artists think they've found the perfect setup conning pedophiles. That is until they extort the wrong man whose connections threaten to wipe them all out.
Toma and Ana meet as students in the literature faculty and quickly fall in love.
A female engineer, with the assistance of her pilot-wannabe male friend, discovers a way to rip off ATM machines, but in doing so stumbles upon a plot to destroy the U.S. monetary system.

With the impending Y2K apocalypse fast approaching, Abbie is faced with the ultimate challenge - the unbeatable level 256 on Pac-Man - and he can't get off the couch until he conquers it. A survival story set in a living room.

In the year 2019, a plague has transformed almost every human into vampires. Faced with a dwindling blood supply, the fractured dominant race plots their survival; meanwhile, a researcher works with a covert band of vamps on a way to save humankind.
When a long lost tribe stakes its claim to Animal Paradise, Yugo, Lala and Uncle Bear team up once more, this time with parental supervision.

Jane Osgood runs a lobster business, which supports her two young children. Railroad staff inattention ruins her shipment, so with her lawyer George, Jane sues Harry Foster Malone, director of the line and the "meanest man in the world".
A group of mercenaries come together to pull of an epic heist.

When a young man ends his life, his friends uncover the secret of his death, a site on the dark web, where desperate people pay for their end. His friends become targets and two detectives follow a trail of bodies, mistaking victims as suspects, until they find themselves a part of a killer's larger plan.
Savage satire comes with ghosts and cartoonish violence in Fruit Chan's Coffin Homes, a gruesome set of horror tales with Hong Kong's astronomically priced housing market as the backdrop.

Set in 1825, Clare, a young Irish convict woman, chases a British officer through the rugged Tasmanian wilderness, bent on revenge for a terrible act of violence he committed against her family. On the way she enlists the services of an Aboriginal tracker named Billy, who is also marked by trauma from his own violence-filled past.
A poor schoolgirl and a young man from a wealthy family have an affair.
THREE MEN FROM THE JUNGLE EXPERIENCE LIFE IN THE CITY AND REALIZE WHAT THE JUNGLE MEANS TO THEM.

In 2323, space colonies are at war with each other for resources. A scavenger arrives on one of the abandoned planets. There he meets a stranded armed unit. While exploring they encounter an unstoppable creature.
Teresa, an artificial intelligence family assistant, is given to a family in Bogotá, Colombia, for beta testing.
Based on Hans Christian Andersen's The Little Mermaid, Deep Of The Sea is a modern day twist on the classic tale.
Kao is given a mission by his elderly master to take a cursed sword and solve petty squabbles between skilled martial masters.
A former Special Operations Vietnam vet works as a Chicago cop, and uncovers C.I.A. wrongdoing.
A step-by-step look at a murder investigation on the streets of New York.

A group of teenagers decide to go on a trip to Via Transilvanica, where they find a ghost named Katharina. They decide to bring her back in town, and try to integrate her into society. Katharina was Vlad the Impaler mistress.
A female nurse desperately tries to hide her feelings of necrophilia from her new boyfriend, but still has pieces of the corpse of the first movie's hero in her possession.

Kenan, a construction worker, is unsatisfied with his life due to being in debt and their inability to bear a child with his wife Zeynep. Things get worse when his ex-fiancée Nazli tries to get back with Kenan by casting a spell on him.
Ulysses offends the gods by blinding the Cyclops, so they send Hercules to capture him and bring him to them.
Five women are summoned to battle evil. They each represent a color; red, blue, green, yellow and navy. Together, they must learn to work together as a team to save the world.
A security guard for an armored truck company begins to exhibit unusual behavior. A remake of the French thriller 'Le convoyeur'.
Two sisters Simran and Alia go on a vacation to Lonavala, where they experience paranormal activity at the bungalow that they're put up in, as an evil spirit takes over the place.
An aspiring politician uses her brother's murder as the turning point in her campaign, in order to win a State's election.

Juggling two jobs to make ends meet, a hard-pressed accountant gets his lucky break when he rents his house to an unknown tenant. But, is he a righteous man or a lascivious bachelor in need of a place to shelter his sinful liaisons?

Erotic drama set in an underground Tokyo club called The Bedroom, where the female clientele are drugged into a trance-like state and are subjected to different styles of bizarre, fetishistic sex by the male clientele.
prediction: Erotic (not a genre, but closest would be drama)

synopsis: A boy is in search of his mother in the estuary of the dirty Yellow River. He finds pollution, oppression, drugs and violence and yet he does not lose his will to live.
Enemy spies try to steal a new fighter plane.

A psychiatrist searches for insight into the life of his father, who was an acclaimed children's author. But he is shocked when his journey leads him to believe that the fantasy-land his father wrote about might actually exist.
An alcoholic American couple travel to Ireland with their son so he can meet his grandmother but they walk in on their crazed uncle who is in the midst of reviving a centuries-old Druid witch.

Dark Sunrise, a suspense horror thriller, has deep roots in the underworld. Three teenage girls arrive at a summer resort with their families, to discover a menacing creature has invaded their innocent world, with unwelcome results.

While her mama is at the hospital to give birth, and her dad has gone off with a mistress, Maja has to survive by herself and her grandma, thanks to her Indian costume and her second Indian identity as Maja Stoneface.
After her destitute family is forced to sell her, a collie named Lassie escapes from her new owner and begins the long trek from Scotland to her Yorkshire home.
4 friend who work together as a cleaner want to take a new level in their work, to clean the tallest Malaysian building, KLCC. They must compete to get the job, can they win?

Mad with grief after the death of his Kiowa wife, Talbot awaits death under a tree with her body beside him. She begins to haunt him because he won't burn her. His father, who bought him the wife, thinks her sister might reason with him.
a sequel to another film of "Haci Murad" Seyh Samil and Haci Murat continue to fight with Russian giaours.

A woman traveling with her parents to her uncle's house crash near his house. Her parents die but she survives. She stays with her uncle, but it becomes clear that he and his son are planning something sinister for her.
Kassi's friend takes her to a farm, up in the hills of Northern California, but when all hell breaks loose, she will be put through a gauntlet of terror, and fight to make it off the mountain alive.
Drummond, his girlfriend and his butler try to free an high post of Scotland Yard who has been kidnapped.
During the excavation of ancient Roman ruins, an old archaeology professor accidentally opens the gate between our world and the world of the dead.
When a Slave is given special powers some very dangerous are after him to retrieve his DNA.
Four-weekend treasure hunters accidentally uncover a clue to the legendary Tokugawa Treasure and race to find it before the Japanese Mafia.
A young boy attempts to reunite an abandoned polar bear cub with its mother in northern Canada.
Tom Sawyer and his pal Huckleberry Finn have great adventures on the Mississippi River, pretending to be pirates, attending their own funeral and witnessing a murder.

Hap and Leonard are best friends, yet polar opposites. When an ex-flame of Hap's returns promising a huge score of hidden money, Hap lets Leonard in on the scam. When their adventure goes awry, that's when things get interesting.
A mentally disabled giant and his level headed guardian find work at a sadistic cowboy's ranch in depression era America.
Light in the Darkroom is the story of two best friends whose faith is tested when their friends disappear during a religious pilgrimage.
Volcanic activity frees giant scorpions from the earth who wreak havoc in the rural countryside and eventually threaten Mexico City.

This documentary revolves around some WTC workers/rescuers as they share their experiences from the 9/11 attacks, beginning from the moment of when Flight 11 hit the North Tower to the aftermath of the collapse of both Twin Towers.

Hassan who is a skint wants to pay back the debt of his father to Malek Salman who is a fraud. In a virtual world Hassan became an imaginary person but the love of Malek Salman's daughter is hindering him from continuing on his mission.

A guy and four of his friends visit his crippled uncle, a taxidermist who lives with his housekeeper next to a movie set. Pretty soon people start being killed in the manner they are in the script of the movie being filmed next door.
A man kills a drunkard in Australia, flees to England, and unknowingly weds the man's widow.
An intrepid newspaper reporter attempts to solve a series of murders committed by a gorilla carrying the transplanted brain of a human.
A group of gangsters, on the run from the law, stumble across an isolated farm community hiding a sinister secret during the Great Depression.

movie_name: Il gatto con gli occhi rossi
synopsis: Fabio witnesses an attempt of murder on his way home. Having prevented the aspiring assassin from committing the crime, he now fears that he will become his next victim.
A team of investigators are sent to an underwater research lab 6,000 meters below the ocean's surface to find out why everyone there was mysteriously killed.
A fairy takes on human form and enters the life of a widowed children's book author and his daughter.
Luz, a young cabdriver, drags herself into the brightly lit entrance of a run-down police station. A demonic entity follows her, determined to finally be close to the woman it loves.
Martha lives paralyzed by loss of her child, until she meets German, his maid's boyfriend.
A couple's replacement babysitter turns out to be more than they bargained for when she subjects their kids to a series of twisted activities.
Po and his friends fight to stop a peacock villain from conquering China with a deadly new weapon, but first the Dragon Warrior must come to terms with his past.
A devastating dilemma changes the fate of three cops when an undercover operation against a notorious Thai drug lord goes horribly wrong.

Did you ever feel tired of the city? did you ever want to run away from all the problems and people you hate and live a happy relaxed life and enjoy you being alive? Nature is always the right answer.
S B Films, Presenting this time fun in an untouched manner. Fun assorted with illusion called "FUNUSION".
Adventures of a highway patrolman and his German shepherd dog Lobo, fighting against crime.

movie_name: Percy Jackson and the Titan's Curse
synopsis: This is a fan-made film based on the Percy Jackson series by Rick Riordan. This third adventure in the series finds Percy faced with his most dangerous challenge yet: The chilling prophecy of The Titan's Curse.
The log-line is being kept under wraps, but the pitch is said to be a high-concept, character-driven genre movie with elements of romance and the supernatural.
The daughter of a formerly wealthy man tries to get a job singing on a radio show, but gets involved in a feud and murder.

The CIA implants the memories of a recently murdered female agent into a jailed woman, unaware their former employee's lethal skills also transfer, causing the convict to escape and hunt down the killer.

Vandad is notice about his father's death so he comes to Kish. In the same time Parmida is noticed about her mother death so she comes to Kish, too. But they understand that they are in the same boat.

Investigative reporter Ji-won begins to receive a series of menacing calls. To escape the terrifying and relentless clanging of the telephone, she changes her number and moves out. But the threatening campaign of terror continues unabated.
A lonely man recalls the traumatic moment in his life when he and his family were confronted by a terror in his own home that changed everything.
Three thieves Kaamanna and his adopted sons Krishna and Rama, decide to mend their ways.
A guy finds a book filled with characters inside each person. Once he reads it, these characters comes out to control his life.
A young boy influenced by the stories of a kind nurse and his imagination hurry to the rescue of a little girl who has cancer.

When a man living alone in the woods saves the life of a young woman, they are forced to coexist. Chaos ensues when the woman makes a terrifying discovery in the woods behind the man's home and unleashes something truly haunting.
Corey and his daughter, Sally, decide to go on a summer break with friends, Diane, Christy, Toby and Benny. Little do they know, Corey's past is going to catch up to him.
A London cab driver gets mixed up with a criminal gang and sets out to expose the group and its leader for what they are.

Antoine de Maximy disappeared in the Carpathian Mountains during the filming of J'irai dormir chez vous (2005) after a car accident . His editor, Agnès, tries to find him thanks to the pictures of his trip.
After losing his entire crew at sea, an afflicted captain with a grim secret is offered a second chance at life but must risk death to save his family from the unforgiving ghosts of his past.
Tinkerbell wanders into the forbidden Winter woods and meets Periwinkle. Together they learn the secret of their wings and try to unite the warm fairies and the winter fairies to help Pixie Hollow.

Two men opposite sides of social conflict look for answers to the first bloody violent event with conflicts. The real search is not about the answers, but the right questions. Do they have the strength to stop the drums of civil war
Humanity, their alien allies, and Godzilla all enter their endgame as the powerful destructive entity known as Ghidorah arrives on Earth.
Christopher Nolen's "The Good Life" is the story of Jacques and Marianne Vandelay, a highly successful African American couple. They are happy but both are keeping dark secrets from each other.
A former policeman sets out to unleash violent vengeance upon deer poachers when they rape and kill his long lost daughter.

movie_name: One of Our Aircraft Is Missing
synopsis: During a raid on Germany a British bomber crew is forced to bail out after their plane is damaged. They land in Holland and are aided by Dutch civilians.
A young woman who wants to break into the theater schemes to become the protege of a famous Broadway star.

12-year-old dreamer Vlad accidentally gets caught in a conflict between two alien forces. Together with an electric transformer box The Bobot, a brave girl and an eccentric scientist he has to save the world from a global catastrophe.
Tung has just graduated from the police academy, encountering a Vietnamnese assassin on his first day on work.
Agent Eoghan Flynn must recruit Johnny Mai in order to take down an international terrorist on the verge of gaining nuclear power.
This movie is the story of a nameless, pill-popping drifter girl who steps off a bus and into a neighborhood bar owned by two middle-age brothers.
In 1970s Athens a group of professional burglars plan an emerald heist from the home of a gem collector but the corrupt Greek police inspector Abel Zacharia is on their trail.
A mysterious crystal holds good and evil powers.
Allied forces in the Middle East commission the son of a German collaborator to destroy the German military airport in Crete.
After receiving mysterious empty packages inside his apartment, a young computer-programmer begins a personal investigation into their origins.
With instructions from her genius son's carefully crafted notebook, a single mother sets out to rescue a young girl from the hands of her abusive stepfather.
A young man searching for his wife who disappeared mysteriously, and a detective who is trying to unravel the mystery surrounding this suburban neighbourhood...
When Piglet comes up missing his Hundred Acre Wood friends use Piglet's own Book of Memories to find him, discovering along the way just how big a role he's played in their lives.

movie_name: Mysteries of India, Part I: Truth
synopsis: First part of a serial spectacle, in which the unfaithful wife of a cruel Indian prince attempts to escape from his domination.

movie_name: The Mystery of the Third Planet
synopsis: Zoologist professor Steel, his small daughter Christine and captain Green leave Earth in search for rare space animals. The journey turns into adventurous and dangerous mission involving space pirates and a missing captain of a ship.
Peter McShade is a hitman, whose contract involves killing the major mobster of the Iberian Peninsula, but nothing is what it seems.
The story of an uptown rat that gets flushed down the toilet from his penthouse apartment, ending in the sewers of London, where he has to learn a whole new and different way of life.
A failed treasure hunter tricks his girlfriend into going on a vacation to Mallorca, hoping to both fix the relationship and find the legendary Ghost Dagger, with deadly consequences.
Six people get trapped inside an elevator in a hot day of summer, while outside the building just a few steps away something tragic occurs. Are they lucky to be entrapped?
In 1950's Los Angeles, a special crime squad of the LAPD investigates the murder of a young woman.
Po and his friends fight to stop a peacock villain from conquering China with a deadly new weapon, but first the Dragon Warrior must come to terms with his past.

The opera begins at the end. The woman has just experienced a terrible accident, a crash of both the computer and her brain to which the computer is connected. The first two parts take us ...                See full synopsis »
An adventurer is promised $1 million if he can recover a fortune in pearls, but they are guarded by a tribe of fierce natives.
Three adventurers search for the son of a U.S. Senator, who is lost on the island of Komodo, home of fierce, man-eating giant lizards known as the Komodo Dragons.
A dispossessed, violent man's disastrous attempt to exist outside the social order.

movie_name: When You No Longer Love Me
synopsis: An Argentinian girl returns to her natal town on Basque Country to discover who killed her father.
The further adventures of the Blind Warrior.

On New Year's Eve 1946, Sheila Page kills her husband Barney. She wishes that she could relive 1946 and avoid the mistakes that she made throughout the year. Her wish comes true but cheating fate proves more difficult than she anticipated.

movie_name: Dracula Has Risen from the Grave
synopsis: When Castle Dracula is exorcised by the Monsignor, it accidentally brings the Count back from the dead. Dracula follows the Monsignor back to his hometown, preying on the holy man's beautiful niece and her friends.
Villagers are afraid of Samurai Rauni Reposaarelainen, who keeps them on their toes every day. When someone places a bounty on Rauni's head, he goes after this mysterious person.

To prove the existence of the universe, a brother who was a space scientist and astronaut develops a theory about parallel universe which in turn the experiment and mission leads to collapsing chaos over the identity of his brother and his realizes that his identity is responsible for the existence of the universe.
In order for the retired jewel thief known at "The Cat" to clear his name when he's suspected of pulling off another heist, he must catch the real crook.

When a lowly postman is inducted into a top-secret superhuman DNA program at a research facility, it's revealed that he'll be able to receive, control and send information based on the senses of others.

Marco, an impoverished engineering student, hides his wealthy friend Andre at his apartment in a fake kidnaping plot to obtain money from Andre's father, a furniture manufacturer. While the...                See full synopsis »
Bert's drunken past catches up with him 20 years down the road when he and his father are kidnapped by those Bert wronged 20 years ago while drunk on a college semester abroad in Russia.
In New Mexico, an alien spacecraft abducts two young children and an old man. 25 years later, the children are returned as adults to the same town now beset by strange cattle mutilations.
A young angry scientist, searching for a unique energy sources, performs an experiment where he becomes a Jekkyl and Hyde personality.
In the police investigation of a brutal crime scene, one man was at the center of it all: legendary porn star John Holmes.
group of friends helping their friend to start her project in sharm el sheikh
The road to hell is paved with good intentions.
There are lines between fantasy and reality, justice and revenge. Tonight, Aidan Skyes will cross all the lines.
In Ireland, a newly hired prison guard has to deal with the realities of prison work and to face the grim issue of death-row executions.
Two friends go on a surreal and hair-raising trip across Britain

movie_name: The Nutcracker and the Four Realms
synopsis: A young girl is transported into a magical world of gingerbread soldiers and an army of mice.
Humanity's next threat is growing, and it CRAVES human blood...A new Remy St. Paul production, starring Chase White.
The end of the world is upon us, as an anthology showing 5 short films detailing the beginning, middle, and aftermath of the apocalypse.
A genius comes to terms with his childhood, and is determined to destroy all that is unholy.
Kabir Khan, the coach of the Indian Women's National Hockey Team, dreams of making his all-girls team emerge victorious against all odds.

movie_name: Hadh: Life on the Edge of Death
synopsis: Raised in an orphanage, Vishwa is framed by Dalal for the murder of Hajibaba, the very man who gave Vishwa a respectable life. Out of prison, Vishwa seeks to avenge the death of his mentor.

A young woman gets murdered and comes back as a ghost. She then teams up with a forensic photographer (Who use to be an old high school fling) to not just solve her murder, but to rescue her sister, who was kidnapped by the murderer.
An Evil Threat Sends Bounty Hunters after DKE defectors, the Farazies
In the fictional future of 1999, cash traffic is virtually abolished. All financial transactions are only through credit cards.
A young star at a Wall Street firm finds that the white-collar world is filled with as much crime and death as the dangerous hood where he was raised.
Plot under wraps.
Provincials Nicolas Pappas and Léon Dubois come to Paris to exercise their talents as trigger-happy aces.

A modern girl moves to a new school and is bullied. She throws a page from her journal into a hollow tree, and a monk from medieval England receives it. They begin a correspondence through time to help each other.
Six astronauts are infected by an alien organism.
Some people are amphibians; half spirit and half animal - as spirits they belong to the eternal world, but as animals they inhabit time. If they don't sneak underwater, they'll get squashed.
Muscleman Ohro travels to the sinful capital of Atlantis to rebuke its godlessness and hubris and becomes involved in the battle against its evil lord Yoh-tar and his hideous super-science schemes.

movie_name: Pastoral: To Die in the Country
synopsis: A young boys' coming of age tale set in a strange, carnivalesque village becomes the recreation of a memory that the director has twenty years later.
As models show up on calendars and magazine covers, someone is making bodies show up at the morgue. Is it the obsessed fan?
A Hong Kong cop is struggling for his survival in the underground world, a place filled with criminals and low life people like moss in rotting hell.

movie_name: The Hunt of the Son of Beast
synopsis: Andrew, David and his friends are taking a vacation to Kings Island when something strange and mysterious is happening and it's returning.

A CIA agent develops an experimental gun with exploding bullets. His handler, Sanders, sends him to help a South American strongman, Gonzales, put down a rebellion. The agent realizes that he's being played and turns to a female rebel.
A reformed gangster is released from prison and attempts to protect his family from his enemies.
Harikrishan, a software engineer who suffers from obsessive-compulsive personality disorder is asked to go on an assignment to Trivandrum, as his colleagues are not able to stand his behavior.
Murugan falls in love with Yamuna and with the help of his friend Paandi,he saves Yamuna from a marriage with a notorious money lender.
A teenager teams up with the daughter of young-adult horror author R.L. Stine after the writer's imaginary demons are set free on the town of Madison, Delaware.
An alien child is evacuated from his dying world and sent to Earth to live among humans. His peace is threatened when other survivors of his home planet invade Earth.

When a tragic accident takes the life of her dog, Tara is forced to cancel her wedding. With a little help from above, their small town rallies together to make sure these two are able to have the wedding of their dreams.
A phony spiritualist hypnotizes the daughter of a wealthy banker in a scheme to swindle the banker out of his money. A reporter investigating the swami discovers the plot, determines to expose it.
A struggling actor pushing 30 works a day job at a luxury hotel, shepherding guests and party goers, while yearning for the girl of his dreams.
At Kimberley Prescott's villa, a stranger shows up and claims he is her brother who supposedly died the previous year in a car accident.
A group of skaters have to pull off the hardest trick ever in order to end a zombie outbreak.

Andy the Arsonist welcomes everyone to his theater of derange for a wild night of thrills, chills and spills. Andy kick's off the night by hosting five short horror films from some of the best Horror Writer/Directors in the indie scene.
Inspired by the August 2014 celebrity cellphone hack. A struggling filmmaker has his wish for fame fulfilled, but gets more than what he bargains for.
A young couple (Allu Sirish, Lavanya Tripathi) follow the rocky path to love.

After an air racer loses his sponsorship and returns to his day job repossessing airplanes from criminals and corporate deadbeats, he finds himself in an unenviable situation: piloting a plane with a weapon of mass destruction.
A beautiful young girl secretly learns the deadly art of the Crane Technique against the wishes of her father.

A boy declares his love for his girlfriend, only to die the same night. He is brought back to life by his mother as a flesh-craving zombie, who sires more teen undead while trying to control his, er, appetite for his beloved.

For a group of teens, the answer to the mysterious death of their old friend lies within the world of an online video game based on the true story of an ancient noblewoman known as the Blood Countess.
Three young houseflies stow away aboard the Apollo 11 flight to the moon.
Aliens who look like clowns come from outer space and terrorize a small town.
At a gas station located in the middle of nowhere Banan works during the winter holidays. One frosty day a gangster wounded in the stomach with a bag full of money and a gun turns up.
A couple of bored punks decide to go on a crime spree in New York's underground art scene and accidentally summon a demon.
After a spoiled, wealthy yacht owner is thrown overboard and loses his memory, a mistreated employee convinces him that he is her working-class husband.
Jeeva arrives in a village ruled by a cruel god-man and upon learning about his ancestors decides to fight against him.
Goblins, elves, fairies and imps, and their misadventures sparked by the battle over a powerful potion.
The story revolves around a professional thief who is also an expert in changing her appearance to outwit the police.

Flora and Petros are competitors who try to buy cheap land on a Greek island and sell it to foreigner investors. During their stay comic things take place ending to find true love in the local residents.

movie_name: Stepford Wife: The Barbie Serial Killer
synopsis: The perfect town of Dawson holds a dark secret. The Smiths seem to be the normal American family, but there is something peculiar going on behind closed doors.

movie_name: Pretty Soldier Sailor Moon: The Movie
synopsis: When the forces of the Dark Kingdom threaten to destroy the peace, four guardian warriors will awaken.
A creative horror movie made up of five unique short films tied together by a similar theme.
Unsuspecting citizens become enemies of the state in this pre-apocalyptic noir.
Shobha's dad who is a scientist gets into a difficult situation after an experiment he was conducting goes wrong and kills his employee Manohar.
A look at the relationship between the famous physicist Stephen Hawking and his wife.
A gambler kills a sheriff in self defense. But as everyone in conspiring against him, he is condemned to a long sentence in prison.

A fateful chain of events begins to unravel after two brash insurance salesmen go knocking on the wrong door and find themselves trapped inside of a serial killer's basement, putting their lives and their jobs on the line.
A blue collar worker tries to cover things up when his stepson is killed in a suspicious accident, but a local reporter senses that something's amiss.
A paranormal researcher sets out to debunk the legends surrounding the infamous Aaron's House.
Jivan Sandhya is a emotional journey that explores the life of two widowed people who find love in their 60's and get married against their family's wishes.
The relationship between writer AA Milne and his son, Christopher Robin, and how this became the inspiration for Winnie the Pooh.
A man decides to save his sister from the clutches of a deadly Mafia Don.
A young couple must survive the night when they become the sexual obsession of a sadistic vampire.
Youthful idealism becomes an excuse for terror - when a new boy joins a clique of loser misfits in Faeryville College.
In the near future, a paranoid computer programmer disconnects himself by hiding out in a bizarre, isolated retirement community.
An expert cutter must outwit a dangerous group of mobsters in order to survive a fateful night.
The unsettling but heartfelt relationship between Sarah and a two year-old she calls Johnny hides a dark secret.
A Texan sheriff and his younger brother travel across the border into Mexico to confront the man who killed their father.
Plot is kept under wraps at the moment.
A small-town newspaperman begins to suspect that a wave of murders committed in the area may not be the work of a serial killer but a monster.
An ancient wind carries with it omens of the apocalypse, stirring the pride, guilt and envy of a group of college kids to murderous rage.
A dreamer unhappy with his job makes an impulsive decision to become a commercial trucker and tries convincing his brother to join him.
An alien is sent from Kakadu planet to earth for one week. He befriends a little girl Golnar and this is the beginning of their adventures.

movie_name: Switch: A Tale of Humility & Despair
synopsis: Danny and his old school friend Ben, get in farther than they can handle, when they accidentally 'switch' a case containing unmarked bills. Soon after this, unbeknown to them, they are hunted by local gangsters and hard men.

While wandering solitary in the city, Bruno discovers that his personality alternates with another. Such scrutiny will disturb him and make him to face himself in a quest that will even bring him face to face with death.
Mongolian hordes on horseback attack the Northern defenses of the Sung Dynasty. Magnificent horseback duels, and epic grandeur of a forgotten period create an unusual action drama.
Hugo, a vain clothing buyer, meets Myriam on a train and pursues a relationship with her. He is delighted to learn she is a prostitute and has no idea she has more in mind than Hugo bargained for.
A wealthy lawyer begins to suspect that his inattention to his wife is making her cheat on him. When he discovers the truth he's charged with murder.

When private eye John Hillman is on assignment in London his wife Kajsa visits the Army's riding school at Strömsholm, Sweden. She gets involved in the strange murder of the Blue Rider. Unknown to everyone at Strömsholm.

A struggling and ailing writer in crises is helped by an Angel (posing as a Life Coach) and her heavenly associates, through family moments and acts of selfless giving to others, to reconnect to himself, his family and his faith.
Two feuding neighbors have to put their differences aside to battle an invasion of alien parasites.
A balloon seller with grand plans to win a scholarship clashes with a budding dancer and her circus troupe over a prime town-centre location.
Joey Piscopo stars in this quirky romantic comedy as Wes, a young man who becomes magically attractive to women on Saturday mornings (between six and eight o'clock).
The story of how George Jung, along with the Medellín Cartel headed by Pablo Escobar, established the American cocaine market in the 1970s in the United States.
During Cyprus' war of independence against Britain, Juno Kozani (Susan Strasberg), an American archeology student visiting Cyprus, is caught between the two warring sides.
It follows Kendra as she sets off on her own for the first time to college. When she meet's her film class partner Ben, she tries her hardest to keep things professional.
In 19th century India, three British soldiers and a native waterbearer must stop a secret mass revival of the murderous Thuggee cult before it can rampage across the land.
Two Characters in One Room. All told in Real Time.
In 1875, a former farmer and soldier embarks on a dangerous journey to hunt down the man that killed his family- a man who thinks he's an animal.

In 1950s Macao, an American expat diver is hired by a mysterious woman to retrieve a sunken cargo that eventually attracts unwanted attention from a crooked banker, corrupt authorities and local pirates.

Teenage twins Rachel and Theo travel to Auckland to stay with relatives after their mother suddenly dies. They find an alien environment and overhear Mr. Wilberforce talking about something stirring beneath the ground - the fire-raiser.
A New York cop investigates a series of brutal deaths that resemble animal attacks.
Greta is nine years old and is great at making Christmas decorations with her babysitter, Katy. The girl believes so much in Santa Claus, that she decides to bring a letter to Nicola,
Plot kept under wraps. Described as a re-imagining of the classic Robin Hood tale.
Going through his daily routine in a stereotypical neighborhood, a street cleaner falls in love with a charwoman. Unfortunately for him, so does his boss.

Inside a remote rehab sanatorium, four newly arrived patients, each one with a specific emotional damage, go through hell by discovering and enduring the vicious methods of the sinister doctor's treatments, attempting to stay alive.
A group of talented young individuals rehearsing a play in a remote countryside mansion are visited by an ancient abomination, a descendant of the 18th century Hindu tribe known as 'Yaksha'.
Young women are being abducted by a masked killer. Graverobbers and poison darts also feature as our heroine discovers which of the men in her life is the psycho.
Jessie is a triangular love story that explores the effect of religion on love.
A special military unit fights a powerful, out-of-control supercomputer and hundreds of scientists who have mutated into flesh-eating creatures after a laboratory accident.
At the brink of extinction, an astrophysicist must travel with a group of scientists to another galaxy with her dying son to interpret an alien signal that could save the human race and her son.

The Devil's Night is the chronicle of a killer's cycle. He doesn't do it for pleasure, he is forced on the same path every year by his distorted version of reality. This story will shed ...                See full synopsis »
Two officers find the body of a young woman in the water of the Copenhagen Christianhavn district.
A "bad boy" charmer and his Burlesque dancer girlfriend have to re-do a robbery to fund his male enhancement surgery and their wedding.
Three friends embark on the summer of their lives and end up trying to save the world.
Terror and chaos ensue after the contamination of Portland's water system. Nick and Madeline run for their lives as a horde of citizens prowls the streets to quench their thirst for blood.
A fantastic adventure story that started in ancient Greece and continues to the present day.
A crazed physician invents a death ray and threatens to destroy San Francisco unless he is paid $10 million.

Satyajit Ray's creation Feluda travels to Mumbai with his nephew Topshe to witness a film being made on a story written by their author-friend Lalmohan Ganguly under his pen-name Jatayu. Trouble follows them.
Amnesic Malcolm struggles to put the pieces of his life back together and begins questioning those closest to him in this puzzle of memory and identity.
Strange events start happening to a woman after marriage.

After earning 00 status and a licence to kill, secret agent James Bond sets out on his first mission as 007. Bond must defeat a private banker funding terrorists in a high-stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, Montenegro.
A multi-cultural celebration of young people triumphing in the face of adversity, societal pressures and difficult familial situations.

A young married couple move into a modern duplex apartment and soon discover that not only is it haunted, but the manifesting malicious spirit could well be of their deceased daughter who is jealous of their new pregnancy.
A brave and bold indian girl, protector of her jungle and its wild life and guided by her shaman grandfather, pairs with a boy from the big city, against animal traffickers in the Amazon forest.
After waking up and discovering that he has undergone gender reassignment surgery, an assassin seeks to find the doctor responsible.
This is a heartfelt story of an older man who tries to realize his dream after losing his family, a friend and his job.

A husband hires a lonely pretty young woman to work as a nanny for his son. His wife becomes instantly jealous and things take turn for the worst. In the background, World War II is in the air, and anti-German sentiment is on the rise.
A young man is informed of his father's death.
A brave prince wants to win the heart of a stubborn princess by finding the singing, ringing tree for her.

Jenny, a young single mother is fleeing an abusive ex with her son Harry. She desperately needs to rent a house anywhere. Morton, the estate agent insists she take a mysterious house but has more than a passing interest in her son.

movie_name: The Last Remake of Beau Geste
synopsis: An aging Sir Hector Geste (Trevor Howard) takes a young greedy wife who's after his famed Blue Water sapphire, but his sons hide the gem and join the French Foreign Legion in North Africa.
Upon being fired, a desperate guy kidnaps a daughter of his former boss. Two angels are sent to Earth to check if love is possible in this case.

One Halloween night, a Detroit man wades through a brutal odyssey of his memories and dreams, searching for the men who left him to die in the trunk of a car. A fan film dedicated to the cult series "The Crow" by James O'Barr.
Sobhanadri and Latha should overcome all the hurdles they come across in the form of Latha's uncle Bhupathi to live happily together.
The robotic alien villains from Il était une fois... l'espace (1982) attack Earth.
Cowboy Bob Blake (Herbert Jeffries) and four friends ride to Arizona to help Betty Jackson (Artie Young), the sister of Bob's friend, Joe (Rollie Hardin), who has gone missing.
A lonely man struggling with insomnia spends his nights driving around the city as a cab driver until his ventures lead him to the dark side of town and his mind.
What is the government doing in the brown mountains?
A gritty, emotional story about the strength inside of all of us.
Shimmy, a monkey newly discover superhero powers and learns how to control his extraordinary transformative abilities and prevent powerful demonic forces from sending the universe into chaos.
Dissection of Brazilian problems, using six people who meet in a restaurant in São Paulo as models to illustrate political and sociological theses.
A young man sets out on a journey of self-discovery.
Olsen has a plan: rob over DKK4,000,000 from an armored car with police escort using a hot-dog stand, some ducks etc. Can the gang hide the money safely?
A burnt out detective follows the trail of a serial killer who sends him messages about the murders.
A crime ring is smuggling gold from Mexico across the border in the US. The Customs Service sends an agent to Mexico to try to infiltrate the ring and stop the smuggling.
Young man loses his mother father and sister in a terrorist blast at the local temple. His story is one of revenge.

11-year-old Katie, misuses the powers of an ancient Ash tree to bring harmony to her troubled family. When the balance of nature is destroyed by fire, Katie is forced to choose whose future she will mend - hers or the forests.

An archaeologist named Magdalena Santos accidentally awakens a vampire that was sleeping in a Mayan Pyramid. She tries to tell the police about the situation, but they do not believe her and they send her to an asylum.
AMERICAN STUDENT, WRONGLY ACCUSED OF A CRIME AND SENT TO JAIL, ESCAPES FROM PRISON TO AVENGE HIS FATE AND SEEK TRUE JUSTICE THAT WAS DENIED HIM,
