The story is about seven friends working in a new age IT company. They earn money and have a good time as a group. Despite their diverse backgrounds, they blend well, even having romantic relationships at various degrees of fruition.
A string of robberies has occurred in Britain and it's up to Inspector Clouseau to catch the criminal.
A young woman on the frontier marries a meek farmer who has an annoying habit of going through a rather drastic change every full moon.

In the town of Bodega Bay, Joseph went to sea with the love of his life and returned alone. The mystery deepens upon Joseph's exoneration in her disappearance, while a reporter stirs the pot of suspicion and the wrath of a vengeful family.
A slapstick fantasy of the amorous adventures of a magician a la Cantinflas.
When a government agent crash lands on a tropical island run by a cruel dictator, he must seek the wisdom of a fallen hero in order to survive the island's mysterious power. Will he escape?
Philippe Delambre, the now-adult son of "The Fly", does some transportation experimentation of his own.
Famous fine artist Brie finds her mind unraveling inside her beautiful home. Could it be the mysterious and somewhat sadistic housekeeper who is behind this?
Charles Dickens meets Arthur C. Clarke--A lowly factory worker is delivered from a world of misery and discovers his destiny via an ancient object on the other side of the stars.
In a Manhattan psychiatric hospital a man, convinced he is Sherlock Holmes, is treated by a female doctor who happens to be named Watson.
The terrifying story of a family that experienced the biggest demonic possession after moving into a house plagued by malicious spirits.
The another fight story against tyrant like Horasan'in Uc Atlisi.
Four creatives come of age and discover who they are in a surreal, alternate version of the United States.
Maverick filmmaking duo Justin Benson and Aaron Moorhead offer up a twisted reflection of our paranoid times in this inventive mix of buddy comedy and sci-fi thriller.
When a runaway orphan finds out that his new best friend (a circus elephant) is about to be put down, the two of them hit the road in search of freedom.

A sly killer is involved in an uncanny phenomenon when he blackmails a supposedly dead detective into locating his escaped victim who unknowingly bears the same strange scar as the detective and has someone shadowing him.

In return for handsome and unclouded youth, a weary old geezer makes a pact with the father of lies to woo his beautiful next-door-neighbour. However, will he admit his mistake, now that things are not working out as planned?
A peasant is blamed when a tenant shoots the landlord who seduced his daughter.
Two young women caught in a power struggle among a trio of mobsters must struggle to survive in a world run by vice and corruption.
As a young hero goes to battle with flying dinosaurs, he also must face his own internal monsters.
Reporter tries to solve the murder of a man killed on a boat in Mississippi.
A guy falls find himself trapped inside the body of a penguin.

To pay back her blood debt to a valiant king, Red Sonja, the She-Devil with a Sword, agrees to lead his doomed army to their certain death against the invading plague-ridden forces of Dark Annisia, Sonja's blood sister who's gone mad.
Famed Southern detective Benoit Blanc travels to Greece for his latest case.

Three women mysteriously wake up in a hospital and discover that one of them is deaf, one is mute and the other one is blind; together they will have to figure out why they are there and how to get out.
A crazed physician marries a wealthy women and, with the help of his demented assistant, murders them for their money.
A lone writer lives a life of isolation until her world changes by the appearance of a strange young girl.

The journey begins in the Roman ruins of Milreu in Portugal, where a mother reads to her son Seneca's advice on the importance of reading. It then takes them through villages and shores where light reigns.
All the insects on Earth become wild and attack humans, causing Armageddon.

movie_name: Any Girl Who Loves the Beatles Is Bound to Break Your Heart
synopsis: On a sweltering summer's day in Sydney, two strangers, a vivacious English musician and a cynical local travel writer fall for each other's charms when circumstances throw them together for twenty-four hours after a missed flight.

movie_name: Captain Nemo and the Underwater City
synopsis: When Captain Nemo saves the passengers of a sinking ship and takes them to his Utopian underwater city he discovers that not all of his guests agree to remain there forever.

movie_name: Sky Captain and the World of Tomorrow
synopsis: After New York City receives a series of attacks from giant flying robots, a reporter teams up with a pilot in search of their origin, as well as the reason for the disappearances of famous scientists around the world.
A frustrated writer struggles to keep his family alive when a series of global catastrophes threatens to annihilate mankind.
A girl from bourgeoisie discovers the pleasures of banditism, following her lover in his lifestyle.
Salah moves to Cairo to work as a guard in a garage and falls in love with Nadia, who works at a video store. He is obsessed with the films she has at her store and decides to learn karate.
A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous Paris restaurant.

An animated adventure in which the free-spirited UglyDolls confront what it means to be different, struggle with a desire to be loved, and ultimately discover who you truly are is what matters most.
A paranormal feature about three sisters who are self-proclaimed mediums struggling to maintain their public credibility in the face of fraudulent competition
A woman jogger is abducted by a crazy mountain man, and taken to his cabin.

Armed with only one word, Manager, A CIA officer journeys through a mission that might just play out in something beyond real-time by "Inverting" backward through time from present day to the year 2001.
Betrayed by the Government they valiantly served, the AST team wages war with the corrupt, treasonous leadership attacking our democracy from within.
When two brilliant women - Charlotte Holmes and Jame Bond face each other in a dangerous game of crime and espionage, the world begins to tremble beneath their feet.
Following the outbreak of a virus that wipes out the majority of the human population, a young woman documents her family's new life in quarantine and tries to protect her infected sister.
A reimagining of the myth of Faust, in which a documentary director and her producer investigate a number of celebrities.
When her unpredictable powers expose her, a rebellious teen outcast must uncover the truth behind her mysterious origins, before it is destroyed forever.
A cop, who's actually a vampire, teams up with a hot investigative journalist to stop a posh crime boss.
A birthday celebration at a fancy restaurant leads to some friends' encounter with flesh-peddling cannibals.
Eva thinks her cousin Georgia's views on motherhood are regressive. Georgia thinks Eva's feminism is playing with fire. As they struggle to reconcile, an ancient Zagori specter stalks them.
A girl starts her own investigation after the police fail to catch a local serial killer.

movie_name: El cuenco de las ciudades mestizas
synopsis: A corrupt politician orders a hit on a kid who used to work for him and is drawing too much attention to himself. Somewhere else in the neighborhood, an artist is starting to suspect his comic books can predict the future.
A paralyzed man discovers a wormhole through his seizures and travels to the past to stop the shooter who put him in a wheelchair.
Dive deep into a dystopian inner-world where grown men crawl around on all fours and chaos reigns supreme.
Christopher Tauling, a U.N. official, is leading an effort to warn the authorities worldwide that a bacterial weapon is at the ready to wipe out most of mankind.
Joey Piscopo stars in this quirky romantic comedy as Wes, a young man who becomes magically attractive to women on Saturday mornings (between six and eight o'clock).
Chow, on a visit to Thailand meets a girl who takes him around to see the sites. What he's really interested in is Thai boxing, so she brings him to a match where her friend is competing.
After surviving prison, a man has to forge a career in the crime world.

Based on Verne's book The Mysterious Island, five POWs escape from a camp in a balloon during the Civil War and crash-land on an uninhabited island in the Pacific. Trying to settle with their lives they find someone is helping them.
A big budget period movie with sea as the backdrop.

There are many scientists who came to Andaman for searching something. But, after some times they have been killed or nobody could find them.Kakababu and his nephew Santu is trying to solve the mystery.---KBBO-AINOS
A failing father, tormented by overbearing societal pressure, and the overwhelming trauma from his childhood, leads him down a self-destructive path of discovery.
Two thugs accidentally set off a gang war over a pair of diamonds.
A woman who has recently moved home to take over her grandfather's trucking company but is soon stalked by danger.
A game designer must capture computer-generated assassins before they destroy mankind.
A woman with a midlife crisis turns to stand up comedy before stumbling into a job as a detention officer in a refugee camp where she uncovers an international terrorist plot.
A young couple's mundane life is reshaped once the husband starts being visited by strange hallucinations.
With the help of a documentary film crew a young locksmith investigates his sister's disappearance only to discover the terrifying truth.
A teenage Leatherface escapes from a mental hospital with three other inmates, kidnapping a young nurse and taking her on a road trip from hell, while being pursued by a lawman out for revenge.

The sailing vessel Cannibal has a leaking hull. The captain (Rock Hudson) reluctantly changes course for Honolulu, where one passenger (Cyd Charisse) is wanted by the law. The water rising, everyone struggles against nature to survive.
Marvelous entertainment for the whole family to relish.
A forensics photographer lured into a world of shamans and mystic creatures while helping his detective friend investigate a series of macabre murders.

In a dystopian future, humanity is afflicted with a deadly disease that has greatly reduced the human presence on Earth. No longer exist cities, states or governments. Some people are surviving in small shelters.

movie_name: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
synopsis: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.
The movie is based on the popular character from DC Comics.
On the eve of war, a search for a downed aviator in the South Pacific takes a startling turn.
Latest installment of the Cities of Love series (Paris, je t'aime / New York, I Love You / Rio, Eu Te Amo), this collective feature film is made of ten stories of romance set in the German capital.
A re-imagining of the circumstances surrounding the fatal crash of Soviet orbital capsule, Soyuz-1.

Teenager Malencia Vale leaves home in order to participate in a program designed to groom leaders in the effort to rebuild the United States, which has crumbled due to biological war and natural disasters.
An American widow returns to Paris in the hope of rekindling her relationship with her former lover of decades ago and rediscovers her true self in the process.
Four travelers innocently decide to rest in a wooded area off an old freeway. Unbeknown to them, they are at an old abandoned and haunted cemetery.

Eternity (aged 10) lives in a haunted gatehouse at the edge of an ancient forest. She likes to dig for buried treasure in the woods, but one day she digs up something she shouldn't and the forest want it back.
FOR THE YOUNG - AND FOR THE YOUNG AT HEART.

movie_name: Night of the Living Dead: Resurrection
synopsis: The deceased have risen with the instinct to feed on the living as a family is trapped during a zombie apocalypse. Wales. Based on George A. Romero's classic "Night of the Living Dead".
An elite superhuman agent must stop a foreign military unit from seizing control of an ancient artifact that holds the key to ultimate power.

A train that is carrying the formula for a valuable form of granulated gasoline disappears before it reaches its destination. Railroad investigators and the authorities try to determine where it is and who took it.
The unclear and complicated twists between governal powers, independentist party and Mafia in the Sicily of the '40s culminate with the death of Salvatore Giuliano.
One regular man named Simon is swept up by a popular movement in a dying world. When the charismatic leader of that movement is brutally executed, everyone looks to Simon to keep the movement alive.
Plot kept under wraps.

In a depressed and Pasolinian land, Sebastiano Urlamo is a widowed father who tries to survive, to guarantee the future of his three children, will accept a tremendous bet with the rich and aristocrat David Ernesto Abevelich.

When metal-worshipping fanatics abduct his son, a father unleashes his dormant destructive power, as his naked rage transforms the once-feeble flesh into a grisly symbiosis of metal and tissue. Who dares to defy the ultimate body-hammer?
A bizarre incident shakes the family of 3 and the father finds himself becomes the victim of people's anger.

Charlie Cooper is a special agent of the future able to transfer his consciousness to bio-mechanical bodies at will. But when a computer virus corrupts his system, he must face one of his greatest challenges yet: mortality.

The Parkers, a reclusive family who follow ancient customs, find their secret existence threatened as a torrential downpour moves into their area, forcing daughters Iris and Rose to assume responsibilities beyond those of a typical family.

Homeostasis is trying to maintain harmony but considers Meicoomon's power to be an existential threat to both worlds. While the DigiDestined return to the Real World alienated by the abnormal state of the Digital World.
A small plane carrying fossil hunters crashes in the Amazon jungle, and the survivors must battle their way through cannibals, wild animals, and slave traders.

Towards the end of the 1940s Marin lives with her mother and two brothers while her father is jailed for anti-Norwegian actions during the war. When summer is over, she dreads leaving the island and going to boarding school.
After a global nuclear war, the residents of Australia must come to terms with the fact that all life will be destroyed in a matter of months.
A former Army special forces soldier finds scriptural justification for vengeance after being betrayed and framed by his friends turned foes.
Two car manufacturers spy on each other to try to find out details and prices of a new sports car each is about to launch.

An immigrant in San Francisco brings Indian magic with her through spices. To keep the magic, she must never leave the spice store or touch another's skin. One day, a handsome architect bachelor enters her store.
A professional fighter decides to quit the sport and go to college, but he finds out that his sister has gotten mixed up with gangsters.
An associate burns down a wax museum with the owner inside, but he survives only to become vengeful and murderous.

A rare doll, appears in Lorenzo and his mother lives. From that moment starts a series of crimes. Lorenzo looks like the obvious criminal. The rare doll really comes a live or just was in Lorenzo's mind?
Mona is a girl in a group of three people performing trapeze stunts on a big circus near Chicago.
On her 13th birthday, Sille wakes in a world were everyone is really awkward and becoming more and more snail like. Only she and the new kid Edge, can save the world from these mutant snails.

movie_name: The Seeker: The Dark Is Rising
synopsis: A boy's life is turned upside down when he learns that he is the last of a group of immortal warriors who have dedicated their lives to fighting the forces of the dark.
A love story between an alien and a monk.
The spirit of the evil Dr. Mabuse takes over the body of a famous professor. The professor/Dr. Mabuse then begins a new crime wave that terrorizes the city.

movie_name: Five Nights at Freddy's 3: This Happened Because of You
synopsis: Amanda is lost in the middle of the huge amusement park. Death is right inside the amusement park. Amanda and her friends will have to face with an old enemy from the past who has unfinished business with them.
Two friends are caught up in a mass hallucination of unknown magnitude.

An astrophysicist on vacation secretly continues to work on his thesis, "The Interaction of Stars with Diffused Galactic Matter". When realize that he is on the verge of a great discovery his life becomes plagued by strange events.
When his patient dies during an operation, a surgeon resorts to murder to cover up his negligence.

movie_name: I Know What You Did Last Summer
synopsis: Four young friends bound by a tragic accident are reunited when they find themselves being stalked by a hook-wielding maniac in their small seaside town.
A mysterious woman called Rose hires an assassin to kill five men but the situation becomes more complicated for him as agents from both North and South Korea become involved.
In South America, after Jeff Dawson and Dutch Peterson's oil rigs are dynamited by local bandits, the two partners resort to risky transportation of nitroglycerin to raise money.
A love story of a boy and girl who move to the city from their village to pursue their dreams.
Xira is a story about a woman who chose an unconventional path for vengeance. It shows the journey of a mixed-martial arts (MMA) athlete in search of justice for those she loved and lost.

An imperial guard and his three traitorous childhood friends ordered to hunt him down get accidentally buried and kept frozen in time. 400 years later passes and they are defrosted continuing the battle they left behind.
Outside of time, a teen hooker, lo-fi cowboy and mute drifter cross a white desert to experience the final gig of their mysterious rockstar hero.
A Woman meets a Married Man in a bar. Money is exchanged. The oldest story in the world for the oldest reasons. But not tonight...
A pre-apocalyptic EDM musical
Heartwarming tale of a young boy who is struggling to deal with child abuse and his unique imagination.
A journalist plunges into the after-crisis world of Buenos Aires full of violence and ambitions of power, when trying to find the true reasons for his father's death.
The crime squad is after a drug and prostitution ring, which enables a number of scenes involving nudity and sex. They end up tackling a sado-maso club, headed by top level officials.
Two narcotics detectives find themselves in an intense investigation lead by a determined Internal Affairs detective after an unarmed teenager is wrongfully shot dead in a violent drug bust.
First mate Fletcher Christian leads a revolt against his sadistic commander, Captain Bligh, in this classic seafaring adventure, based on the real-life 1789 mutiny.

As a hurricane batters the coast a group of college friends head inland towards their hometown, but when their vehicle crashes, they find themselves stranded. Their only option, seek shelter in a nearby house that appears to be unoccupied.
A young hitman is asked to prove himself by killing an innocent woman.

movie_name: El Santos vs la Tetona Mendoza
synopsis: El Santos tries to help the zombies of Sahuayo but his ex-wife, La Tetona Mendoza, asks him to get rid of the zombie plague. However, the world gets worse and Santos has to work with his foe, El Peyote.
An endangered woodpecker that is disabled goes on a mission to save friends.
Kane Pixels (Kane Parsons) Falls Into The Backrooms And Try's To Get Out Of It
A bride's wedding night takes a sinister turn when her eccentric new in-laws force her to take part in a terrifying game.
When Santa Claus gets turned into a piglet due to an ancient curse, bold 11-year old Lyra has 24 hours to save the Spirit of Christmas from being turned into a Christmas roast.
Kurt Ingston, a rich recluse, invites the doctors who left him a hopeless cripple to his desolate mansion in the swamps as one by one they meet horrible deaths.

movie_name: Everybody Is Going to Die, at Ten Acres High
synopsis: Ten Acres used to be a normal town, but after the events that have taken place in recent years it was only a matter of time before Ten Acres High had something strange happen to it.

Detective inspector Rita Murphy leads a charmed life. Professionally she has risen through the ranks fast. When the son of a highly successful French CEO is abducted, Rita is convinced a new serial killer is about to earn his wings.
Security guard David Dunn uses his supernatural abilities to track Kevin Wendell Crumb, a disturbed man who has twenty-four personalities.
Anni wants a new mommy for herself and a new wife for her dad. But dad has forgotten how to find a wife and needs Anni's help.
A satirical romance set to the backdrop of an apocalyptic blizzard that threatens to engulf Manhattan.
In 1930s New York, former fire fighter Mike Malloy, miraculously survives numerous attempts on his life.
Judo expert Saburô Watari fights his judo master, Tsujido, while simultaneously in conflict with a karate expert.
A desperate housewife tries to cover up her son after he kills his father.
Cocky young street kid worships his father, a sleazy political operative.

movie_name: Detective Conan: The Phantom of Baker Street
synopsis: Conan and his friends were invited to the premier of an new virtual computer game. But someone programmed the game, that if they can't answer the riddle in the game, they all have to die.
Four filmmakers are forced to comply with a movie executive's ridiculous demands to create a blockbuster or else.
Encounter of twins growing up with different families.

THE ROMNEY YEARS is a psychedelic dark comedy centered around a shotgun-wedding bachelor party in the backwoods of Pennsylvania. The soundtrack is comprised of original music from Brooklyn-based musicians.

Keith is a young man working in an illegal gambling joint whose boss is putting his foot down about customers' outstanding debts. When the police raid the joint, he escapes from Inspector Lee through the window.
An ex-Green Beret visits one of his army buddies, and finds himself involved in his friend's scheme to smuggle arms into a turbulent South American country.
A police detective smashing a gang with his journalist cousin.
A teenage hockey player becomes a national sensation.
In a town of Argentina, 'the country of barbecues', people linked to the cattle industry start to disappear. A journalist starts to investigate; soon she'll find out a dark secret.
For his final mission, a detective must pursue the one criminal that has eluded him throughout time. The chase turns into a unique, surprising and mind-bending exploration.
A young girl steals her dad's growth experiment infused grapes and feeds them to a pet crab. Years later, the now gigantic crustacean attacks the town!
A film crew shooting in an abandoned village uses a collection of large eggs that they find, as props for their movie. Only to discover that the mother of the eggs would kill to get them back.
Williams, a convict in prison, comes to know that it was Hariprasad who killed Lakshmi, his daughter's friend. Enraged, he tries to find out the entire story from Hariprasad.
A teenage boy and his father move to his recently-deceased mother's hometown, where they encounter the ancient Native American cemetery with the power to raise the dead.
Mike Banning is framed for the attempted assassination of the President and must evade his own agency and the FBI as he tries to uncover the real threat.
A young architect returns from Europe to live in the house of his uncles and cousins, where someone pretends to be the Devil.

Tobi lives with his grandfather in a humble little house, they keep collecting cardboard and thanks to the special talent of the child playing the harmonica. One day Tobi finds a magic book which speaks and tells his stories.
Captain David Porter of the fledgling American Navy receives orders to masquerade as a privateer in order to corral some Caribbean pirates.
A young woman has to brave the uncharted depths of space in order to bring a cure for an epidemic back to earth.
A young orphan girl, Sophie, gets taken away to a faraway land populated by Giants and Dreams.
The Story revolves around a young man Vikram (Neil Nitin Mukesh) who is a fashion prodigy. The story is layered with a murder in town.
A young woman is searching, today, in Paris, for the collection of paintings stolen from her Jewish family during WWII.
Dick Tracy goes up against a villain known as The Ghost, who can turn himself invisible.
The sister of a murdered model poses for the same artist to try to catch her killer.
The independent film that Hollywood didn't want YOU to see. The action-war drama that pays tribute to and welcomes home America's Vietnam veterans.
Samantha, a young girl who was kidnapped, resurfaces in shock after being imprisoned and hospitalized.

Jamal, Marie, and Aria undertake the daunting task of redefining their financial standing. After a few successful missions, and things begin to be tested, Jamal, Marie, and Aria have to find a way to keep their plan from falling apart.
Yang Tianjiang, a young man with aspirations of college and a modern way of life, finds himself on an opposite path of destiny while living on China's Red Mountain.
Stuck in a routine of his controlling parents, a child prodigy tries to break free.
While on a mission in Afghanistan, French captain Antarès Bonassieu's men start vanishing one by one without explanation.

An epic saga of the Niechcic family, told from a woman's perspective. In 1914 in the war-torn Kaliniec, Barbara Niechcic remembers her youthful love, marriage hardships, family life in the countryside and finally her husband's death.
Happy Cricket and his cute, adorable friends will have to defeat the evil Wartlord and rescue Linda, the Night Star. This film celebrates the values of friendship, freedom and the defense of nature.
The friendship between a thief turned Chinese opera performer and an incorruptible police officer.
When her mother suddenly dies, Kaylee, an 8 year old girl with autism, embarks on a grand adventure to a newly revived river festival to spread her mom's ashes to turn her into a mermaid.
A true crime novelist, obsessed with his latest book and convinced he is losing his mind, takes a trip to the forest to recover, but ends up with a fellow traveler dead and blood on his hands.
Brad Whitaker is a radio host trying to get his stepchildren to love him and call him Dad. But his plans turn upside down when their biological father, Dusty Mayron, returns.
After a dead body turns up in the home of a famous actress, two reporters (who also happen to be in love with one another) compete to get the real scoop.
Inspan is dedicated to tough pioneers, who along dangerous roads - with courage and strength - developed the vital transport routes for a young and growing country - the transport riders.
A selfish playboy uses rich women to pay off his debts. Divorcing his wife and marrying the woman he loves throws him into a spiral of destruction.
Spoof of TV Series SWAT. Special police squad, including three clumsy policemen, goes after dangerous criminals.
A fighter pilot travels back in time to save the future world from environmental disaster, but a side-effect turns her young again and no-one takes her seriously.
A child stops at nothing to connect with a dead parent.
A young writer for a newspaper's website becomes curious, then intrigued and finally obsessed with the strange behavior of the woman in the adjacent apartment.
A amateur parody on tokusatsu daikaiju films.
Detective Kaniyan Poonkundran is hungry for a challenging case to investigate and the mystery of a murdered dog leads to a rival who could be the match for him.
Time runs out for a shipwrecked crew.
After a group of renegade cowboys set out on the trail of lost treasure, they find themselves trapped in an unending darkness filled with ghostly visions and portents of the past and future.

Hannibal spends most of his day watching TV as there's no other kid in his area, his parents return home at 5 pm and his grandma is nearly deaf. He gets a dog, Jerry, who can't bark but it speaks. Jerry gets dognapped.
With the promise of a multi-million dollar contract, local models are lured into a dilapidated shack disguised as a nightclub and forced to fight to the death before a pay-per-view audience.
A gripping tale, Of War. A suspenseful Thrilling adventure. A crystal that could alter the world as we know it.
The Indian called Copper Face is suspected to have stolen a large quantity of gold from a bank.

An insurance lawyer unhappy with his rate of company advancement becomes a middleman in deals to recover stolen property from the Mob, thus earning a nice living. But his actions attract police attention and set him up for a double-cross.
After exiling himself to prison, gambling prodigy, Danny Bishop, cons his way into one final high stakes poker game with his arch rival while navigating a strained reunion with his brother.
Carl Teagarden becomes trapped in a pub where all doors transcend the normal rules of space and time.

Intrigued by the portrait of a Jewish girl at a London art gallery, a British Army Major attempts to find her amongst the refugees living in various camps for displaced people in post-World War II Germany.
"Mad Max" clone set in the not-too-distant future about a group of people trying to escape to a safe haven called Neon City after a solar disaster that has decimated the Earth.
The Montagues and the Capulets have a long held vendetta against each other. Thier children fall in love against their families wishes.

A scientist discovers the bodies of three frozen genetically modified Russians buried in the Canadian North. Upon thawing them out he realizes he has unleashed a deadly threat to Western society and must stop them at all costs.
Joe and Anne go off on their honeymoon while Knobby books him into a charity fight which Lord Cecil tries to wreck.
A serial killer is about to get on his revenge with the people inside a movie theater during a midnight showing.
Titanic forces, criminal and government, clash in an epic take-all battle for control of illicit trade in 1982 New York City.

movie_name: The Boy Who Wanted to Be a Bear
synopsis: When a boy child is stolen by bears who raise him as their own, his human parents hunt the bears in despair, and the boy is faced with the dilemma of who and what he is.
Maya is a horror folklore movie. A new breed of horror film. Bringing a mythical creature to life. A mother and daughter's quest to end the evil for good. Will they succeed?
Mercenary karate master Tsurugi gets mixed up in a plot by the American mafia to take over the karate dojos in Asia, aided by a corrupt dojo master.
A young woman finds herself involved in a dangerous love triangle when she gets involved with the writer of a popular steamy novel.
A strangler is loose on a British estate, and he not only strangles his victims but brands an "M" onto their foreheads before he decapitates them.
A skeleton rises to action when his kung fu master is killed.
A Grammy Award winning singer struggles to break through a slum in her career as she battles with herself to ignore the voices of others and live an authentic life.
An animated silent film about a samurai seeking revenge.
About a mysterious school where the students hold a deadly secret they cannot reveal.
A shipyard worker gets an offer of free lodging in the company seaside rest house. Upon arriving there, he finds out that he also has to take care of a flock of undisciplined youngsters.

A love triangle develops between a benevolent student, his innocent girlfriend, and a cruel petty criminal, all as a point of diagnosis of a social disease that had Japan slowly succumbing to lawlessness during the post-War era.
After investigating grisly cattle mutilations, the crew from a paranormal reality series struggles to escape the clutches of a bloodthirsty alien.
Magdi is a young man who lives alone because of his obesity which keeps him away from his friends. He gets into many situations that makes him uncomfortable, so he decides to ask his uncle for help.
Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.
The silver masked Santo tries to stop a gang of counterfeiters who conspire to ruin the economy.

When Simon Daniel, a wandering Archaeologist, learns that his friend, Santhosh, has disappeared while looking for a lost treasure in an mysterious estate, embarks on a journey to find him and complete the mission.
A Los Angeles Rams quarterback, accidentally taken away from his body by an overanxious angel before he was meant to die, returns to life in the body of a recently murdered millionaire.
A young widower returns to his hometown to search for answers to his wife's murder, which may be linked to the ghost of a deceased ventriloquist.

Two friends get tangled up in debt with the local mafia called The Unit. As they look for ways to pay the debt before The Unit comes to collect, they find out there in deeper waters than they thought.

movie_name: Detective Conan: The Private Eyes' Requiem
synopsis: Conan and Kogoro Mori was tasked to solve a crime on a given time. The lives of their loved ones(as well as their own) are on the line. Solving the mystery means saving everyone.

movie_name: The Last Women of the Philippines
synopsis: Two young sisters are shipwrecked on a deserted island with their teacher Ms. Muro.
Story of two small girls, one Sinhala and other Tamil, amidst war

When micro-tears in time, or "Slipknots," appear, an elite unit is sent to recover people that have fallen through time to prevent changes to the present. Soon they discover that the Slipknots origin is far darker than anyone imagined.
In order to be reinstated to the bar and recover custody of her daughter, a hotshot lawyer, now in recovery and on probation, must take on the appeal of a woman wrongfully convicted of murder.
A reporter investigates the murder of a showgirl, who was the widow of a millionaire.
On what seemed to be a normal day, Chelo, unexpectedly witnesses a murder. In the midst of the chase by the perpetrators, the cops mistake him as the killer. He will be forced to fight for his life.
A female detective investigates a homicide involving the murder of a gang member. The police suspect the murder came about from gang disputes, but evidence is lacking and the case is deadlocked.
Nora, after a succession of terrible boyfriends, finds true love with the most unexpected of suitors: a 500-pound American Black Bear.
A town is disrupted with the arrival of a beautiful new tax inspector.

Based on the Hungarian writer Ferenc Herczeg's novel written in 1894, this film takes the viewers to the past of Hungary. Professor Sergius (Elemér Baló) insists that he invented a machine ...                See full synopsis »
Two couples vacationing together in an R.V. from Texas to Colorado are terrorized after they witness a murder during a Satanic ritual.
A giant prehistoric praying mantis, recently freed from the Arctic ice, voraciously preys on American military at the DEW Line and works its way south.
Government agents hire a mercenary to infiltrate a crime ring that's selling guns to a right-wing militia in Texas.

Brujas is a full-length suspense thriller with supernatural elements, romance, and comedy. It is an ultra-low budget movie filmed in and around Sacramento, CA. It is a story about two separated twin sisters who also happen to be witches.
It tells the story of a young Nord hero who travels to his northern homeland of Skyrim to discover his destiny and battle a great evil. But he quickly learns there is more to him than he thought.
A single mom named Gabbie hires a tour guide, a psychic, a priest, and a historian to help exorcise their newly bought mansion; after discovering it is inhabited by ghosts.
A few families living out on a limb in the suburbs of Rome. Tensions here can explode at any time; ultimately it's the children who bring about the collapse.
Two legends of the past have equal chances of becoming the father of a young beautiful girl. But before they find out which one exactly, they are forced to join efforts for saving her from the Mob.

On March 2, 2003 Crypto zoologist, Carter Wells and his brother, camera operator Justin Wells left home for the Widjigo Woods to film a documentary about a legendary creature who inhabited these woods. They were never seen again.
A washed up space shuttle pilot has to save the world on the international space station.
A young witch, on her mandatory year of independent life, finds fitting into a new community difficult while she supports herself by running an air courier service.

movie_name: Super Xuxa Contra o Baixo Astral
synopsis: With the power of a magic crystal, a TV hostess becomes the only hope to defeat a malign subterranean entity, that is sick of her good, generous deeds.

Love story of royalty set during ancient three Dynastic rule of south india Around Roman Empire time of Caesar and cleopatra, Here the story revolves around the Chera prince M.G.R and Chola...                See full synopsis »

Young Johnny Smith, a new citizen of Japan, sets to protect his family from the never-ending series of monster attacks by enlisting the services of the somewhat-nice Megamonster, who lives on Monster Island.

Mael is a naive young man trying to win the girl of his dreams. In his efforts to learn English, one of the conditions set by his dream girl, he meets Teacher, whose patience and kindness causes him fall in love with her instead.
Three young thugs rob a farmhouse, kill the owner and take his stenographer hostage but the woman's estranged husband, a police detective, starts investigating her disappearance.
An artificial intelligence escapes her spaceship to turn into a female ghost and challenges two blade runners to a galactic chase.
A frustrated LA commuter is forced to take the LA River to work when Carmageddon strikes and doing so changes his life and the life of the city.

MICHAEL avoids extradition as long as he helps them bring down a criminal lord, JAMES, who is his former high school best friend. Michael befriends James again with the aid of James's current and Michael's former lover, JULIE.
Angered by the corruption that stopped him from becoming a CBI officer, a young man forms a gang who pose as CBI officers and raids the corrupt.
Beneath Bruce Garrett's under-confident, overweight exterior, the passionate heart of a salsa king lies dormant. Now, one woman is about to reignite his Latin fire.
An obliviously modern college student gets into a near-fatal bus accident, but is reborn through hybrid technology by her biotech father and his advanced lab.

Maier is working as the CFO of a Swiss car parts maker. When a new CEO takes over, Maier accepts him, but soon gets suspicious of him. A bitter struggle breaks out between the two men, leading to a failed IPO with Maier as the fall guy.
Genius sister and brother team, try to retrieve their absentee father from a bad trip.

A fortune teller informs a hopeless romantic that she'll be meeting a mysterious, tall, dark stranger. Initially skeptical, the young lady latterly concedes when the soothsayer's premonitions begin to ring true.
A young woman joins a criminal gang after being released from a juvenile correctional facility.
As the state police are busy eliminating the criminal gang of Daniel, a notorious terrorist, Thalaivan crops up as a bigger threat to the police department.
A family together with their grandpa go on a vacation, when their new car won't stop and it nearly escapes crashing into a hundred cars.

movie_name: Through the Footsteps of a Madman
synopsis: An aging assassin reflects down on his career as one of the most notorious contract killers in his time.
A film director, Walter, meets his old team to make a "road movie". With no money, they will have come up with scams in order to make the production possible while at the same time plotting revenge.
An extra-smart dog and detective team up to stop a DNA enhanced killer.
Icons of American pop-culture take on the powers that be, to save a school for orphans.
A couple and their teenage son rent a haunted New England seaside house, and their summer vacation turns into a ghost-hunt.
A reporter pretends to be Jewish in order to cover a story on anti-Semitism, and personally discovers the true depths of bigotry and hatred.

movie_name: Kunoichi ninpô-chô III: Higi densetsu no kai
synopsis: The government is worried that the Emperor will have no children because he can't get an erection. The female ninjas try to find a sacred book that will help him, but they face a stiff challenge.
The story of Charlemagne and the 12 Peers of France, transposed to Northeast Brazil, with Western elements.

movie_name: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock
synopsis: Admiral Kirk and his bridge crew risk their careers stealing the decommissioned U.S.S. Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis Planet to recover Spock's body.

movie_name: Kulay lila ang gabi na binudburan pa ng mga bituin
synopsis: Aries and Chai sign up for a couple's retreat program where they are given free rein to fix their marriage in whatever way possible or impossible.
A man kills his lover in order to marry a wealthy woman. The murder is witnessed by two children and they try to reveal the truth which no one believes.
Jimmy Tallant, the care-free son of Senator Tallant, feels compelled to help people he thinks are in distress and, by doing so, stays in trouble of some kind.
A look at life on the streets focuses on Hispanic brothers who operate on opposite sides of the law in crime-riddled East Los Angeles.
A pack of guitar-wielding hikers board the bus back to the city; a stranger falls hard for one of the passengers, the very young and very married Lena.

Serbian legend Marko Kraljevic goes on a journey to stop evil Turkish pasha harassing Serbian people, especially women. He fights his foes, such as Musa Kesedzija, in company of his talking horse Sarac, Ravijojla the Fairy and others.
A youngster on his way to a health resort job offers his older boarding house mate a ride along with him, unaware that the loud talking slippery character is a crook.
A midwestern matriarchy guides 12-year-old florence through the rite-of-passage of her first deer hunt.
A riveting action adventure spanning Hong Kong, Philadelphia, the luxurious Amalfi Coast and into the heart of some scandalous hidden secrets.
Randall and his friends are looking for a kilogram of cocaine for Randall's girlfriend.

Alan, a rich older gay man meets Scott, an attractive and self-assured young man. His chemistry leads them to Alan's house where the darkest secrets will be revealed leading them to have a night they did not expect.
Three brothers embark on a journey that begins with a kinship with Brazil's indigenous tribes, to their creation of South America's largest national park.
A fantasy, road- movie regarding Mard and Maryam that embark on an adventure road trip to find their missing along with three others remnant from the circus group.
The story of Princess Maetel and how she came to start her timeless train trip on the Galaxy Express 999.
Los Angeles detective Nick Sterling gets hired by a mysterious woman to find some racy pictures, and ends up neck deep in a world where nothing is off limits and no one can be trusted.
Two suicidal girls become friends and try to help each other with reasoning out their problems, while searching for boyfriends.
It centers on the character Helene Hannøe, an attorney who forms close relationships with her troubled clients while trying to solve their problems.
An action-comedy centered on a beaten-down private investigator.
A gorilla named Ivan tries to piece together his past with the help of an elephant named Ruby as they hatch a plan to escape from captivity.
A land baron and knight, who battles in the Holy Lands at the time of the First Crusade, returns home to learn that his manor and holdings have been raided by an army of vampires.

movie_name: Motherwitch (Dodecameron: the Twelve Days of Christmas)
synopsis: Cyprus, 1888: Eleni, an outcast painter, tries to resurrect her dead children but unleashes a horde of creatures upon her village. Only by becoming a good mother to a talented, but abused child can she reverse the curse.
The story of Plum Jones, the fourteen year old witch, who throws a party on Halloween to gain popularity, which goes from fun to frantic in a hilariously wild series of events.
Jason and his best friend Shawn are thrown into the adventure of a lifetime when a freak accident leaves Jason with the ability to manipulate light.
The knight and poet Antar fights for his love, Abla.
A young girl from a Caribbean slum, gang leader, seeks her identity in the middle of a violent world.
A prequel to the story of Pinocchio, which follows Geppetto as he endures hardships in order to be with his true love, Julia Moon.
An undercover agent infiltrates a crime ring run by a charismatic boss.
A young woman in a small American town has a chance encounter, which proves devastating for her life and the lives of everyone else.
Mark struggles with drug addiction following the war. An Alien, that only Mark can see, manipulates his will and forces him to commit acts that he cannot recall.
A man entranced by his dreams and imagination is love-struck with a French woman and feels he can show her his world.
Seven Arch Angels take on Satan's Army of the Undead, after an apocalyptic asteroid hits planet Earth
Two hustlers within Detroit aim to get out of the drug life. The only question is - At what cost?
TWO BROTHERS. TWO STORIES. ONE TRUTH.
A young couple who are into kinky "mind games" get more than they bargained for when a mysterious woman comes into their lives.
Olga uses pot parties and comic-book violence to turn Gigi Darlene and other female captives before putting them to work as drug-addicted hookers.
A machine built for astral projection gets used for a more existential purpose.

A shaolin kung fu master named Goyu has been framed by a mad man named Sosa. During his quest he fights off numerous fighters working with Sosa but no one can compete with master kung fu skills. Goyu brings justice to the shaolin land by bringing the real criminal mastermind to prison.

Tom, a national ski jumper, is in love with Grete, daughter of the director of the state railways. He gets a job promoting the railways, and gets the brilliant idea of robbing the train at night, but finds that Grete is also on the train.
When an artist discovers his wife is having an affair with their jungle guide, he lures them into posing for him in a radioactive jungle river.
An American tourist unknowingly becomes an object of obsession as she searches for her kidnapped best friend in Thailand.
Pablo returns to his home village to confront his fears.
A struggling comedy duo discovers that surviving the apocalypse is almost as difficult as surviving in Hollywood.
Two working class brothers court three wealthy and beautiful sisters in a small Illinois town.
A newlywed couple winds up spending their honeymoon night in an old, dark, spooky mansion.

Runaway Tracy is snatched from a dangerous L.A. neighborhood by sadistic thugs while searching for her homeless boyfriend. Her police detective mom races against time to rescue Tracy from the big money, high crime world of sex trafficking.
The summer events of two boys and a girl, their uncle and a red canoe. But dangers threaten the idyllic summer.
After trying to rescue a man on the subway tracks, two teens wake up in a room dominated by a mysterious black sphere that sends them to hunt down and kill aliens hiding on Earth.
A young couple returns to their homeland to find their relatives upset by the mysterious death of the farm animals and the old feud between two enemy families.
Three guys are stuck in the desert following their jeep's breakdown. Their problems have just begun.
An evil king makes a bargain with a devil in order to get away with murdering his wife.

Street tough cabby Rick is looking for his kid sister, vanished into the neon lit world of LA's steamiest strip clubs. His search becomes desperate as he discover a dark world of power and intrigue lurking beneath the city's lurid glow.
A woman and her brother seek revenge against a mysterious stalker.
A man struggles to have a normal life due to a monster being kept in his backyard shed.

Sofía, an insecure young nanny who starts her new job taking care of two problematic kids. When their parents leave her alone with the children, they become victims of a demonic entity obsessed with playing children's games.

Genevieve attempts to navigate her life with DID, but begins to see flashbacks of memories she had no part in creating. Nervous of how dangerous she may be, she descends into hallucinations as she gets closer to the origin of her trauma.
An undercover police detective infiltrates an organized crime operation. Once inside he discovers the boss of the operation is a childhood friend from the neighborhood.
In the near future, where illegal body swapping is a premium service, a wheelchair-bound father must solve his own murder after a switch gone wrong leaves him on the run.
Fixer' can solve any problem you have, all he asks is a simple task in return. But, Fixer's real agenda is much bigger than any of his clients realize.
This suspense-thriller combines groundbreaking cinematography and thought-provoking music, to tell the story of two men whose lives are turned upside down by the mysterious contents of a safe.

A year after his younger brother's death, a misunderstood teenager is sent away to an exclusive summer camp in the Poconos for at-risk youth, where he soon discovers his fellow campers are being killed off one by one.
Marco discovers that he is connected to a satanic cult that wants him as their new leader.
A collection of twelve legends full of romance, fantasy, beauty, poetry and mystery that have haunted our lives for centuries.
When Stanislaw Czermien is wrongfully accused of rape and murder, he decides to exonerate himself and track down the real perpetrator. He suspects him to be his own brother, Witold.
Three stories with horror and science fiction elements.
You let God handle revenge when it comes to family.
A timid young man joins his charismatic older brother on an impromptu hitchhike from Amsterdam to France, only to discover the time may have come to finally go his own way in life.
One weekend, 4 boys tried to watch a movie. Until one day they all die. After that, nobody knows who am i . so what
When a young disillusioned war vet, home from Afghanistan, sees nothing good in his life during Christmas a visit by his guardian angel shows him that his life really did make a difference.
A woman is conned by a man who uses online dating ads to rob women.
A group of flying cadets have to clear themselves of a murder charge, while trying to stop a traitorous scientist from selling secrets to the Nazis.
Abhimanyu is an honest policeman who instils discipline and courage among his team members in order to defeat Masi, an illegal racketeer. But later, he learns that Masi's wife is his own sister.
Two undercover detectives recount a drug bust gone wrong.
Two Of Filmdom's Mightiest Swords Clash For HONOR, LOVE, WEALTH, and POWER.

Osami, a soldier-of-fortune from Japan, joins with priest Ensai in a quest for the ashes of the great Buddha. Their journey takes them to a kingdom in the Middle East, where they find intrigue and romance in the court of an evil king.
Children's movie about Gobeklitepe, the most significant archaeological discovery of the 21st century, 12K years old temple in South Eastern Anatolia.
City teenager Ren MacCormack moves to a small town where rock music and dancing have been banned, and his rebellious spirit shakes up the populace.
The Filipina superheroine Darna and her little brother Ding must foil an alien plot to invade Earth.
A defecting Soviet scientist is hit by a nuclear explosion near Yucca Flats and roams around as a beast.

movie_name: The Farmer and the Belle: Saving Santaland
synopsis: Sparks fly between a famous model and a farmer with a young daughter when she visits her childhood home. The town is in danger of losing their beloved Santaland festival, but miracles can happen with a little love, family, and faith.

A group of students investigates a series of mysterious bear killings, but learns that there are much more dangerous things going on. They start to follow a mysterious hunter, learning that he is actually a troll hunter.
An Asian cross-cultural trilogy of horror films from accomplished indie directors.

In a future Scandinavia without electricity and emptied of population, a man must struggle to make peace with his past as well as find harmony between nature and civilization while surviving in the wilderness of Northern Jutland.
A bank officer being absconder of bankruptcy and his colleague's murder seeks way to get rid of the punishment.

At the foot of Mount Chelmos, under the clear blue sky of the untamed Greek countryside, Thimios and Astero exchange vows of everlasting devotion. But, a wealthy suitor claims her, and the sun has now dimmed. Are they meant to be together?
A chambermaid and an ex-cop meet at a speed dating event and a romance develops. But during a romantic getaway things suddenly take a dark turn.

Mehran and Mina are a happy couple but face a problem when Mina is absorbed toward a terrorist group Monafeghin. Mehran who is a reporter becomes suspicious of her when a chemical bomb is dropped over the place in which she is studying.
A French singer is captured by the Nazis, and made to broadcast for them.

A strict priest denies a spy a by phone confession. On the phone, too, two nerdy and weird scholars keep a strange long chat on conspiracies, schemes, and plots. An odd conspirator rejoices in his power. All of the five sing what they say.
A North- and a South Korean soldier are having a private war in the last days of the Korean war.
Alex Pruitt, an 8-year-old boy living in Chicago, must fend off international spies who seek a top-secret computer chip in his toy car.
A single man desperately looking for a girl that brings him into an unforgettable journey.
